Bloxd.io is an IO adventure game with Minecraft-style visuals and multiple game modes, including parkour challenges, creative sandbox building, and combat-based gameplay.

How to Play Bloxd.io

Bloxd.io is a sandbox game in which you navigate challenging obstacle courses by timing your jumps and movements accurately. In survival mode, you gather resources, craft tools, and fend off enemies to stay alive. There are several game modes to choose from to start the game, each with a variety of challenges.

Bloxd.io Game Modes

Choose from one of the many game modes to begin your Bloxd.io journey.

BloxdHop.io

In the BloxdHop game mode your mission is to reach the end of the map within the given timeframe. To reach the end, you must hop through the level parkour-style onto blocks of various sizes.

DoodleCube

This game mode is similar to drawing games like Gartic.io. Players create objects based on the theme presented, and other users vote on how representative they are of that object.

EvilTower

The mission is to reach the top of the Evil Tower! Similar to BloxdHop, you use your parkour skills to reach the end. EvilTower is inspired by Roblox’s Tower of Hell.

Peaceful

Peaceful mode is like creative mode in Minecraft. You can roam freely collecting resources and building here.

CubeWarfare

This game mode adds exciting battles. Compete against other players in a third-person shooter setting where you can also build blocks.

Full list of game modes.

Bloxd.io is regularly updated with fun new features and modes. Here is a selection of current game modes.

Steal Brainrot Online is a fast-paced, casual heist game where you collect rare Brainrot memes like Tralalero Tralala and Cappuccino Assassino, straight from the popular Italian Brainrot Clicker Game. You can buy Braintorts from the red carpet, sneak into other players’ bases to steal theirs, and protect your own with traps and locks. Use boosters, outbid opponents during deliveries, and rebirth for bigger rewards as you climb the leaderboard.

How to Play Steal Brainrot Online

At its core, Steal Brainrot Online is a game about building wealth and stealing it right back from other players from around the world, all of whom have the very same objective: to accumulate as many Brainrots as possible.

The way to collect Brainrots is to, well, steal them. If you want to keep it honest, you do have the option of buying Brainrots, but you will need money.

You start off with a little bit of money, and from there you can either purchase a Brainrot from the endless conveyor of marching meme prisoners, or skip straight to the chaos by raiding someone else’s base and snatching one for “free".

Once you steal a Brainrot, take it back to your base and place it proudly on a pillar, so that it slowly generates income as you will for more Brainrots. The more you collect, the faster your fortune grows. But if you do increase your collection, know that with wealth comes a large target on your back.

Just like you can steal from other people’s bases, other players can peek inside your base and see exactly what you’ve got, which makes your defenses, like locks and temporary shields, your only real line of survival. Shields only last sixty seconds before burning out, so every moment of safety feels fleeting.

Stealing is both tempting and dangerous. To take someone else’s Brainrot, you need to slip into their unlocked base, carry the prize on your back, and haul it to your own collection. But the act of stealing slows you down, strips away your item use, and instantly alerts the owner. You can be sure the owner of the Brainrot you’ve snatched will come after you, knock you on the head with a hammer, and you will fall to the ground, and lose the Brainrot.

If you get the alert, be sure to chase down the thief and use your own hammer.

Your progress only comes from balancing greed and caution. With enough Brainrots, money flows faster, letting you reinvest in more purchases, stronger defenses, and eventually rebirths that carry long-term rewards. But no matter how high you climb, the tension never fades because the server is full of players waiting for their chance to rob you blind.

This isn’t a cozy tycoon. It’s a social standoff disguised as a collection game, where half the fun is in the uneasy silence of players standing outside your cage, watching, and deciding whether to make their move.

Tip

If you get caught stealing in someone else’s base, use your home button (G on the keyboard) to transport you back home. And no, you can’t take the Brainrot with you this way.

This is an alternative version of the game by the name "Steal a Brainrot," which is on Roblox.

If you like this game, you will love some of the popular games within our casual collection, which include Little Alchemy, Little Alchemy 2, Sprunki, and Eggy Car.

Ragdoll Archers is an archery game featuring bow and arrow-equipped stickmen with ragdoll physics. Fire arrows at a range of opponents while earning points to upgrade your abilities and ammunition. Play two-player PvP against your friend or team up with them to defeat a range of foes!

How to Play
Line up your shots carefully, and fire!

Starting with the basic arrows and baseline stats, you will be faced with various enemies. Some of these enemies are trickier than others to beat due to armor, position, and other factors. Occasionally, you will encounter a giant enemy. This is like a mini-boss level, and you will earn lots of skulls for defeating them.

Survive for as long as possible

Your goal is to survive for as long as possible and earn as many skulls as you can. The best way to survive for a long time is to keep hitting the apples. Throughout the game you will notice flying apples. Shoot your arrow through the apples to replenish your health, stamina, or both. Here’s how the apples work:

Red apple = health
Green apple = stamina
Golden apple = health and stamina
Customize your ammunition

There is an ever-increasing range of arrows to unlock the more you play the game. It’s best to keep playing and switching the arrow types to learn which ones are more powerful and suit your playing style. There is everything from electric and poison to balloon and axe and you can increase your arrow slots to hold more of them at once.

Use your skulls to upgrade your abilities

You earn skulls by killing enemies, which rewards a specific amount based on the power of the foe you defeated. You can upgrade your health, stamina, damage, and more using this currency.

More Games Like This

Ragdoll Archers is one of many games featuring ragdoll physics. These games are often fun to play due to the absurd nature of their physics. Some other popular choices include Basket Random and Free GeoGuessr.

Words of Wonders is a crossword puzzle where you connect letters to reveal hidden words. Test your vocabulary and find all the words to progress and reach more challenging levels. Will you become a master wordsmith in this delightful word game?

How to Play Words of Wonders

Words of Wonders is an engaging word puzzle game that combines the excitement of crossword puzzles with the thrill of word search. Players form words by connecting letters in a grid, unlocking hidden words,, and progressing through levels.

You'll see a grid of random letters when you start the game. Each grid represents a level; your task is to find words by connecting adjacent letters. You can swipe your finger over the letters in any direction (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally) to form words. Longer words and more complex combinations may unlock bonus rewards, so watch for opportunities to maximize your word choices.

Connect the letters to form a word. It will be revealed if the word you formed is on the crossword grid. Not all words will be on the grid, so use the letters you have already discovered to ensure you create words that will fit the puzzle!

Completing the grid allows you to unlock the next level, which gets progressively more challenging. The difficulty increases with more letters and words to find, so keep your brain engaged as you move through the game.

Some examples include finding the words “WON,” “OWN,” “NOW,” or “TOP,” “POT,” or “OPT” from a set of three letters. Or a mixture of three and four-letter words to form “WALL,” "ALL,” and “LAW.”

If you find yourself stuck, there are hints and boosters available to help you out. These tools can reveal letters or help you find the next word, though they're limited, so use them wisely. There are also rewards for completing levels or discovering difficult words, such as coins or additional hints, which can help you advance further.

Progress through the levels and collect unique background images with each new milestone. The levels get more difficult by introducing longer words and more letters, increasing the chances of getting it wrong and challenging your vocabulary skills!

Some levels feature specific themes, like landmarks or animals, where the words you form are related to that theme. As you progress, you’ll unlock different "worlds" or locations, each with unique challenges and puzzles. You also get fun bits of info throughout, like learning that The Great Pyramid of Giza is the oldest of the Seven Wonders of the Ancient World.

The goal is to find all the words in the grid before you run out of moves or time. Each level has a set number of words to complete in order to progress to the next stage. You may also encounter bonus rounds or challenges that offer extra rewards when completed.

As you move through levels, you'll earn points, coins, and other rewards, which will help you advance in the game. Some versions of the game also let you compete against friends or other players, adding a competitive element to the experience.

With its relaxing pace and engaging gameplay, Words of Wonders is a fun way to challenge your mind and expand your vocabulary while enjoying an immersive puzzle-solving experience.

Enjoy a range of exciting and challenging word puzzles in Words of Wonders. The game features an easy starting point to suit players of all ages and experience levels. See how good you are at finding all the words and become a master wordsmith!

Game Tips

Use the letters you have already discovered as a clue to find the word
Use the hammer icon to reveal a letter of your choice
Click on the hints button to reveal a random letter
Earn gems to buy hints and reveal letters
More Games Like This

Once you’ve reached your linguistic limits in Words of Wonders, check out more of our curated word games. There are many fun word games for all knowledge levels. Two popular choices to play next are Word Wipe, a word search game with a twist where you use letters from all around and in any direction; Word Scramble, a popular word game where you decode scrambled letters to uncover hidden words; or Word Search, a simple yet classic game offered in different languages.

Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter is a multiplayer shooting FPS game where every second counts! Play against other players across multiple game modes in non-stop combat. This first-person shooter game is ideal for those seeking a bit of thrill.

How to Play Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter

Skilled FPS players will love Hazmob FPS: Online Shooter. The game features excellent, clean 3D graphics with a fluid and intuitive control system that allows you to maneuver quickly and tactically. The maps are designed for fast-paced battles in a close-quarters setting, leaving it down to pure reflex and skill to get the job done.

Upgrade your weapons

The weapon collection is extensive, with 55+ customizable weapons in the SMG, assault, shotgun, sniper, and LMG categories. The game features excellent progression that allows you to unlock new weapons and attachments as you level up. You can fit scopes, skins, and keychains and upgrade the abilities of each gun you own.

Earn more money for gear

Along with the weapons, you can also equip clothing items to improve your base character stats. To get access to these additional items, you also need to buy them using the currency you earn from battles. Complete daily and weekly missions to earn even more money to put toward your new gear.

Create custom matches

With the ability to create a custom game, you can also play private matches against friends or more competitive fights against rival clans. The competitive rank system keeps track of the best clans, showing the trophies and XP scores to add an extra element of competition.

Play various game modes

Want to jump right into the action? Click quick battle and play a random game on one of the eight available maps. You can also play a range of other game modes; these are:

Team Deathmatch

Free for all

Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake is a puzzle casual game where you help Emily, the main character, breathe new life into her family’s rundown cafe while uncovering long-lost family secrets. Solve a variety of challenging puzzles, manage the cafe's operations, and craft creative item combinations to unlock new chapters of the story. As you progress, enjoy heartwarming moments and unexpected twists that keep you engaged at every turn.

How to Play Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake

In Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake, your goal is to merge matching items to create new ones until the board is cleared of all matches. Start by clicking on the toast pan to make toast. Merge two pieces of toast to get toast with a sunny-side-up egg, and continue merging upgraded items like salami, sandwiches, and beyond. Each new combination helps you progress through the game.

As you complete customer orders by matching the correct items, you'll earn money to restore the café and other locations around town. Each renovation reveals more of the town's hidden story, making your progress both satisfying and intriguing. The game's beautiful graphics and detailed animations make every step feel rewarding.

The puzzles are fun and very addictive, pushing you to think strategically as you merge as many items as possible. Along with daily missions offering valuable prizes, you can also fulfill special customer orders to earn additional rewards. As you advance, new areas of the game will unlock, with new challenges and even more complex puzzles to solve.

To help you on your journey, the game offers boosters that speed up your progress, whether you're merging items, fulfilling orders, or upgrading locations. The user-friendly interface makes it easy to play, and every merge is just one click away.

With its combination of charming visuals, story-driven gameplay, and strategic merging, Piece of Cake: Merge and Bake is an all-around fun game where you will rebuild the café and uncover the secrets of the town while merging.

More Games Like This

If you love the gameplay of a good merge game, have a go at some more similar titles in our puzzle collection. You might like Tropical Merge, the ultimate merge game where you can create your tropical paradise; Mergest Kingdom, a charming merge puzzle game that lets you build your own kingdom by matching various resources in groups of 3; Fairyland Merge & Magic, where you merge your way through a magical island filled with stories, spells, and surprises. Check out our casual game collection for more fun.

Traffic Rider is a first-person driving bike endless game that puts you on a motorbike for an exhilarating ride. With a full career mode, lifelike bike sounds, and detailed graphics, it redefines arcade racing. Speed through highways, overtake traffic, and upgrade your rides to conquer challenging missions. Embrace the thrill and master the art of smooth racing.

How to Play Traffic Rider

Hit the road and weave through traffic in Traffic Rider, a high-speed motorcycle racing game where you're on the road for an endless road race. The faster you go, the bigger the rewards, so muster up some courage and overtake cars at speeds above 100 km/h to earn bonus points and extra time.

Complete daily rounds to earn in-game currency, which can be used for bike upgrades and new rides. Choose from multiple game modes, including Career, Endless, Time Trial, and Free Ride, each offering unique challenges.

Brace yourself for dynamic weather conditions, as for example riding in the rain adds an extra layer of difficulty, so stay focused and don’t let the thunder throw you off!

Play it safe or push the limits, speeding past traffic earns more rewards, but be careful of oncoming cars! How far can you ride without crashing?

Farm Merge Valley is a puzzle business farming game where you merge various animals and objects to upgrade them. Grow crops and add animals to your farm while expanding to exciting new lands. Discover the peaceful farm life you've always dreamed of, while reaping the rewards from various challenges.

How to Play Farm Merge Valley

Merge to grow your farm

Help Francine build the perfect farm life for her friendly neighbors and animals. Start by merging crops to reach new types of things to grow. You can create various animals, crops, and materials to produce goods and repair buildings.

Level up your experience

Continue merging to earn experience points and level up. You will unlock new items and rewards that help you progress in the game when you reach higher levels. Additional game features will be revealed to help you enjoy and expand Francine's farm with new areas.

Fulfill orders to earn money

When your animals or vegetables produce output, you can use the product to manufacture goods to sell for money. You can use your currency to purchase new areas of land and grow your farm to new heights. You'll find new buildings to renovate and expand your production to new heights, delivering greater monetary rewards.

Farm Merge Valley is frequently updated, so make sure to come back to check for new items and ways to grow your playing experience.

Tips

Merge five items at a time, whenever possible, instead of three, to increase the experience points you can get after each merge and grow your resources faster.

Growden.io is an .io farming game where you manage a small plot of land, starting off with some carrot seeds and a vision for success! This community-based game is based on progressive management of your farm, so be sure to stay logged in to get the whole experience. Grow a garden from a humble carrot and tomato harvest to a gorgeous, rare plant paradise filled with blossoms, fruits, and exotic crops that showcase your farming mastery!

How to Play Growden.io

Growden is one of those games you start playing on a random evening and find yourself still playing two months later. Its rotating community rooms filled with players from all around the world, constant reward system, and continuous growth cycle make this game very hard to put down.

You start with basic $10 carrot seeds that disappear once you pick them. Then you move on to strawberry seeds for $50. Work your way up to something more uncommon, like blueberry seeds for $100, or rare seeds like tomato seeds for $800. (The rarer, the more expensive!)

How to plant seeds and harvest in Growden:
Buy seeds, then click on them in your inventory to put them in your hands.
Click on the brown plots in your farm to place them wherever you want them to grow.
Wait as your plant begins to grow. (Meet other farmers or shop as you wait!)
Once it’s fully grown, harvest by clicking E and enjoy the rewards!
Sell your plants at the shop when ready.

When you've mastered the basics of farming, you will soon find yourself itching to save for the ultimate seed (cue the music): the moon blossom, which costs tens of millions.

Everyone Wants the Moon Blossom

Before you get to the moon blossom, you’re likely going to encounter any one of these seeds: eggplant, bamboo, pepper, beanstalk, pumpkin, cacao, cauliflower, cactus, watermelon, dragonfruit, mango, coconut, nectarine, pear, avocado, banana, pinklily, pineapple, kiwi, candy blossom, cherry blossom, or sugar apple.

Slow and steady wins the farm race, but once you get a candy blossom or cherry blossom, you’re likely to reach a whole new level of farming where your earnings begin reaching six or seven figures.

The more money you have, the more you can deck out your garden. Buy eggs at the egg shop. Each garden is allowed five pets. Pets help you harvest—not too much, but considering the game allows them to harvest while idle or away, you could find yourself with interesting items in your backpack when you’re back from a break.

Only 100 items fit into your backpack, so after each harvest, be sure to go sell your goods. You can sell one thing, price your items, or sell your entire inventory. It’s always fun to price new, shiny, and one-of-a-kind fruits.

Mutated Plants

Mutations on your plants happen during weather events. Mutated plants are worth more. The types of direct mutations are: Silver, Golden, Rainbow, and BIG mutations (which make your plants HUGE; this is a very rare mutation).

There are currently 5 weather events, with more coming soon: Daytime, Nighttime, Desert, Rain, and Frosty. Grow a Garden is receiving continuous updates, which will unlock new weather events, mutations, seeds, plants, and more.

Gifts in Growden

This is a community-based game. The community is very active and includes a Discord channel. Where there is community, there is sharing. Depending on what room you are in, you can find some very generous players who gift you expensive flowers or fruits.

On the downside, there is also stealing, but this is a bit less common than kindness in these gardens. There is a chat, and if a farmer steals, you will get a notification and can call them out. Usually, a public note will deter further stealing.

Essential Tips to Grow a Garden in Growden.io
Stay logged in so you can keep your progress. If you log out and refresh your browser, you're likely going to lose your garden.
If you ever feel uncomfortable in a room, refresh your page, and it will get you to a new room.
Stay anonymous in the chat and don't give out any personal info.
More Games Like This

If you like Growden, you may want to check out our .io selection of games with classics like Agario, or go for similar graphics in Bloxd.io, or try something different like Skribbl.io.

WASD and arrow keys = move
Space = jump
E = pick up plants or talk to the seed shop/sell area
Hold the right mouse button = move the camera

Yes, Grow a Garden: Growden is free to play, depending on where you play it. CrazyGames features Grow a Garden: Growden for free.

There are several reasons it's hard to put Grow a Garden down. There is a very generous reward system that incentivizes players to keep coming back, and the community in the rooms is constantly rotating, which makes each room a completely new social adventure.

Open House is a puzzle match-3 game where you're unexpectedly tasked with turning an abandoned residence into your dream home via one puzzle at a time. Each puzzle brings about new furnishings and upgrades to keep you hooked. You have options, so redesign rooms with your style choices, swap out furniture, and watch your estate transform from rags to riches.

How to Play Open House

You, Oscar, are fresh off a rough flight, and things couldn’t have started worse. Somewhere during the trip, all your belongings fell out of the plane. You beg Theo, the pilot who took you to this island, to turn back so you can find them, but he refuses, saying he has too many passengers. He takes off without you.

Trying to stay positive, you decide this might be the perfect chance to start over in your new beachside home. After all, it’s only a suitcase… and luckily, you were wearing your favorite shirt during the flight. Time to see your new place.

You greet your neighbor, who’s not exactly welcoming, then head toward your new home only to find it looks nothing like the pictures from the real estate listing. The porch is falling apart, the rooms are wrecked, and it’s clear today is not your day. You can’t help but wonder if you’re on some sort of prank show.

Your first quest is to remove all the covers from the furniture in hopes of finding a hidden camera. To do this, you’ll complete match-3 puzzles that appear on the screen. Each match earns points and helps you move forward.

As you work, you notice the place is so bad that it even has critters running around. It’s time to contact the real estate agency. You're sitting at your computer when the desk collapses. You’ll need to replace both the desk and the chair before you can write to Mr. Fraudley, the man who sold you this disaster of a house. You send him a message explaining the mess, and he blocks you immediately.

Just when you’re feeling hopeless, your neighbor Charles surprises you by finding your missing suitcases, but the purple flower, which means a lot to you, is still missing. He advises you to get a wardrobe to store your clothes. After that, you’ll need a good night’s rest, which means buying a new bed.

Between each home repair or furniture purchase, you’ll play match-3 puzzles to earn what you need. Every successful round brings you closer to fixing up the house.

You keep trying to leave the island, but something always stops you. In the meantime, you keep decorating, cleaning, and repairing. Over time, you might just discover that this wrecked beach house has the potential to become the dream home you never knew you wanted.

More Games Like This

If you like Open House, browse our match-3 games for more fun. There is also plenty of variation in our puzzle category, with games like Word Search and 2048.

Use the left mouse button to play and interact with all the in-game buttons.

You can clean up your dream home gone wrong in Open House by playing match-3 rounds to earn enough to get new home furnishings.

Is Open House a mobile friendly game?

Open House is a mobile-friendly game, so you can decorate and play match-3 puzzles on the go.

8-Ball Billiards is a free online pool game in our sports category, ideal for one or two players. You can play solo against AI or challenge other players in two-player mode. The game is easy for anyone to play, so pick up a cue and line up your first shot.

How to Play 8 Ball Billiards Classic

8 Ball Billiards Classic is much like the classic in-person game: your goal is to pocket all your balls (either solids or stripes) and sink the 8-ball to win. Use your mouse to aim the cue stick and adjust the power of your shot. Click and drag the cue stick back to set your shot’s power, then release it to strike the cue ball. This is a 2-player game, so carefully plan each shot to outmaneuver your opponent and clear the table before they do!

You can use the settings to choose the ability of your AI-controlled opponents and, if you are good at it, you can also remove the visual help that allows you to understand the trajectory of your shots.

Pick a ball

8-Ball Billiards is an intuitive billiards game where you must pot all the striped or spotted balls, depending on the color assigned to you. The balls you’re assigned depend on what ball is potted first, so shoot for the win!

Line up your cue

The controls are easy. Simply click and drag to find the right level of force, then line up the angle with the ball that seems easiest to pot next. Remember that this is pool, so save the 8-ball until you have potted all your balls, otherwise, you will lose!

Outsmart enemies, collect powerful bonuses, and fight to be the last one standing in this fast-paced test of skill and strategy.

How to Play Fortzone Battle Royale

Begin by choosing a male or female character, then personalize your look with a variety of options for legs, body, and hair. Unlock and equip unique skins to prep for the battlefield.

Scavenge the area for weapons, gear, and supplies. You’ll start with a basic pickaxe, but upgrade to ranged and more powerful weapons as soon as possible to protect yourself. Need to move fast? Jump into a vehicle and speed through the terrain, but be prepared: enemy skirmishes can break out at any moment.

Mahjongg Solitaire is an online mahjong puzzle board game that features traditional rules and modern visuals. There are no shuffles, and the game is timed, but the game's pace is relaxed.

How to Play Mahjongg Solitaire

Spot the patterns

Mahjong is a tricky puzzle game. There are so many tiles, many of which look the same but feature slight differences. Along with the need to spot these patterns, you can’t move any pieces with both sides blocked. The left or right side needs to be accessible, at least.

Finding a couple of “free” tiles is the challenge here, with a tile-free being when there are no tiles on top of it. In addition, either its left or right side needs to be open. In this version of Mahjong Solitaire, you can look at the top of your screen to understand how many pairs of tiles are “free” to be matched, plus you can match the special tiles, those with a colored background, anytime.

Use hints when you’re stuck

Mahjongg Solitaire features hints if you get stuck, but unlike some other mahjong games, it does not have a shuffle feature. The games are also timed, meaning there is some urgency to how many tiles you can match.

When the game ends, you’ll get a score for the tiles you matched and a bonus for how far you got in the game before your time ran out.

Tile groups in Mahjongg Solitaire

Mahjongg Solitaire features 144 tiles divided primarily into three suits. The primary suits are:

Dots - feature circles
Bamboo - feature lines
Characters - feature Chinese characters

In Mahjongg Solitaire, you’ll also notice special tiles that can be matched even without the same image. These are highlighted in blue or green.

More Games Like This

Mahjong Solitaire is an excellent choice for both beginners and regular Mahjong enthusiasts. However, there are many other titles in our collection of Mahjong games. Other puzzle games you may like include board games such as 2048, Rummikub, and Ludo.

8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer is a competitive sports pool game that lets you test your skills in exhilarating 2-player matches against friends or go head-to-head with players from around the world. Perfect your game by competing against expert bots to sharpen your strategies and techniques. Whether you’re aiming to outwit a friend or conquer global rivals, every shot counts in your quest to become the ultimate billiards champion.

How to Play 8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer

8 Ball Pool Billiards is just like your classic pool game, where your objective is to pot your balls into the pockets. This game adds a fun twist in that you can play with random players from all around the world, helping you enhance your game to a pro-level with continued practice.

The game begins with a break shot where you hit the cue ball to scatter the other balls. Your objective is to pot the balls into pockets using the cue ball where possible. The first break will tell you whether you are stripes or solids, depending on what ball you get in the pocket first.

In each turn, aim to strike the cue ball to hit your target ball into a pocket. If successful, you continue your turn; otherwise, your opponent takes their turn. The key is to use strategic shots to position the cue ball for the next play and try to control the table by positioning balls to your advantage. The direction of where your ball will land is outlined from the stick to the ball with an arrow, giving you an indication of the target path.

The player who pots all their balls first wins the game.

Choose from numerous game rooms such as a private two-player game between you and your friend, a quick play game where you choose your level and play against the public quickly, or a local play where you may need to wait a bit to be matched with a live partner.

How to Play Space Waves

All 33 levels of Space Waves more or less have the same scope – get to the end of the level without crashing your arrow into a wall, a rotating cog or thorns. Each level has its own degree of difficulty.

If you choose a “green” level, you’ll be met with wider space and angles, making it possible to gain some straight momentum with your arrow. As you choose more difficult levels, you can expect more obstacles, tighter angles and more of them.

Space Waves allows you to choose any level you want to play, so you can start with the most difficult which can quickly give you a sense of the need for quick reaction times.

EvoWars.io is an IO battle game set in a top-down online battle arena. Collect orbs and battle other players to evolve your warrior. Each evolution improves your weapon range but slows your movement. How many will you slay before you fall?

How to Play EvoWars.io

Embark on an epic quest across the digital battlefield, where you’ll collect powerful orbs to evolve your warrior into unstoppable forms. As you slash through enemies with swords, axes, and a brutal arsenal of weapons, each battle pushes you closer to becoming the ultimate warrior. With more than 15 unique character models to unlock, your journey is one of constant evolution and power.

You control a constantly advancing warrior with your mouse, swinging your weapon to defeat enemies and collect XP to evolve into stronger forms with bigger weapons and greater attack range. As you play, you'll unlock more evolutions and customize your warrior with different weapons and gear to eliminate all other fighters on the field while growing stronger.

As you accumulate points, you will be able to upgrade gameplay dynamics. It will take some time to reach your desired destination. It's not the easiest game to master.

The key to this 2D top-down game is winning battles. Each victory allows you to grow stronger, but the battlefield isn’t just about brute strength; you’ll need to define your play style and use every opportunity to outmaneuver your enemies. Whether you’re charging headfirst into combat or taking a more tactical approach, dominance is at your fingertips.

There is a very large online community around EvoWars.io and when playing it you'll face opponents from every part of the world: it is particularly popular in Vietnam, where it is one of the most popular browser games.

Game modes in EwoWars.io
Deatmatch: Free For All, the classic Battle Royale mode where everyone is an enemy
Teams: you are part of one of the two teams, either red or blue, and your objective is to defend the team’s Guardian while defeating enemies and, ultimately, the enemy’s Guardian
Duel: a 1 vs 1 match with a random opponent. You and they both start at a random level. The first to win three duels wins the match
Monster Hunt: a cooperative mode where you and the other players face hordes of AI-controlled monsters
Classic: it’s the old version of EvoWars
Tips
Focus on collecting orbs around the outside of the map when you are at a low level rather than battling against other players.
Your weapon range improves as you grow larger, but you also become slower, so remember to remain cautious and alert.
When you're smaller, you can move faster; use this to your advantage and play more evasively at lower levels
Features
Intense slashing gameplay to eliminate opponents
You can level up to increase the size and evolve to more than 15 character models
Define your play style and use every opportunity as much as possible
Sprint ability at the cost of your experience points

Explore the underwater world and its legendary fish to unlock a variety of unique characters. Your goal is to become the most excellent fisher on the planet. How to Play Fish Orbit

Fish Orbit is a fast-paced fishing game where each cast takes you deeper into the ocean. Drop your line, reel in exotic catches, and unlock new characters as you work toward becoming the ultimate fisher. Every layer of the sea holds surprises, from schools of small fish to rare creatures hidden in the depths.

Your goal is to cast your line as far and deep as possible. Timing is crucial. Tap when the color bar hits green to launch your line at maximum power, yellow for a solid throw, and red for a weak cast. Once your hook is in the water, keep tapping to push it deeper and uncover new species.

Four key stats that influence your fishing include strength, weight, rebound, and resistance. They determine how far your hook travels, how deep it sinks, and how many fish you can bring in with a single cast.

Upgrades drive your progress. Boost strength for longer throws, increase weight for deeper dives, upgrade rebound for better water bounces, and up the resistance to pull in more fish at once. Unlock new zones, collect rare catches, and expand your character roster as you advance.

To accelerate progress, watch ads to earn extra rewards and invest them in upgrades. With patience and careful upgrades, you can steadily work your way to fishing mastery.

Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

How to Play Smash Karts
Battle and earn XP

Face off with other players in the arena for 3 minutes of kart-smashing mayhem. The game features several maps to explore, and it is continually updated with new ones. Each public match you play will give you XP, which you can then use to level up. 

Leveling up will reward you with coins, hats, wheels, and character tokens. You can use character tokens in the prize machine to unlock new characters with varying rarity levels.

Pick up weapons

Drive over the boxes containing question marks to pick up random weapons and power-ups. You’ll find anything from invincibility to missiles, machine guns, and mines to use against your opponents. Get in your kart and cause some chaos!

Available Weapons

Rockets: fairly straightforward, helpful for hitting opponents in front of you.
Machine Gun: it rapidly fires several projectiles and can take down enemies around you, as long as you are close by.
Bullets: with these, you’ll fire a series of bullets that will go straight from your position. It can be useful to fire at enemies in crowded contexts or on long, straight alleys.
Mines: you can deploy three mines that serve as a static trap for your challengers. Mines are particularly effective when placed around corners or hidden behind item boxes.
Cannonballs: using this will send four cannonballs in the direction of your choice. Cannonballs require precision to be effective, but can eliminate multiple adversaries simultaneously.
Spiky-Go-Round: activating the spiky-go-round will add rotating balls with spikes to your vehicle, which will make any contact with opponents lethal for them.
Nuke: a very powerful missile that has a wide impact radius.
Lobgrenuke: with a lobgrenuke you are placing a TNT-like static bomb on the ground. It gets activated when one of your enemies passes nearby or a few seconds after deployment.
Snowball Blaster: fires ice at opponents and blocks them for 3 seconds in a block of ice. Touching this block while active will eliminate the kart containing it.
Invincibility: the most powerful of all weapons, allows you to neutralize any shot aimed at you and, at the same time, to take down any kart by simply touching it.
Customize your kart!

Choose between a selection of wacky little characters and karts. You can customize your kart and characters in the customize menu. There, you’ll find a selection of karts, characters, hats, and holiday items! Use your coins, character tokens, and gems to buy various in-game items.

Play in events

Various seasonal events occur throughout the year, so make sure to come back and play Smash Karts at special times of year for new content. New maps are available around Halloween, Christmas, and other festive occasions, and you can reap unique rewards.

FrontWars.io is a multiplayer .io battle game where players battle it out to dominate as much of the globe as possible. You begin small and slowly work your way to conquer the world. Take control of 72% of the map, and victory is yours.

How to Play Front Wars

Front Wars is a real-time strategy game where you go to war with other players in an attempt to expand your territory and protect your people. The game panels are pretty intricate and give you a lot of info to keep track of attacks and alliances. Use these wisely to plan your next moves.

The Event Panel shows everything happening in the game. You’ll see alliance requests, incoming attacks, and Quick Chat messages. You can focus on a player sending an alliance request, track incoming attacks, and retreat troops if needed, though this costs 25 percent of your attacking troops. Boats can return to their starting point if the land has changed hands, but nukes cannot be recalled. Quick Chat makes it easy to send preset messages or emojis to allies and opponents.

Alliances are important. You can send or receive troops and gold to help your allies, whether they are under attack or building up their strength. Betraying an ally ends the alliance, pauses trade for a few minutes, and leaves you with weaker defenses. You’ll also be marked as a traitor for 30 seconds, so think carefully before making a move. Bots and human players react differently depending on your actions, so diplomacy matters.

The Radial Menu is your main control hub. Right-click a location to build, attack, send boats, request alliances, or betray an ally. The Options Panel lets you pause or unpause the game, check the timer, access settings, and see detailed information about other players. Hover over a country to see if it’s a human, a smart AI, or a bot, and find out how they feel about you.

The Game UI helps you track your progress. The leaderboard shows top players by land, troops, and gold, while the control panel lets you adjust your attack ratios. Icons tell you who is an ally, a traitor, or has stopped trading, which helps with planning your next move.

Buildings and Units in Front Wars
City: Increases population and lets you expand your territory
Defense Post: Protects borders, slows enemy attacks, and increases enemy losses
Port: Lets you build Warships and trade with other ports, either automatically or manually
Warship: Patrols water, intercepts enemy trade ships, and attacks enemy vessels
Missile Silo: Launches atomic, hydrogen, or MIRV bombs
SAM Launcher: Intercepts enemy missiles with different success depending on the type of bomb

Bombs have different effects. Atom Bombs cause localized destruction, Hydrogen Bombs hit larger areas, and MIRVs split to hit multiple points, affecting only the player you targeted.

Interacting with other players is simple:

Chat messages and emojis let you communicate quickly
Target markers help coordinate attacks with allies
Alliance requests grow your network of support

Tips

Always try to help allies with troops or gold to strengthen relationships. Focusing on building relationships in Front Wars is key to winning.

More Games Like This

Check out our .io category for more battle games like this one. Try 1v1 LOL, Diep.io, or Smash Karts, and continue the fun!

Shift + Mouse Wheel Up/Down = decrease/increase attack ratio
\ + R = reset graphics
Middle Mouse Button → Auto-upgrade nearest building

Do military games still exist?

Military games sure do exist. Front Wars is a classic battle io game, ideal for strategy seekers.

Can I play Front Wars on my phone?

Front Wars is available on mobile, as well as desktop and Steam.

How to Play Fragen

In Fragen, you take on the role of a soldier in full combat gear, ready to fight your way through an abandoned complex filled with enemies. As you roam, you’ll face shooters everywhere, so stay alert. Switch between close-range and long-range guns depending on your position, and always keep an eye both ahead and over your shoulder.

The game features a battle pass where you can earn skins, gear upgrades, and exclusive rewards. Weapon customization lets you fine-tune rifles, shotguns, snipers, and more to fit your style.

Chess Free is an online puzzle chess game where you can compete against players worldwide in exciting one-on-one matches. Challenge yourself by outsmarting opponents of various skill levels to strengthen yours. If you prefer to play solo, level up your abilities against the computer, choosing from a range of difficulty settings—from beginner to World Champion. Whether you're just learning the game or aiming for grandmaster status, interactive hints help refine your moves to get you there.

How to Play Chess Free

Chess Free follows the classic rules of chess. The objective is to checkmate your opponent's king, meaning it is in a position to be captured and cannot escape.

You can play against the computer, compete online with real players, or share the same screen with a friend. With 18 difficulty levels ranging from Beginner to World Champion, you can play based on your level.

Depending on your level, you can choose a "handicap," so you have a bit of an advantage. You can also enable hints and interactive tips to help guide you throughout.

The rules are basic—players take turns moving their pieces. Pawns move forward but capture diagonally, knights move in an L-shape, and other pieces have unique movement patterns. Strategy is key in chess. Protect your pieces, control the center of the board, and anticipate your opponent's moves. The game ends when one player's king is checkmated, resulting in a win or if a draw occurs under certain conditions.

In chess, a draw is a result where neither player wins, and the game ends in a tie. This can happen for several reasons, such as stalemate (where a player has no legal moves but is not in check), repetition of the same position three times, 50 moves without a capture or pawn move, insufficient material to checkmate, or mutual agreement between the players.

Made a mistake?

No problem—use the move cancel feature to undo and rethink your strategy. After each match, detailed analysis highlights errors and suggests better moves, while the option to replay specific moments helps reinforce learning.

You can save your rating and pick different time control modes like bullet, blitz, and rapid. Customize the board and pieces to your liking, review your move history, and even express yourself with playful cartoon emotions as you interact with your opponent.

Special Chess Moves to Know

Castling

Castling is a special chess move involving the king and a rook. It’s only allowed if neither the king nor the rook have moved previously, and there are no pieces between them. Additionally, the king cannot be in check, and it must not move through or land on any square that is under attack. This move helps protect the king and connect the rooks for better defense.

Taking the pass

Taking the pass, or en passant, is a special pawn capture in chess. If your opponent moves a pawn two squares forward and lands next to your pawn, you can capture it on your next move as if it had only moved one square. Your pawn will take its place, but this capture must be done immediately.

Designville: Merge & Design is a casual game that takes you on a creative adventure to renovate and decorate various spaces. Tackle unique design challenges, craft stunning interiors, and turn your studio into the best in town. Unleash your creativity to bring your dream designs to life and grow your decorating empire!

How to Play Designville: Merge & Design

The objective of the game is to renovate the run-down home. Louise and Robin are renovating an abandoned house to transform it into a Design Studio, the best of Designville! After a brief intro of characters, you will be introduced to a board with multiple items. Most of which are cardboard boxes from the renovation. You'll open the boxes of stuff that Robin acquired for the renovation, and the items will be placed on the board.

Renovations are accomplished by merging items, designing, and decorating gardens. The grid is primarily filled with boxes, but other tiles are filled with random objects commonly found in a home, including coffee cups, pizza slices, rubber gloves, and more. Most of these items are covered in dust and cobwebs, and some can only be accessed on other levels.

Merging items and discovering new ones will earn you money that can be used to enable the renovation, clearing tasks from a to-do list which will eventually lead you to the renovated Design Studio. Once the Studio is up and running, Louise and Robin will start taking orders from clients, initially friends and acquaintances, and later referrals, and they will allow the Studio to expand its reputation and complete more complex tasks.

There is one object on the grid that is most important to begin merging: a yellow bag full of corkboard push pins. Left-click on the yellow bag to fill all empty board pieces with push pins. This is where you merge. Begin merging all push pins. It takes two push pins to create another object, an eraser. As you merge, you will get more free board space, so keep clicking and merging.

Potential merges and results:

2 corkboard push pins = 1 eraser
2 erasers = 1 Post-it note
2 post its = 1 ruler
2 rulers = 1 round ruler
2 protractors = 1 pencil
2 pencils = 1 highlighter
2 highlighters = 1 drawing compass
2 drawing compasses = 1 stapler
2 staplers = 1 color sample

Keep merging and find more and more new items.

More Games Like This

If you're a fan of merge games, Little Alchemy is a fantastic choice, where you get to merge Earth’s four basic elements to form new discoveries.

Browse our casual games category for more popular titles like Geometry Dash, which offers a fun experience of moving following the music, or Idle Breakout, where you'll observe how your balls clear the stage.

Ludo King™ is a classic board game also known as Pachisi or Parcheesi. The objective of the game is to bring all of your four colored tokens to the designated home column.

How to Play Ludo King™

You can start an online game or play against the computer, with just one additional player or play against three opponents in a 4 player challenge.

Choose your color and then start the game. Each player will take turns to roll the dice.

Ludo Rules
roll a 6 to take your tokens out of the base onto the starting square. You must bring all the tokens out and move them towards home strategically.
when you roll a 6 you have the right to roll the dice again. If you get a 6 three times in a row you'll forfeit your turn.
rolling less than 6 means that your turn is over after your move.
if your token lands on a square that holds an opponent's token, their token is forced back to the base and you gain the right to roll the dice again.
squares with a star are safe landings: tokens on star-squares cannot be sent back to the base. There are 4 squares with a star on this board.
when the same player has two tokens on the same square, those form a block, that other players cannot pass.
you need to get all four tokens to the home triangle to win the game. Tokens can only enter the triangle on exact dice rolls.
History and features of Ludo King™

Being one of the top games played worldwide, Ludo King™ has been rated as the best casual game in the board games genre. Ludo King™ is a cross-platform multiplayer game available on Desktop Android, iOS, and HTML5. The modes available are Online Multiplayer and Computer Mode.

Ludo King™ is the digital version of the classical royal game Pachisi. It was played as an indoor game in the courts of Indian Kings. Play the age-old board game with great design and features!

Ludo King™ follows the same rules as the traditional Ludo game. The dice numbers and strategy have equal importance and winning depends upon smart moves of the tokens you make while moving towards home. Save your tokens from getting captured and race ahead of all opponents to become the Ludo King!

Ludo Around the World

Ludo has different names in different regions and countries like Fia, Fia-spel (Fia the game), Le Jeu de Dada (The Game of Dada), Non t'arrabbiare, Fia med knuff (Fia with push), Cờ cá ngựa, Uckers, Griniaris, Petits Chevaux (Little Horses), Ki nevet a végén, برسي (Barjis/Barjees). People also misspell Ludo as Loodo, Chakka, Lido, Lado, Ledo, Leedo, Laado, or Lodo.

Similar Games

Visit our board games section to play more online board games.

You’ll find more family favorites like Word Search and 2048.

Features

Play with the Computer bot in computer mode
Enjoy preset chat while playing online
Express yourself by sending funny emojis to your opponents

Ludo King is the perfect time-pass game to unwind!

Deadly Descent is an exciting driving simulator game where you will need to speed your way through impossible-looking obstacles! They are difficult, but not impossible. Your goal is to reach the finish line, whether you can get through dangerous obstacles or not-so-dangerous ones. Any collision will likely destroy your car. Precision is key to survival, making this game ideal for anyone seeking a thrill.

How to Play Deadly Descent

Prepare for the most intense, destructive races of your life in Deadly Descent.

You will be on a dirt road track or similar landscapes with nothing but speed in your control.

Most of the races will leave your car completely destroyed, smashed, flipped, torn apart, catapulted off the edge, or worse. But the key is to get there first. Yes, it may sound odd, but your goal is to be the fastest in the race and survive as best you can with a banged-up car rather than suffer a fatal off-road accident.

Keep your speed steady. Going fast will help you reach the finish line quickly, but it can also generate the force to destroy your car if you lose control.

Give yourself enough time to brake and navigate obstacles such as smashing levers, spiked rolling crushers, sporadic crates, and more. If your car flips, you can survive if it gets banged up, no problem. But if it hits any of these objects at full force, you are likely not going to make it out of the round in one piece.

Each round offers new obstacles to overcome, challenging your reflexes and strategy as you push your car to the limit.

Features
Destructible vehicles
Refined physics and detailed graphics
Unique tracks and endless challenges
The experience is highly realistic while remaining optimized to run smoothly on both phones and computers.

Steal Brainrot Online is a fast-paced, casual heist game where you collect rare Brainrot memes like Tralalero Tralala and Cappuccino Assassino, straight from the popular Italian Brainrot Clicker Game. You can buy Braintorts from the red carpet, sneak into other players’ bases to steal theirs, and protect your own with traps and locks. Use boosters, outbid opponents during deliveries, and rebirth for bigger rewards as you climb the leaderboard.

How to Play Steal Brainrot Online

At its core, Steal Brainrot Online is a game about building wealth and stealing it right back from other players from around the world, all of whom have the very same objective: to accumulate as many Brainrots as possible.

The way to collect Brainrots is to, well, steal them. If you want to keep it honest, you do have the option of buying Brainrots, but you will need money.

You start off with a little bit of money, and from there you can either purchase a Brainrot from the endless conveyor of marching meme prisoners, or skip straight to the chaos by raiding someone else’s base and snatching one for “free".

Once you steal a Brainrot, take it back to your base and place it proudly on a pillar, so that it slowly generates income as you will for more Brainrots. The more you collect, the faster your fortune grows. But if you do increase your collection, know that with wealth comes a large target on your back.

Just like you can steal from other people’s bases, other players can peek inside your base and see exactly what you’ve got, which makes your defenses, like locks and temporary shields, your only real line of survival. Shields only last sixty seconds before burning out, so every moment of safety feels fleeting.

Stealing is both tempting and dangerous. To take someone else’s Brainrot, you need to slip into their unlocked base, carry the prize on your back, and haul it to your own collection. But the act of stealing slows you down, strips away your item use, and instantly alerts the owner. You can be sure the owner of the Brainrot you’ve snatched will come after you, knock you on the head with a hammer, and you will fall to the ground, and lose the Brainrot.

If you get the alert, be sure to chase down the thief and use your own hammer.

Your progress only comes from balancing greed and caution. With enough Brainrots, money flows faster, letting you reinvest in more purchases, stronger defenses, and eventually rebirths that carry long-term rewards. But no matter how high you climb, the tension never fades because the server is full of players waiting for their chance to rob you blind.

This isn’t a cozy tycoon. It’s a social standoff disguised as a collection game, where half the fun is in the uneasy silence of players standing outside your cage, watching, and deciding whether to make their move.

Tip

If you get caught stealing in someone else’s base, use your home button (G on the keyboard) to transport you back home. And no, you can’t take the Brainrot with you this way.

This is an alternative version of the game by the name "Steal a Brainrot," which is on Roblox.

Growden.io is an .io farming game where you manage a small plot of land, starting off with some carrot seeds and a vision for success! This community-based game is based on progressive management of your farm, so be sure to stay logged in to get the whole experience. Grow a garden from a humble carrot and tomato harvest to a gorgeous, rare plant paradise filled with blossoms, fruits, and exotic crops that showcase your farming mastery!

How to Play Growden.io

Growden is one of those games you start playing on a random evening and find yourself still playing two months later. Its rotating community rooms filled with players from all around the world, constant reward system, and continuous growth cycle make this game very hard to put down.

You start with basic $10 carrot seeds that disappear once you pick them. Then you move on to strawberry seeds for $50. Work your way up to something more uncommon, like blueberry seeds for $100, or rare seeds like tomato seeds for $800. (The rarer, the more expensive!)

How to plant seeds and harvest in Growden:
Buy seeds, then click on them in your inventory to put them in your hands.
Click on the brown plots in your farm to place them wherever you want them to grow.
Wait as your plant begins to grow. (Meet other farmers or shop as you wait!)
Once it’s fully grown, harvest by clicking E and enjoy the rewards!
Sell your plants at the shop when ready.

When you've mastered the basics of farming, you will soon find yourself itching to save for the ultimate seed (cue the music): the moon blossom, which costs tens of millions.

Everyone Wants the Moon Blossom

Before you get to the moon blossom, you’re likely going to encounter any one of these seeds: eggplant, bamboo, pepper, beanstalk, pumpkin, cacao, cauliflower, cactus, watermelon, dragonfruit, mango, coconut, nectarine, pear, avocado, banana, pinklily, pineapple, kiwi, candy blossom, cherry blossom, or sugar apple.

Slow and steady wins the farm race, but once you get a candy blossom or cherry blossom, you’re likely to reach a whole new level of farming where your earnings begin reaching six or seven figures.

The more money you have, the more you can deck out your garden. Buy eggs at the egg shop. Each garden is allowed five pets. Pets help you harvest—not too much, but considering the game allows them to harvest while idle or away, you could find yourself with interesting items in your backpack when you’re back from a break.

Only 100 items fit into your backpack, so after each harvest, be sure to go sell your goods. You can sell one thing, price your items, or sell your entire inventory. It’s always fun to price new, shiny, and one-of-a-kind fruits.

Mutated Plants

Mutations on your plants happen during weather events. Mutated plants are worth more. The types of direct mutations are: Silver, Golden, Rainbow, and BIG mutations (which make your plants HUGE; this is a very rare mutation).

There are currently 5 weather events, with more coming soon: Daytime, Nighttime, Desert, Rain, and Frosty. Grow a Garden is receiving continuous updates, which will unlock new weather events, mutations, seeds, plants, and more.

Gifts in Growden

This is a community-based game. The community is very active and includes a Discord channel. Where there is community, there is sharing. Depending on what room you are in, you can find some very generous players who gift you expensive flowers or fruits.

On the downside, there is also stealing, but this is a bit less common than kindness in these gardens. There is a chat, and if a farmer steals, you will get a notification and can call them out. Usually, a public note will deter further stealing.

Essential Tips to Grow a Garden in Growden.io
Stay logged in so you can keep your progress. If you log out and refresh your browser, you're likely going to lose your garden.
If you ever feel uncomfortable in a room, refresh your page, and it will get you to a new room.
Stay anonymous in the chat and don't give out any personal info.
More Games Like This

If you like Growden, you may want to check out our .io selection of games with classics like Agario, or go for similar graphics in Bloxd.io, or try something different like Skribbl.io.

Controls
WASD and arrow keys = move
Space = jump
E = pick up plants or talk to the seed shop/sell area
Hold the right mouse button = move the camera
FAQ
Is Grow a Garden on CrazyGames?

Growden: Grow a Garden is on CrazyGames and can be played for free on desktop or mobile.

Is Grow a Garden free to play?

Yes, Grow a Garden: Growden is free to play, depending on where you play it. CrazyGames features Grow a Garden: Growden for free.

Why is Grow a Garden so addictive?

There are several reasons it's hard to put Grow a Garden down. There is a very generous reward system that incentivizes players to keep coming back, and the community in the rooms is constantly rotating, which makes each room a completely new social adventure.

Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

How to Play Smash Karts
Battle and earn XP

Face off with other players in the arena for 3 minutes of kart-smashing mayhem. The game features several maps to explore, and it is continually updated with new ones. Each public match you play will give you XP, which you can then use to level up. 

Leveling up will reward you with coins, hats, wheels, and character tokens. You can use character tokens in the prize machine to unlock new characters with varying rarity levels.

Pick up weapons

Drive over the boxes containing question marks to pick up random weapons and power-ups. You’ll find anything from invincibility to missiles, machine guns, and mines to use against your opponents. Get in your kart and cause some chaos!

Available Weapons

Rockets: fairly straightforward, helpful for hitting opponents in front of you.
Machine Gun: it rapidly fires several projectiles and can take down enemies around you, as long as you are close by.
Bullets: with these, you’ll fire a series of bullets that will go straight from your position. It can be useful to fire at enemies in crowded contexts or on long, straight alleys.
Mines: you can deploy three mines that serve as a static trap for your challengers. Mines are particularly effective when placed around corners or hidden behind item boxes.
Cannonballs: using this will send four cannonballs in the direction of your choice. Cannonballs require precision to be effective, but can eliminate multiple adversaries simultaneously.
Spiky-Go-Round: activating the spiky-go-round will add rotating balls with spikes to your vehicle, which will make any contact with opponents lethal for them.
Nuke: a very powerful missile that has a wide impact radius.
Lobgrenuke: with a lobgrenuke you are placing a TNT-like static bomb on the ground. It gets activated when one of your enemies passes nearby or a few seconds after deployment.
Snowball Blaster: fires ice at opponents and blocks them for 3 seconds in a block of ice. Touching this block while active will eliminate the kart containing it.
Invincibility: the most powerful of all weapons, allows you to neutralize any shot aimed at you and, at the same time, to take down any kart by simply touching it.
Customize your kart!

Choose between a selection of wacky little characters and karts. You can customize your kart and characters in the customize menu. There, you’ll find a selection of karts, characters, hats, and holiday items! Use your coins, character tokens, and gems to buy various in-game items.

Play in events

Various seasonal events occur throughout the year, so make sure to come back and play Smash Karts at special times of year for new content. New maps are available around Halloween, Christmas, and other festive occasions, and you can reap unique rewards.

More Games Like This

Kart games like SmashKarts.io combine two awesome game modes: deathmatch arena and kart driving.

Agar.io is another popular game that challenges players to compete against online opponents in multiplayer mode. For easier driving options, you can try playing Eggy Car or Snow Rider.

Fortzone Battle Royale is a high-stakes survival shooter where you face off against rivals in a massive, scenic battleground. Explore forests, cross rivers, and scavenge for resources as the action ramps up quickly. Outsmart enemies, collect powerful bonuses, and fight to be the last one standing in this fast-paced test of skill and strategy.

How to Play Fortzone Battle Royale

Begin by choosing a male or female character, then personalize your look with a variety of options for legs, body, and hair. Unlock and equip unique skins to prep for the battlefield.

There are several game modes to choose from, which include:

Single Battle Royale: Available from the start
Team Battle Royale: Unlocks at Level 4
Royale Duel: Unlocks at Level 6
Random Mode: Jump into any unlocked mode

Your match begins midair, launched from a flying bus. Choose your landing spot wisely, whether it’s flatland, thick bushes, or water you’ll have to wade through. The storm is closing in fast, so move quickly, gather resources, and head for shelter. Elevated structures on stilts often contain valuable rewards, so scour them.

Scavenge the area for weapons, gear, and supplies. You’ll start with a basic pickaxe, but upgrade to ranged and more powerful weapons as soon as possible to protect yourself. Use the destructible environment to your advantage—build fortifications for cover or smash through obstacles to escape danger.

Need to move fast? Jump into a vehicle and speed through the terrain, but be prepared: enemy skirmishes can break out at any moment.

Complete missions, survive longer, and eliminate opponents to rise through the levels. Play solo or squad up with friends, your approach is your own.

Are you ready to earn your spot among the top fighters? Drop in, gear up, and prove you're the last one standing in Fortzone Battle Royale!

More Games Like This

If you want to continue battling, browse our action category for more thrilling challenges. Forge swords for fearless fighters in Jacksmith. Cuphead is a fast-paced run-and-gun game with 1930s cartoon-style animation. Ducklife, begins with one duckling and a mission to rebuild your storm-hit farm.

8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer is a competitive sports pool game that lets you test your skills in exhilarating 2-player matches against friends or go head-to-head with players from around the world. Perfect your game by competing against expert bots to sharpen your strategies and techniques. Whether you’re aiming to outwit a friend or conquer global rivals, every shot counts in your quest to become the ultimate billiards champion.

How to Play 8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer

8 Ball Pool Billiards is just like your classic pool game, where your objective is to pot your balls into the pockets. This game adds a fun twist in that you can play with random players from all around the world, helping you enhance your game to a pro-level with continued practice.

The game begins with a break shot where you hit the cue ball to scatter the other balls. Your objective is to pot the balls into pockets using the cue ball where possible. The first break will tell you whether you are stripes or solids, depending on what ball you get in the pocket first.

In each turn, aim to strike the cue ball to hit your target ball into a pocket. If successful, you continue your turn; otherwise, your opponent takes their turn. The key is to use strategic shots to position the cue ball for the next play and try to control the table by positioning balls to your advantage. The direction of where your ball will land is outlined from the stick to the ball with an arrow, giving you an indication of the target path.

The player who pots all their balls first wins the game.

Choose from numerous game rooms such as a private two-player game between you and your friend, a quick play game where you choose your level and play against the public quickly, or a local play where you may need to wait a bit to be matched with a live partner.

FrontWars.io is a multiplayer .io battle game where players battle it out to dominate as much of the globe as possible. You begin small and slowly work your way to conquer the world. Take control of 72% of the map, and victory is yours.

How to Play Front Wars

Front Wars is a real-time strategy game where you go to war with other players in an attempt to expand your territory and protect your people. The game panels are pretty intricate and give you a lot of info to keep track of attacks and alliances. Use these wisely to plan your next moves.

The Event Panel shows everything happening in the game. You’ll see alliance requests, incoming attacks, and Quick Chat messages. You can focus on a player sending an alliance request, track incoming attacks, and retreat troops if needed, though this costs 25 percent of your attacking troops. Boats can return to their starting point if the land has changed hands, but nukes cannot be recalled. Quick Chat makes it easy to send preset messages or emojis to allies and opponents.

Alliances are important. You can send or receive troops and gold to help your allies, whether they are under attack or building up their strength. Betraying an ally ends the alliance, pauses trade for a few minutes, and leaves you with weaker defenses. You’ll also be marked as a traitor for 30 seconds, so think carefully before making a move. Bots and human players react differently depending on your actions, so diplomacy matters.

The Radial Menu is your main control hub. Right-click a location to build, attack, send boats, request alliances, or betray an ally. The Options Panel lets you pause or unpause the game, check the timer, access settings, and see detailed information about other players. Hover over a country to see if it’s a human, a smart AI, or a bot, and find out how they feel about you.

The Game UI helps you track your progress. The leaderboard shows top players by land, troops, and gold, while the control panel lets you adjust your attack ratios. Icons tell you who is an ally, a traitor, or has stopped trading, which helps with planning your next move.

Buildings and Units in Front Wars
City: Increases population and lets you expand your territory
Defense Post: Protects borders, slows enemy attacks, and increases enemy losses
Port: Lets you build Warships and trade with other ports, either automatically or manually
Warship: Patrols water, intercepts enemy trade ships, and attacks enemy vessels
Missile Silo: Launches atomic, hydrogen, or MIRV bombs
SAM Launcher: Intercepts enemy missiles with different success depending on the type of bomb

Bombs have different effects. Atom Bombs cause localized destruction, Hydrogen Bombs hit larger areas, and MIRVs split to hit multiple points, affecting only the player you targeted.

Interacting with other players is simple:

Chat messages and emojis let you communicate quickly
Target markers help coordinate attacks with allies
Alliance requests grow your network of support

Tips

Always try to help allies with troops or gold to strengthen relationships. Focusing on building relationships in Front Wars is key to winning.

More Games Like This

Check out our .io category for more battle games like this one. Try 1v1 LOL, Diep.io, or Smash Karts, and continue the fun!

Controls
Space = alternate view (terrain/countries)
Shift + Left Mouse Button = attack (when left click is set to open menu)
Cmd + Left Mouse Button = open build menu
\ + Left Mouse Button = open emote menu
C = Center camera on player
Q / E = Zoom in/out
WASD = move camera
1 / 2 = decrease/increase attack ratio
Shift + Mouse Wheel Up/Down = decrease/increase attack ratio
\ + R = reset graphics
Middle Mouse Button → Auto-upgrade nearest building
FAQ
Do military games still exist?

Military games sure do exist. Front Wars is a classic battle io game, ideal for strategy seekers.

Can I play Front Wars on my phone?

Front Wars is available on mobile, as well as desktop and Steam.

Chess Free is an online puzzle chess game where you can compete against players worldwide in exciting one-on-one matches. Challenge yourself by outsmarting opponents of various skill levels to strengthen yours. If you prefer to play solo, level up your abilities against the computer, choosing from a range of difficulty settings—from beginner to World Champion. Whether you're just learning the game or aiming for grandmaster status, interactive hints help refine your moves to get you there.

How to Play Chess Free

Chess Free follows the classic rules of chess. The objective is to checkmate your opponent's king, meaning it is in a position to be captured and cannot escape.

You can play against the computer, compete online with real players, or share the same screen with a friend. With 18 difficulty levels ranging from Beginner to World Champion, you can play based on your level.

Depending on your level, you can choose a "handicap," so you have a bit of an advantage. You can also enable hints and interactive tips to help guide you throughout.

The rules are basic—players take turns moving their pieces. Pawns move forward but capture diagonally, knights move in an L-shape, and other pieces have unique movement patterns. Strategy is key in chess. Protect your pieces, control the center of the board, and anticipate your opponent's moves. The game ends when one player's king is checkmated, resulting in a win or if a draw occurs under certain conditions.

In chess, a draw is a result where neither player wins, and the game ends in a tie. This can happen for several reasons, such as stalemate (where a player has no legal moves but is not in check), repetition of the same position three times, 50 moves without a capture or pawn move, insufficient material to checkmate, or mutual agreement between the players.

Made a mistake?

No problem—use the move cancel feature to undo and rethink your strategy. After each match, detailed analysis highlights errors and suggests better moves, while the option to replay specific moments helps reinforce learning.

You can save your rating and pick different time control modes like bullet, blitz, and rapid. Customize the board and pieces to your liking, review your move history, and even express yourself with playful cartoon emotions as you interact with your opponent.

Special Chess Moves to Know

Castling

Castling is a special chess move involving the king and a rook. It’s only allowed if neither the king nor the rook have moved previously, and there are no pieces between them. Additionally, the king cannot be in check, and it must not move through or land on any square that is under attack. This move helps protect the king and connect the rooks for better defense.

Taking the pass

Taking the pass, or en passant, is a special pawn capture in chess. If your opponent moves a pawn two squares forward and lands next to your pawn, you can capture it on your next move as if it had only moved one square. Your pawn will take its place, but this capture must be done immediately.

Bloxorz is a tricky puzzle game that tests your logical skills and sheer brain power. The objective is to get the block into the square hole and avoid falling off the edge. Put your brain to the test and see how far you get!

How to Play Bloxorz

Use your arrow keys to move the block correctly through the level and into the hole. The goal sounds simple, but Bloxorz is a challenging brain game that gets trickier and more mind-boggling as you progress. There are 33 levels in total.

As the levels get tougher, new pieces of the puzzle are added to increase the difficulty. There are switches, special tiles, multiple blocks and various ways in which they are used to add complexity to the puzzle.

What are the Different Switches and Tiles?

There are 3 types of switch in Bloxorz. You have the circle switch that works when you land on it in any fashion, this is also referred to as a “soft” switch. X-shaped switches require you to land upright to activate. The third switch type looks like parentheses () and teleports your block to different locations, splitting it into two smaller blocks in the process.

There are also orange tiles which are more fragile than regular tiles. These will fall through if you try to stand up vertically on them.

Want Another Logic Challenge?

As well as being a tricky brain game, Bloxorz is an old-school classic from the Flash gaming era, lovingly restored through Ruffle emulation. If you’re looking for a new challenge, check out Cups - Water Sort Puzzle and Math Push.

Bloxorz Tips
There is a passcode in the top right on each level. You can use it to get back to that level.
Small blocks only work on the circle switch, and aren’t heavy enough to activate other switches.
Switches are used to complete a variety of actions, so make sure to observe carefully.
If you want the solution to each level, you can find it in the video on this page!
Developer

Bloxorz is created by Damien Clarke from DX Interactive.

Arrow keys to move the block.
