Hexa Sort is an addictive puzzle-sorting game that combines strategic matching and merging challenges. In this brain teaser, you will get to shuffle, stack, and strategize to create satisfying color matches. Featuring sleek 3D graphics, a dazzling array of vibrant hues, and soothing gameplay, this addictive challenge strikes the perfect balance between excitement and relaxation. Whether you’re seeking a mental workout or a calming escape, Hexa Sort delivers an experience that’s as rewarding as it is visually stunning.

How to Play Hexa Sort

Hexa Sort is a captivating and brain-teasing puzzle game that combines strategy with vibrant design. Your mission is to arrange hexagons on a 19-space board by matching their bold primary colors—blue, red, yellow, green, and more. To clear the board, you must place hexagons of the same color close together. Once aligned and unobstructed, they stack automatically with satisfying ASMR-inspired sound effects, but there’s a catch—they must match exactly. The smooth 3D graphics and vibrant palette make every move visually appealing, creating a relaxing yet immersive gameplay experience.

The real challenge lies in the hexagons’ multiple-layered colors, which add a clever layer of complexity. To reveal and match the colors underneath, you must first stack the top layers. This means strategic placement is key; you’ll need to position hexagons near similar colors to ensure cascading matches when the top layers are cleared. It’s a puzzle that requires both foresight and precision and as the stacks build up, so does the satisfaction of mastering each move.

To keep things engaging, Hexa Sort includes exciting power-ups and boosters, giving you the tools to overcome even the trickiest situations. Whether you’re a casual player or a puzzle enthusiast, the game’s combination of vibrant visuals, smooth mechanics, and rewarding challenges makes it as relaxing as it is addictive. Dive into Hexa Sort and discover a colorful world where strategy meets satisfaction!

Solve intricate challenges by deciphering clues hidden within the mirrors, and testing your wits and perception. Every step unveils secrets and unexpected twists as you race against time to unlock the path to freedom. Will you outsmart the reflections?

How to Play Mirror Escape Room

Step into a room filled with mirrors and intricate puzzles, where every reflection holds a clue. Your goal is to decipher the hidden patterns, align the mirrors correctly, and unlock the path to escape.

This first-person pov game will have you nudging at door knobs and circling the room looking for the next clue.

Start by analyzing the mirror with digit tiles: observe how numbers reflect and use them to crack the passcode. As you progress, you'll encounter color-coded symbols, stepping platforms, and a locked drawer requiring precise rotations. Each puzzle builds upon the last, challenging you to interpret mirrored hints, decipher sequences, and manipulate objects strategically.

Use collected mirrors to reveal new clues, unlock compartments, and align reflections. Rotate objects according to their mirrored angles, match colors based on their reflections, and follow step-by-step sequences to activate hidden mechanisms. Keep an eye on details like the positioning of arrows, reflections of letters, and the direction of laser beams bouncing off mirrors.

With each successful puzzle solved, you'll gather keys, tools, and hints leading you closer to the final escape. Precision, observation, and logical thinking will guide you through this mind-bending mirrored maze.

English Checkers Free is a classic strategy game where you can challenge a powerful engine or play online with real opponents. With levels ranging from beginner to World Champion, you'll find the perfect match for your skills. Enjoy interactive hints, undo moves, and even play with a friend on the same screen. Customize your game and improve with every move.

How to Play English Checkers Free

In this game, you have several options: you can play with the computer, play online, play with friends, or play together. The mandatory rules are simple but important. You must jump over your opponent’s checker to capture it. A simple checker moves diagonally forward by one square and can only move forward. If there’s an empty square behind your opponent’s checker, you can jump over it and land there. If you have multiple capturing opportunities, you can choose which one to take. You continue jumping until no more captures are possible.

If your checker reaches the last row, it is crowned and becomes a king. A king can move diagonally both forward and backward. When jumping, the king can capture multiple opponent’s pieces and must continue capturing as long as possible. The player must jump whenever possible, and if there are several jumping options, they can pick any of them.

You can choose your opponent and enable hints or apply a handicap, such as making captures mandatory. You can also select your side (black or white) before starting the game. There are eight difficulty levels, ranging from Beginner to World Champion, and interactive tips are provided to help you improve your gameplay. You can cancel a move and go back if needed, replay the game from any point, and interact with your opponent through funny cartoon emotions. The game can be played with real live players, and you can choose between different time control modes like unlimited, bullet, blitz, rapid, or classic.

In terms of gameplay, when a checker reaches the last row, it is crowned and can move both forward and backward. If your checker is next to your opponent’s checker and there’s an open square behind it, you must jump and capture the checker. If one jump leads to another, you continue with the next jump as part of the same turn. If your checker reaches the last row and is crowned, you cannot make further jumps during that turn. Jumping is mandatory, and if you have more than one option, you can choose which one to take. Regular checkers can only capture forward, while kings can capture both forward and backward.

You win the game by capturing all of your opponent’s checkers or by blocking your opponent completely so they cannot move.

Rules of the game:
When a checker reaches the last row of the board, he is “kinged” or “crowned” and becomes a king. A king moves the same way as a regular checker, except he can move forward or backward.
On your turn, if your checker is next to your opponent’s checker, and the black square behind your opponent’s checker is open, you must jump over it and capture it. If one jump leads to another jump, you then continue with the next jump as part of the same turn. Continue in this way until all possible jumps are complete. If your checker jumps to the last row and is crowned, you may not make any further jumps, your turn is over.
Jumping is compulsory. If you have the opportunity to jump and capture an opponent’s checker, you must take it. If you have more than one capturing opportunity, you may choose whichever you prefer.
An ordinary checker can capture only forward. King checkers can capture both forward and backward.
A player wins the game when they capture all of their opponent’s checkers, or when they block their opponent completely and the opponent cannot move.
Features
Powerful engine
8 difficulty levels from Beginner to World Champion
Display of possible moves when choosing a piece
Interactive tips on how to play better during the game
Cancel the move, if there was a yawn, you can go back
The ability to replay the game from the right place
Interact with the opponent through funny cartoon emotions
Real live players
Saving the rating
Chess together on the same screen
Selection of time control modes: unlimited, bullet, blitz, rapid, classic
Choose the design of the shapes and the board
View the history of moves

Blooming Gardens is a puzzle game that might look like a simple farming game, but it's more than just that. It's a board game where you care for a garden that grows flowers continuously as you move them around. You are tasked with lining up 5 of the same flowers to make them disappear. If your garden gets overgrown with flowers and becomes too much to handle, you lose.

How to play Blooming Gardens

As any good gardener knows, if you have a green thumb, everything you touch grows, so you need to do some cleanup. Overgrowing your garden is exactly what will get you into trouble in Blooming Gardens. When you plant one flower, others grow, but there simply is not enough space in this garden to maintain the full array of growth.

It's time to get those green fingers working and get your garden under control. Plants grow faster than you can pick them, and the only way to clear your garden to make space is to get the same plant in rows of five or more. The more you clear in a row, the more points you get.

How to clear garden space in Blooming Gardens

Line up five of the same flowers to remove them from the board. You can move flowers from one spot to the next in the garden, but only if there is a clear path for them to follow. This means you cannot move them unless the garden grid pieces are filled with other flowers to block your movement.

If your path is blocked, you will see an X on the grid pieces, which helps indicate legitimate movements.

The game ends when the board is filled with flowers, and there is no more space to grow. You will be informed what flowers will grow next. To strategize your moves, check the next flowers coming up on the right side of the screen.

It's time to get those green fingers working and your garden under control.

Can you keep your garden in check and get the highest score possible? Find out with Blooming Gardens!

Tip

If you have four of the same flowers in a row and there's space for six, don't immediately fill the fifth slot to get six out in one move.

Sandtrix provides a unique twist on traditional puzzles. Match the Color challenges your pattern recognition and timing skills. Parking Jam is a challenging puzzle game where you untangle a crowded parking lot one car at a time. Use your logic and problem-solving skills to move vehicles in the correct order, clearing the way without causing chaos. With each level, tackle increasingly complex puzzles filled with more cars and tricky obstacles.

How to Play Parking Jam

Everyone's been stuck in a parking jam, but the real challenge is figuring out how to escape!

This is a satisfying puzzle game where you click and drag cars to clear them from a crowded parking lot and onto the street. As you progress through the rounds, the difficulty increases, with road barriers and tighter spaces making it harder to maneuver the vehicles. Careful planning is key to getting all the cars out.

Cars can be moved in reverse, allowing for different strategies to clear the jam. Each puzzle comes with a limited number of moves, so you’ll need to think ahead and use them wisely. Your score also reflects how many players have successfully solved the same parking jam, giving you a sense of the challenge level.

Some levels, like Level 11, are especially tricky due to the sheer number of cars blocking the way. Can you navigate through the toughest jams and free up the lot?

More Games Like This

Buckle up and keep your eyes on the road. You can continue on your journey with some of our most popular driving games like Drift Hunters, a 3D game that gives you experience in the art of drifting with an impressive range of tuned-up cars and dynamic tracks; Mr Racer, where you can speed through busy streets on your way to victory; or Moto X3M, a bike game that takes dirt bike racing to a whole new level.

Controls

Click and slightly drag the cars in the direction you want them to get out of the parking lot.

DUO With Friends is an advanced variation of UNO with new tournaments, rules, gameplay modes, special cards, and much more. Unlike UNO, DUO With Friends allows space for up to 8 players in an online game.

How to play DUO

DUO With Friends follows rules similar to those found in UNO. Match your cards with the same type last placed on the pile. If you can’t, then you must draw cards from the stack until you reach a playable card. You can also utilize several wild & unique cards to avoid having to draw more or balance the playing field.

Set up an online match

You can play DUO online with up to 8 players. The online game creator can fully customize the card game’s rules, dictating how many points are needed to win, how many cards are dealt at the beginning, what special cards will be available, and much more.

Get immersed in the DUO card game

Duo With Friends features numerous game modes and areas to explore. You can set up a quick game and get instantly matched with another player, create games and invite your friends, and join other games by browsing the available matches. Along with the fully customizable gameplay options, you can visit the shop to find custom skins, sound effects and more.

Cards unique to DUO With Friends

Much like UNO, DUO has special cards of its own. These are:

Wild 'Find 0': The next player has to keep drawing until they find a card featuring the number zero.
Wild 'Switch Cards': The player swaps all their cards with the next player.
Wild 'Double': The next player draws as many cards as they have in their hand.
Wild 'Number Shuffle': Randomizes the numbers on all number cards.
Wild 'Watcher': All player cards are uncovered for 5 turns.
Features
Set up a custom match with your own flexible rules
Join one of many open online DUO matches
Customize your cards, player bar and more
Experience a colorful and free online cards game
Developer

Robin made DUO With Friends.

Platform

Web browser

Controls

Left-click to interact with the cards.

FAQ
What is DUO With Friends?

It is a card game based on UNO, and follows most of the same rules.

How many people can I play DUO With Friends with?

You can play online with up to 8 players.

Mahjong Titans is an iconic Mahjong game where you continually match two tiles to remove them from the board until there are none left. When you clear all the tiles, the level is complete!

How to Play Mahjong Titans

Click on two tiles of the same kind to remove them from the stack. This is only possible if you can move the tile left or right without disturbing other tiles. When you remove tiles higher up, it reveals further tiles to play underneath. There are 144 tiles to match in a traditional Mahjong Solitaire game, so sit back and enjoy the dramatic Chinese music while you solve the puzzle!

Tile Groups

Like classic Mahjong, this game features 144 tiles divided into three primary suits. These are:

Dots - feature circles
Bamboo - feature lines
Characters - feature Chinese characters
More Mahjong Games

Mahjong is an excellent game if you have a sharp eye for patterns and puzzle-solving. Browse our Mahjong games for a broad selection of Mahjong titles. Similar games to Mahjong Titans include Mahjong Solitaire and Onet Connect.

Wood Block Journey is a woodblock puzzle tetris game fused with the essence of Sudoku. Clear rows, columns, and squares in Play Single mode for high scores. Complete unique missions in Journey mode. Enjoy beautiful graphics, soothing sounds, and stress-free gameplay. Solve 60+ engaging puzzles with realistic wood tiles. It's a free, no-registration gaming delight.

How to Play Wood Block Journey

Wood Block Journey is a Tetris-inspired puzzle game where the goal is to clear the board by forming lines using various wooden shapes made up of tiles in different configurations. To clear a row, you need to align shapes like a 4-tile row, T-shaped, L-shaped, or a single tile. When you fill a row completely, it disappears.

For extra points and momentum, you can clear larger blocks by aligning 3x3 tiles. When these blocks align, they vanish, giving you a significant boost!

You can either embark on a journey through vibrant levels with specific missions or play a single classic game. A helpful tutorial will guide you through common moves, like combining a 4-tile row with L-shaped pieces to create 3x3 blocks, the perfect combo to clear larger sections of the board.

Stay strategic, keep the board clear, and enjoy progressing through each level!

Tap 3D Wood Block Away is a challenging puzzle game that tests your spatial reasoning and strategy. Rotate structures, tap wisely, and remove wooden blocks to reveal intricate 3D designs. With progressively complex levels and engaging mechanics, each move requires careful planning. Hone your problem-solving skills and enjoy a satisfying puzzle experience filled with clever challenges!

How to Play Tap 3D Wood Block Away

Tap 3D Wood Block Away is like a virtual Jenga with a twist—only this time, the tower is smaller, the pieces come in all shapes, and everything moves in 3D!

Each level presents a tangled stack of wooden blocks, some tiny, some long, some square, and your goal is to free them all. But it’s not as simple as it sounds. Every block is interlocked with others, and you can’t move one if something’s in the way. Follow the directional arrows on each piece to see where it can slide: if it’s an upward arrow but there’s a block above it, guess what? You’re stuck until you clear the path.

Strategic tapping is the key: remove the surrounding blocks to make wiggle room and gradually dismantle the entire structure. Just remember: removing a block from the middle won’t collapse the rest. Every single piece has to be released to complete the level.

As you move forward, the stacks get trickier and the pressure builds. But between rounds, you can boost your score by hitting a moving arrow at just the right moment: land it and you might double, triple, or even quadruple your points.

Need a better look? Zoom in and out to scout which blocks are free and which ones are hiding in plain sight. Time to tap smart, clear the chaos, and master the puzzle.

More Games Like This

Who doesn’t love a good brain teaser? Other fun puzzle titles worth a try include Candy Riddles, a puzzle game where with each successful match of three or more delicious treats; Zoo Boom, a fun animal-themed match-3 game with mission-based challenges; or Trivia Crack, a fun quiz game where you can test your general knowledge and learn amazing facts about the world.

Controls

Use the Left Mouse Button to tap the block away.

FAQ
What is the game where you slide wooden blocks?

The online game where you slide wooden blocks one by one to clear your entire board is called Tap 3d Wood Block Away.

What is the wood block game called?

The virtual wood block game is called Tap 3D Wood Block Away. It is similar to the tabletop game of Jenga.

How to Play Favorite Puzzles

Pick your pics

Favorite Puzzles has plenty of customization options to help you find the perfect puzzle. You can choose how many pieces you want to play with, all the way up to 600 pieces. Obby: Pull a Sword is an action-packed clicker incremental game where you train to build strength and draw powerful swords. Face off against mighty bosses, unlock new abilities, and collect unique pets along the way. Each victory brings you closer to becoming the ultimate warrior. Can you master the challenge and prove your strength?

How to Play Obby: Pull a Sword

Start small, pick up a sword and swing! Every move, every strike in Obby Pull a Sword brings you closer to greatness. The more you fight, the stronger you become. With each attack, your power grows, filling both your weapon and your soul. Even the longest journey begins with a single swing.

Seek out new swords and test your strength. When you’re ready for more, challenge the ancient blades waiting for a true warrior. But be warned, not every sword will yield easily. Only those worthy can pull a blade of true power from stone. Can you prove yourself?

Explore vast worlds and defeat mighty bosses! Each new land brings fresh challenges, fierce enemies, and powerful foes guarding their domains. They are strong, but you are stronger. Gather your power, strike them down, and unlock new adventures.

Enjoy a dynamic view of the action! See your character from every angle, above, below, or even in first person, making every battle feel immersive and intense.

Features
🏋️ Train - increase your strength for new achievements.
🗡️ Draw Swords - find powerful and unique blades.
🐾 Pets - unlock allies for extra help.
🏆 Victories - compete against other players.
💥 Fight Bosses - test your skills in epic battles.
🌍 New locations - explore unique worlds.
More Games Like This

Mr. Mine is an addictive idle mining clicker arcade game that puts you in charge of building a mining empire from the ground up! Start by drilling deep into the Earth’s crust, extracting valuable minerals and hidden treasures.

With each click, you’ll uncover riches that can be sold to fund the expansion and upgrading of your mining operations. As your business grows, you’ll be able to unlock new technologies and hire workers to dig even deeper, inching ever closer to the Earth’s core.

How to Play Mister Mine

The goal of the game is to mine for resources. The deeper you go, the greater the rewards. Mine deeper underground to obtain more resources and minerals to sell. You'll also encounter treasure chests the further you dig. These chests contain random rewards from small to vast amounts of money and resources.

Unlike your typical idle game, Mister Mine requires active participation from players. This is evident in two ways: miners must find stones or minerals that require clicking, and players will encounter Bosses in the mines' depths that need to be fought back. You also need to monitor closely the percentage of capacity you reach. Once it’s at 100% your miners will stop working, so you’ll need to either sell all or some of your resources or use them to build or upgrade your tools.

Your miners will be digging through 3 different worlds:

Earth, up to 1032 km of depth
Moon, from 1032 to 1132 km of depth
Titan, after 1132 km of depth.
Complete quests

There are 112 different quests to complete, each of which will give you a different reward, enabling you to improve your business further.

Upgrade your gear

You start the game with a humble shovel for digging. As you earn enough currency, you can upgrade your digging methods, progressing from a shovel to a jackhammer, and then to a drill, and finally to a nuclear excavator. Beyond that point, upgrades get supernatural, replacing workers with aliens and demons!

Hidden gems

Dig until km 50 to encounter the Golem (talking to it is one of the quests!) and reach km 400 to meet the first of six Earth bosses.

More Games Like This

Browse our clicker games for many more addictive idle and clicker titles.

Other popular games include Idle Breakout and Little Alchemy.

Developer

Playsaurus developed Mr. Mine.

The main source for building materials is caves. You can get up to 10x BM per treasure, and there are multiple BM treasure spots per cave. You will also find building materials in chests and excavations.

Clicker Heroes is an original idle clicker game. Go on an epic adventure and slay monsters, upgrade heroes with the gold you collect, find treasures, and kill bosses. Clicker Heroes is a game that helped propel clicker games into the mainstream alongside other classics like Idle Breakout.

How to Play
Click to kill

Embark on a quest to become a powerful warrior. Strike down each beast you see by clicking them repeatedly, then reap the gold rewards left behind. Every click you make has a single damage value that you can continuously upgrade for more power.

Hire heroes to help

Hire different heroes to help you take down monsters faster. Every hero has their own DPS and a set of upgrades that are sometimes unique. Often the hero upgrades allow further significant increases to their DPS. Heroes allow you to kill enemy mobs and take gold without lifting a finger.

The heroes get progressively more expensive, but you get what you pay for in strength and powerful upgrades. The further you get, the more heroes emerge, becoming your next big purchase that allows you to move further into more lucrative lands.

Explore new lands and beat bosses

Each region has new and exciting monsters to fight. Start at the forest and progress into drylands and other locations. At the end of each region, there is a difficult boss fight - the boss has extra health and takes all your might to vanquish! If you fail to beat the boss, you’ll bounce back to the previous stage where you can build your skills further before entering the fight again.

Developer

Clicker Heroes is developed by Playsaurus.

Release Date

July 2014. The web version can be played exclusively on CrazyGames!

Platforms

Clicker Heroes is available as a web browser game, Android game, and iOS game. It has also been available on Steam since May 2015.

Battle of Knights: Robby and Dragons is an engaging clicker game where you train your hero to grow stronger and defeat fierce enemies. Wield your sword and team up with companions to face thrilling battles. Strengthen your skills and overcome every challenge in your journey to victory!

How to Play Battle of Knights: Robby and Dragons

You start off with nothing but your bare hands: no armor, no weapons. It’s enough to get you through your first battles, but every fight you win brings you closer to valuable upgrades. Follow the arrows to navigate your first battle. A simple left-click is all it takes to engage your opponent.

Winning your first battle earns you 100 coins, just enough to explore new gear. Head to the sword store to upgrade your combat power. Each sword comes with its own force multiplier:

2x force for 1 coin
4x force for 25 coins
8x force for 100 coins
12x force for 300 coins
20x force for 500 coins
50x force for 1000 coins
80x force for 5000 coins
100x force for 10000 coins
120x force for 25000 coins
150x force for 50000 coins

The pet store is another place to boost your strength. Pets provide valuable strength boosts:

+3 strength for 5 coins
+10 strength for 30 coins
+30 strength for 100 coins
+250 strength for 500 coins
+800 strength for 1000 coins
+3000 strength for 5000 coins
+10000 strength for 25000 coins
+20000 strength for 50000 coins

You’ll also want to upgrade your appearance. At the skin store, you can enhance various parts of your character, from your arms and beard to your body, cloak, feet, hands, head, helmet, and pants. Each upgrade not only changes your look but might just earn you the respect of your enemies and the princess!

Coins are earned through combat. Fight a newbie for 1 coin, engage in a simple fight for 3 coins, test your skills in a medium fight for 6 coins, or take on a strong fight for 10 coins. When you’re ready for the ultimate test, challenge the dragon for 50 coins! Defeating tougher enemies means more coins and faster upgrades.

Your journey is about more than just fighting, it’s about earning the right to face the boss and unlocking the portal to another world. Explore your surroundings with a 360-degree view, controlled by your mouse. The world of knights is vast, and every turn might reveal a new challenge or a new ally.

And remember, the king promises his daughter, the princess, to the knight who defeats all the dragons. But only a worthy knight, one who has proven himself in battle and dressed for the occasion, can claim this honor. So gather your armor, prepare your weapons, and show the world you’re the hero it’s been waiting for.

Idle Blogger Simulator is a clicker simulation game where you are the rising star as a digital creator, ready to take on the internet—all from behind your desk! You get to choose quirky channel themes like hilarious meme breakdowns or classic heartwarming cat videos and upgrade your gear to produce top-notch content, even better cat videos. Sharpen your skills, team up with viral stars, and watch your fanbase as you become an influencer extraordinaire. Your goal is to reach the coveted 1 billion subscribers and become the ultimate online sensation.

How to Play Idle Blogger Simulator

You start your blogging journey in Idle Blogger Simulator by customizing your channel with a catchy name (or not so catchy) and unique avatar. Once you have these basics down, it's time to create. The objective is to create as many videos as possible. You are given themes for your videos—whether it’s gaming, lifestyle, the latest trends, or cats—and are given prompts to decide how what to focus on most in your video. You get to adjust the type of content you want to emphasize but be warned; your base followers will grow depending on whether you find that perfect sweet spot.

Each theme has specific requirements, so think strategically to make your content shine. Once your video is published, it will start collecting views, but the key to success is consistency—the more videos you create, the faster your fanbase and income grow.

Invest in upgrades to boost views and subscribers as your channel gains popularity. Unlock new features like advanced video equipment, fresh locations to blog from, and even additional avatars to represent your growing brand. Pay attention to trends, as trending topics generate the most buzz and help you attract hordes of new followers.

You’ll get prompts like "a famous blogger giving your channel a shoutout or a brand offering a sponsorship deal after you mention their product." These opportunities can significantly boost your views and earnings, which will help you grow and eventually help you hire a crew, including scriptwriters, managers, and PR experts, to help take your channel to the next level.

Other prompts include: "In one of your recent videos, you mentioned a headphone that you use yourself. You were contacted by a representative of the company and offered money." Take the money and keep the amazing conversation with your viewers going!

Keep the momentum going by creating and publishing videos regularly. With each step, you’ll unlock new tools, rewards, and challenges that make the journey to internet stardom become more of a reality. Don't forget your friends when you make it to the top.

Tip: Follow the trends because trending videos are the ones that get the most subscribers!

Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley is a clicker science-based idle game where you get to delve into the prehistoric world of dinosaurs. Uncover hidden fossils and construct your own Jurassic simulation as you complete missions to earn fossil points, unlocking a diverse array of unique dinosaur species. Collect Trait Cards to automate fossil production, allowing for effortless point accumulation and triggering extinction events to expand your simulation even further. With each click, you’ll watch your dinosaur collection flourish, transforming your simulation into a vibrant, thriving ecosystem where the majestic creatures of the Mesozoic Era reign supreme.

How to Play Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley

In Cell to Singularity: Mesozoic Valley simulation, you embark on an exciting journey through the prehistoric era, focusing on the evolution of various dinosaur species and other non-dinosaur creatures. You begin with a single dinosaur node and can unlock additional species by progressing through extinction events. Fossils are generated through clicking, with the option to charge nodes for faster fossil production.

You can also tap on dinosaurs to purchase more copies, increasing their fossil payout. Trait cards can be unlocked to streamline gameplay, automate fossil production, and enhance productivity while you collect Mutagen currency by acquiring dinosaurs.

As you complete quests displayed at the top of the screen, such as "Collect 25 Stegosaurus" or "Photograph Archosaur," they earn rewards like Stone Geodes, which contain Mutagen and Trait Cards. After reaching certain milestones, you can trigger an Extinction Event, resetting their progress but unlocking new dinosaurs and increasing their Simulation Level.

Once you reach rank 50, they can choose prestige, retaining rare and epic Trait Cards while boosting your dinosaur payout. The simulation features achievements that document significant milestones in prehistoric research, enhancing the overall experience as you explore the rich history of the Mesozoic Era.

Airline Tycoon Idle is a clicker management game where you take control of the skies as you build and manage your very own airline empire! Start small with just a handful of planes and airports, then strategically expand by treating travelers to lavish VIP lounges, purchasing state-of-the-art planes, and expanding to international airports. Like most management games, you can't do all the work yourself. Hire skilled managers to automate your flights, upgrade your fleet to maximize efficiency, and ensure top-tier passenger satisfaction. Unlock powerful bonuses and climb the ranks to airline tycoon!

How to Play Airline Tycoon Idle

Your objective in Idle Airline Tycoon is to transform a small operation into a global airline fleet. Start with a modest amount of airplanes, two to be exact, with limited destinations, but soon you'll be connecting dozens of cities worldwide.

Gameplay is simple and made to keep you engaged (and relaxed!) as you click your fleet to take off as often as possible, driving up revenue and unlocking more upgrades. Fly as much as you can, and you will soon find yourself upgrading your airports and planes to gradually grow your airline empire.

Purchasing a new airplane will set you back around $5,000, but it's a crucial step in expanding your airline. To gather the necessary funds, you'll need to fly your planes to the initial routes offered, like Rome, London, and New York, running consistent flights to build up your earnings. The goal is to master these routes and venture into new cities, steadily growing your airline’s reach. Every flight you run brings you closer to unlocking more destinations,

Each choice you make shapes your airline’s success—expand air routes, optimize flight paths, and invest in airport upgrades to attract more passengers and increase your earnings.

The game combines strategy with the ease of idle gameplay, allowing you to earn profits with a click. But don’t just sit back—efficient management is key. Carefully plan your routes between cities to ensure smooth operations and steady profits, avoiding costly mistakes that could disrupt your flights.

Bon voyage!

Mystery Digger is a clicker idle game where you explore underground mysteries and upgrade your drilling machine. You uncover hidden notes and intriguing items that piece together a captivating story.

With straightforward controls and soothing gameplay, each journey into the depths offers a fresh and relaxing adventure tailored to your curiosity.

How to Play Mystery Digger

In Mystery Digger, your goal is to dig through layers of challenges, collect rewards, and progress through rounds. Starting with slow and fragile machinery, you’ll need to upgrade your equipment to mine faster and withstand greater resistance. Along the way, you’ll face obstacles like concrete walls, requiring the right tools and strategy to break through. Managing your fuel and tools effectively is key: refuel and prepare your equipment before setting out.

To mine ore, control the disc, and use precise shooting to speed up the process. Upgrades are essential to improving performance and include enhancements like disc size, rotation speed, power, and spike count. To maximize efficiency, you can also boost movement speed, reduce fuel consumption, increase ore value, and improve machinery reliability.

Upgrades and their cost:

Disc Size: 3.0 – 600
Rotation Speed (Max): 13 – 250
Power: 1.2 – 280
Spike Size: 36 – 8k
Spike Count: 4 – 10k
Move Speed (Max): 1.0 – 300
Fuel Consumption: 50 – 40k
Ore Cost: 1.0 – 100k
Reliability: 1 – 20k

Completing quests is another way to earn extra profits. Quests include objectives such as driving a certain distance, spending time in the game, or using boosters. As you dig deeper and upgrade your machinery, you’ll uncover new opportunities to refine your skills and claim rewards.

Quests for extra profit available and cost:

Drive a distance of 500 – Reward: 500
Spend 5 minutes in the game – Reward: 1.3k
Use boosters – Reward: 700

The key is patience and upgrades. Continue moving your machinery along and reach the end of the course.

More Games Like This

Clicker games can be addictive, which is why we carry a vast selection of them so you never have to go without! Try some of our more popular titles, like Planet Clicker, from clicks to cosmos, you aim to grow your energy empire across the stars. Buy and upgrade various means of energy production, and watch the units flow or try Clicker Heroes, where you'll kill monsters and summon heroes to help you doing so.

DualForce Idle is a clever game that combines idle and tower defense gameplay. Click monsters to generate money for upgrades and turrets. It’s the only tower defense game where you’re actively trying to make the enemies stronger!

How to Play
Slay the beasts

Click the monster to kill it and gain coins. You can use your coins to buy everything you need to increase the generation of more coins. This is all about you making coins. Buy monsters and upgrade their health to make them deliver more money per kill. Upgrade your turrets so they produce more damage. You get the idea.

Spend your coins

There are 6 categories to buy from, with one remaining a mystery until a certain point in the game. From the early game, you’ll be able to use unlocks, monsters, turrets, and build mode to buy and upgrade various aspects of the gameplay. The rebirth option is for starting the game from scratch with a bonus, which is only recommended when you progress quite far into the game.

Unlock the mysteries

Each section offers an extensive selection of available upgrades, some of which are locked until you get further into the game. Keep slaying monsters while intentionally making them more powerful, and eventually, you’ll unlock all of this game's secrets.

Explore more cool features

DualForce Idle features an array of options and allows you to save the game and upload save data from a file, which is a neat feature for a modern-day browser game. If you’re obsessed with performance statistics, you can also check all your numbers in the statistics section.

More Games Like This

Once you've built the perfect monster-farming system in DualForce Idle, check out hundreds more free idle games. Two other popular choices are Idle Breakout and Tiny Fishing.

How to Play Click Click Clicker

Click the button

Click Click Clicker is as true to the clicker genre as it gets. You’re clicking a button to click another button. Simply click the button, upgrade your abilities, and get shiny new buttons for your hard work.

Upgrade your abilities

Like many clicker games, you start with one humble click. With each click, you generate cash to buy upgrades. Those upgrades include an increase in your passive ability to earn money, the amount of cash you earn per click, or the number of cursors you have.

Customize appearances

Click Click Clicker is all about getting shiny new things with minimal effort. You can customize everything in this game: backgrounds, music, cursor, and buttons. But you have to put in the work to unlock them first! Keep clicking or coast along on your idle earnings until you get there.

Satisfying Ball Clicker is an incremental clicker game in which the goal is to spawn vibrant, bouncing balls inside rotating circles. As the balls ricochet around the circle, they transform into dazzling colors, adding to the mesmerizing chaos. Each ball that escapes the circle and falls brings valuable rewards, which you can use to unlock powerful upgrades. The more you play, the more satisfying it becomes to watch your ever-growing collection of colorful balls bounce, collide, and evolve.

How to Play Satisfying Ball Clicker

You will begin Satisfying Ball Clicker with a circle right in the center of the screen, which has a small gap—an essential detail for your strategy. Your goal is to click and generate balls within this circle. You’ll start with a limited supply of balls, but they can gradually increase over time. The key is to keep as many balls bouncing inside the circle as possible, as each bounce increases their value. However, the circle rotates unpredictably, and the balls won’t always stay where you want them, making it tricky to control their movements.

As you advance through the game, watch for opportunities to supercharge your ball supply and skyrocket your earnings. Spot an x3 multiplier? Don’t hesitate—click it to triple your bounce points for a limited time instantly. From there, aim your balls with precision to hit the most valuable sections of the circle, racking up massive points and taking your score to new heights!

You’ll have the option to upgrade different elements, including adding more balls, boosting your income, widening the gap, or even creating additional circles. Each upgrade is locked until you’ve earned enough points, so strategy is key to unlocking more powerful features.

As the game advances, the difficulty ramps up. You'll encounter multiple rotating circles and balls that move faster with each level, challenging you to master timing, placement, and the physics of their bouncing patterns.

Capybara Merge Evolution is an addictive clicker game where you click capybaras into existence and unlock astonishing transformations along the way. Your capybara evolves, and so do the eggs you've conjured up with clicks.

How to Play Capybara Merge Evolution

You are on a farm of capybara, and your task is to click on the dancing capybara to actively collect rewards. Click quickly and see the points flood in, or don’t click at all and still get points.

If you take a break here and there, it's not a problem. Capybara Merge Evolution is a clicker game that allows for passive point accumulation, so sit back, relax, and let your capybara empire grow exponentially, but be warned that when you come back, you will find a farm full of capybara - those eggs hatch quickly.

When you create a new form of capybara, you will progress to the next round, essentially the same as the previous one but faster. Your advanced form of capybara will come with you. Each realm offers game upgrades and dynamic weather conditions, so there is always something to surprise you when you click away.

As the rounds progress, the capybaras move more quickly, making it slightly more challenging to merge. All part of the fun!

Merge Your Capybara

Once eggs hatch, you will have plenty of capybara to merge. You can merge similar capybara to form a whole new form of capybara. There are 32 distinct capybara evolutions spread across 4 diverse realms for you to explore. The capybara gets odder and odder as you merge.

Get ready for a delightful adventure as your capybara collection thrives!

Tip

When the board is full of mixed capybara, click on the more evolved capybara for more points.

Click on capybara poop for more points.

More Ore is an incremental idle game with RPG elements. Destroy the ore, buy buildings for workers, and unlock new technologies to enhance ore production.

How to Play More Ore
Smash rocks to earn ore

Click on the rock repeatedly to earn ore. One of the first upgrades you should buy is the fragility spectacles. This highlights weak spots on the rock and gives you combos that increase the effect multiplier.

Collect loot from bags

There’s a chance for loot to drop from every rock you destroy. This is normally pickaxes that help you mine faster. You’ll also find gold nuggets that fall from the rock, collect these to earn more ores. Click the gold gift icon on the left for a random reward that may significantly boost your progress.

Build a mining society

You can use the ore to buy new buildings like stone huts, schools, farms, quarries, churches, and factories. All of these buildings automate ore production and give you various buff options to increase their output. The factory allows you to create refined ore.

Research new technologies

There are various new technologies to help you along. You can select how much mining power you want to utilize on research. A good upgrade to start with is the research power-up, which allows you to increase the research power, getting you new technology faster.

Features
Mine ore from rocks and use it to buy upgrades
Unlock new technologies using your research power
Build a society of mining-enthusiasts who put in the work for you
Random loot drops with the chance of finding rare items
More Games Like This

Idle games are highly engaging and addictive, which is why they’re so popular. Check out Planet Clicker 2 and dominate the solar system with the power of idling and clicking. Idle Breakout and Idle Mining Empire are two other great games like this too.

MineClicker is a non-endless clicker game set in the Minecraft universe. Click to kill mobs and mine blocks. Earn XP and gather stone to buy various upgrades and hire recruits to make idling easier.

Fight various MineClicker mobs

Slay Minecraft mob characters one by one to earn experience points. You can spend those shiny points on new recruits, and on upgrades for your existing personnel. Each hire has mob and block DPS stats that allow you to destroy things faster. These get much higher on recruits later in the game when the difficulty increases.

Buy weapons to defeat the mobs

In the weapon upgrades screen you can purchase and upgrade your weapons. Just like Minecraft there is a progression to stronger gear, starting with your hands and wooden implements. You buy weapons using stone pieces which are earned by destroying blocks.

Level up to earn more

As you go further in MineClicker, the mobs and blocks will level up. You can level up by beating boss levels where the mob boss will have a timer. If you can’t kill them in time, their health resets.

You can choose which level to stick with until the time is right to move up the ranks. Leveling up means more cash per block destroyed or mob member killed, but as always with clicker games, the cost of new items increases too!

Features
70 levels with 14 boss levels
32 mobs to slay

14 locations

Battle Arena is a thrilling RPG adventure battle game that seamlessly blends heart-pounding action with strategic gameplay. Create your team from over 50 unique heroes, each inspired by iconic characters you know and love. Dive into intense real-time PvP battles where your skills and tactics are put to the ultimate test. Join forces with fellow guild players to take on epic quests across breathtaking locations, from ancient ruins to mystical landscapes. As you progress, you can upgrade your heroes and gear, enhancing their abilities and unlocking new powers.

How to Play Battle Arena

In a world overrun by demons, you must choose a region at a time to combat your opponent. Battle Arena fights start off in Serenity Valley, where you can assess your enemy's squad in just a tap. You get to select your heroes for battle. You begin with only three heroes to play with, each with a different weapon and skill. But the amount of heroes you can eventually upgrade to is countless.

Early in the game, you will fight Dark Lord, who is less than happy to see you. To win the initial battle and every one afterward, you must use your hero's unique skills—some wield swords while others shoot arrows. Just tap on their avatars at the bottom of the screen to strengthen your attacks.

In Battle Arena, your objective is pretty much to build and upgrade your heroes and compete in various challenges, particularly in the arena. The gameplay revolves around gathering resources and gaining experience points to level up. Players can participate in raids to acquire new heroes and enhance their existing ones. The key to success in this game is to strategize by selecting the right battle heroes to maximize team effectiveness.

As you engage in battles, you must use different abilities and relics, which provide unique advantages during combat. Upgrading heroes is crucial to improve your performance in battles.

Always pay attention to your heroes' health and manage resources wisely, especially during expeditions and arena fights. Using a mix of heroes with complementary skills can lead to successful team combinations and help defeat stronger opponents.

Ultimately, the goal is to push through the ranks in the arena by strategizing hero placements and leveraging their abilities effectively. You can earn significant rewards as you progress, which can be reinvested into your hero roster.

More Games Like This

Explore a wide array of adventure games at your fingertips! Check out some popular titles like Firestone Idle RPG, an MMO where you battle against hordes of Undead and Orc enemies; Warlord Fantasy RPG, a fantasy adventure that offers an immersive online experience; Immortal Taoists, where players embark on a quest for immortality; and Magic World, where fierce battles with mythical creatures and epic clan wars will keep you on the edge of your seat!

Prison Escape is an adventure puzzle escape game where you are a brave prisoner on a mission towards freedom. You’ll have to solve tricky puzzles and face unpredictable mini-games throughout your escape attempt to get to freedom. Outsmart the odds and the guards, and you will be well on your way out of prison.

How to Play Prison Escape

You are stuck in a prison, the last place you want to be. Your goal is to plan and carry out a successful escape without being caught by the guards.

You start with a key, but it is not for your cell. The key you need to get out is in the next cell, and the only way in is through the toilet pathway. To enter, you must quietly unscrew the toilet bolts. Be careful because if you make too much noise, the guards will hear you. A “caught meter” shows how loud you are.

Look under the bench to find a fork. Move the bench quietly, then use the fork as a screwdriver to remove the toilet bolts. Once the toilet is loose, move it aside and crawl through the vent into the next cell. In the next cell is Rhino, a tough inmate who will call the guards if he spots you. You must convince him not to by beating him in an arm wrestling match. Give it your all because your life depends on it.

Escaping requires moving through multiple rooms, each with its own challenges. Some cellmates are not friendly, but their brute strength can be useful. Some can even break down walls, which could help you find a way out.

Gather useful tools like forks, keys, and lockpicks to aid in your escape plan. If you get stuck, do not hesitate to use hints, especially for tricky lockpicking. Always stay hidden when guards are near. If guards spot you, quickly find places to hide, including other prison cells, to avoid capture.

Your ultimate goal is to reach the safe. Inside is a gun, which can level the playing field against the guards. Find a silencer, too, or one loud shot will immediately trigger alarms. Guards are not your only obstacle. Make it far enough, and you will face a dangerous series of alligators blocking your path. How far can you get? Can you escape prison alive?

More Games Like This

Puzzle games can be quite thrilling, which is why we have a whole collection dedicated to them, all online and free to play! Try a popular 2048 to satiate your need for speed, or Word Search, a fun word game that will have you scratching your head and questioning your vocabulary.

Horror Tale Kidnapper is a frightening first-person horror adventure game. Solve the disturbing mystery of the missing children at Lakewitch. Who is the kidnapper, and why are they doing it? Where are the children disappearing, and how can we save them? It's up to you to find out.

How to Play Horror Tale Kidnapper

In this episode, your name is Tom, and you meet your friend Harry, who plans to keep you and the other kids from your neighborhood safe from the Kidnapper while you're waiting for your parents to return.

The story begins with your parents leaving you at home. Your mom leaves you a note, asking to collect eggs from the hen-house and bring them to Tom. While cycling to your meeting point, you’ll encounter the famous Kidnapper…

You'll have to find Tom and, together with him, you will fortify the tree house so the spooky Kidnapper can't get you again. On the way to your goal, puzzles, moments of fear, screams, unexpected twists and turns, and lots of fun await you!

You will experience some jump scares in this story set in rural United States during the ‘90s, but Horror Tale is rated PEGI 12, so it’s very moderate and not as violent as other titles of the same genre.

Locations to discover in Horror Tale Kidnapper:
The Treehouse
Tom’s parents’ Farm
the Kidnapper's Lair
The Sawmill
the School

In each of these, you’ll have to pick up items and use them with the scenarios you are presented with to progress, in escape-game style puzzles.

Firestone Idle RPG is an Idle battle fantasy MMO game set in the world of Alandria. Fight hordes of Undead and Orc enemies in a party of up to five heroes, join a guild, and reap the rewards from progressing your character. Firestone is an Idle RPG, which means the gameplay focuses on simple actions like left-clicking.

How to Play Firestone Idle RPG

As the Hero in this story, your goal is to eliminate the Undead and Orc forces who are wreaking havoc and disorder in Alandria. The King has entrusted you to stop these chaotic forces and acquire the Firestones to save the Kingdom. Battle these endless hoards around the Alandria map to claim the rewards and increase your talents.

Heroes

Heroes are separated into classes and specializations. Classes indicate your Hero's abilities, which are activated by using mana, rage, or energy. They consist of Warrior, Mage, Priest, Druid, and others. Specializations are effectively the role you take in battle, this could be DPS, tank, or healer. With a variety of combinations and skills to focus on, you can level up the ultimate Hero to dominate the game in your own style!

You can also use one Guardian to allow up to five Heroes to a party. The Guardians are divine creatures like angels and dragons, which can be unlocked in the Magic Quarter and used against your enemies.

Quests

There's a limitless range of missions, daily quests, and weekly quests in Firestone Idle RPG. Daily quests can be as simple as opening three chests or bigger challenges like completing nine map missions. Weekly quests require more of an investment and reward you with common, rare, epic, and legendary chests depending on the quest and your Hero level. Level up your in-game talents to clear your quests quickly and claim the rewards!

Gear

Progressing your Heroes to be incredibly powerful is what makes Firestone so much fun to play. You can do this by focusing on your most essential skills via the talent tree, but the gear you use is also vital. The rarest equipment is the best; find it, enchant it, and use it to decimate the hoards more quickly.

Expanded Gameplay

As you continue to level up, you'll unlock mind-blowing new capabilities through new buildings in the town. Earlier on, you'll have the Hall of Heroes and Magic Quarter for your Heroes and Guardians.

As you progress into the later game, you'll unlock the Alchemist, where you can run experiments for random upgrades and transmute chests to higher rarities. The game is frequently updated with new content, so there may be more buildings in the town in the future!

Features

Fight action-packed battles against hoards of enemies
Receive consistent rewards for your progression
Refine your abilities using the diverse talent tree
Fight in parties of five with your guild-mates
Free-to-play with regular updates for fresh gameplay!
More Games Like This

There is plenty more excitement to go around thanks to our vast selection of adventure game titles that include Dead Land Survival, a survival horror game set in a zombie-infested apocalyptic world you fight for survival with powerful skills you accumulate throughout gameplay; Immortal Taoists, a captivating idle game where players embark on a journey to immortality in a serene fantasy world; or join Battle Arena and unleash your ultimate squad in fast-paced, hero-packed PvP showdowns.

Power seals play a crucial role in the Hall of Heroes, enabling upgrades for hero gear, jewels, and soul stones to legendary or higher rarities. Each seal is tied to a specific piece of equipment and is exclusively used for enhancing that item.

Is Firestone a good game?

Firestone is an Idle RPG, which means the gameplay focuses on simple actions like left-clicking, making it a fan favorite.

Paper Minecraft is an adventure game that brings the legendary Minecraft into a 2D world. Choose your character and preferred game mode to jump into the fun! This Scratch game features the classic survival and creative modes from the original Minecraft game.

How to Play Paper Minecraft

If you’re on this page, the chances are you’ll need little introduction to how Minecraft works. The game is a staple of every modern gamer's diet. Paper Minecraft is pretty much the same but set on a 2D plane like the game Terraria. If you really have never played Minecraft before, here’s how it works…

Creative mode

An unlimited supply of tools and building materials is available in creative mode. You can fly around the biomes, exploring various terrains like woods, water, rocks, and fields. This game mode is perfect if all you want to do is build cool stuff and share your creations without worrying about surviving.

Survival mode

Survival mode requires skill and ingenuity to survive. You start with nothing in this mode and must utilize the natural environment to protect yourself from monsters that roam the night. Farm animals and crops for sustenance, mine resources to create weaponry, and build defenses to keep yourself safe.

Features
The ultimate free 2D Minecraft game
Features survival and creative game modes
Build, create, and survive in this superb browser game
The original Paper Minecraft from Scratch
Platform

Paper Minecraft is a web browser game made using Scratch, an amazing free tool developed at MIT for learning how to develop games.

Developer

This game is made by a fan of the popular Mojang-developed Minecraft game. This version is made by Griffpatch; you can check the developer's YouTube channel.

Release Date

May 2013 (updated continuously since then)

More Games Like This

Explore more games like this by browsing our adventure category or try BloxdHop.io, featuring Minecraft graphics. Another game worth a try is Build Royale, a 2D top-down world where you get to build defenses and get ready for battle.

AD or left and right arrow keys to move

Paper Minecraft was developed by YouTuber and Scratch developer Griffpatch.

At CrazyGames, we have a collection of free Minecraft games.

Is Paper Minecraft like the original Minecraft?
Paper Minecraft is very similar to the original game, but the graphics are 2D.

Dead Land: Survival is a survival horror game set in a zombie-infested apocalyptic world where you fight for survival with powerful skills you accumulate throughout gameplay. Fortify your shelter against relentless undead attacks and scavenge through desolate territories in search of valuable resources. Craft weapons, armor, and essential gear to give yourself an edge in these hostile lands. With danger around every corner, your aim is to keep calm and survive the end of the zombie apocalypse.

How to Play Dead Land: Survival

Set out on a treacherous quest through the desolate lands of Dead Land: Survival, where the world has fallen to ruin, and the infected ones lurk around every corner. Once-beautiful landscapes are now wastelands filled with relentless threats, stretching from the eerie remnants of your hometown, Nightstone, to the harsh quarantine zones. Each step into these dangerous territories demands courage as you fight tooth and nail to survive in an unforgiving, apocalyptic world.

To stay alive, you must harvest resources from whatever nature has left behind. Gather essential materials from trees and other natural sources to upgrade your hero, repair broken vehicles, and restore key structures like your shelter and workshop. Loot is scattered throughout zombie-infested areas, and every scrap could be crucial to your survival. From metal to wood, each resource strengthens your chance of fighting back against the apocalypse.

Combat is fierce as you face off against infected enemies with a range of weapons at your disposal. Craft melee weapons and guns, each designed for the brutal, turn-based struggles you’ll encounter. But survival takes more than brute force; you’ll need health packs and food to sustain your strength in prolonged battles. Weapons wear down over time, so be vigilant and repair them as needed, ensuring you're always ready for the next deadly encounter.

Nightstone, your starting refuge in this bleak world, is home to fellow survivors who offer a glimmer of hope. Here, you’ll meet resilient characters who trade with you and assign quests that test your survival skills. You'll earn rewards as you complete these missions and unlock the chance to journey to other survivor outposts. Each quest brings you closer to understanding this dark world and forming alliances in a fight for humanity’s future.

Engage in turn-based battles with zombies, craft powerful weapons and equipment, earn ratings to compete with clans, and complete a variety of quests in Dead Land: Survival.

More Games Like This

Dead Land: Survival is a game that can have you hooked for days. However, if you're looking for something new, you can browse more adventure games. Two other games in this category that will keep your attention for just as long include Battle Arena, a game where you collect powerful heroes and dominate real-time battles in this dynamic RPG; Magic World, an exciting Magical World, where battles with mythical creatures and epic clan wars will keep you on the edge of your seat.

Magic World is an adventure puzzle game where you engage in unique battles with mythical creatures and fierce enemies by defeating them via gem matching. The gameplay is strategic, as this is not your ordinary battle. Your enemies will use cover and battlefield advantages against you. You'll need a well-thought-out strategy and smart leveling up of all heroes to achieve victory!

How to Play Magic World

In Magic World, your mission is to protect the realm by assembling a squad of unique heroes and mastering the art of match-3 puzzles. The only way to succeed is to strategically match at least three gems of the same color, aligning them horizontally or vertically which will aim fire at youropmponent in an attempt to defeat them.

Matching gems that correspond to your heroes' elemental colors will unleash even stronger attacks, so try to match those as soon and as often as you can. Use touch/swipe controls on mobile or the left mouse button on the desktop to create your matches and plan your moves.

The game offers a variety of modes to explore. Engage in thrilling PvP battles against players worldwide, join or form clans to exchange resources, share strategies, and hold friendly matches. Participate in cooperative clan raids to face off against powerful bosses like dragons, trolls, and goblins. Along the way, you'll tackle an exciting story campaign, advancing through hundreds of levels packed with challenges and adventures.

Your journey combines strategic battles with the addictive fun of match-3 gameplay. Rise to the top of the leaderboards, claim incredible rewards, and lead your heroes to victory in this captivating, magical adventure!

AFK Dungeon: Idle Action RPG is an idle RPG that challenges you to craft the ultimate hero through smart combinations of items, skills, and traits. Dive into dungeons, grow stronger while you're away, and return to unleash powerful upgrades. Your strategy shapes the journey—mix, match, and conquer every challenge that stands in your path.

Features

■ Vast 3D RPG Adventure

Experience a strategy game in 3D! Enjoy dynamic action with everything from characters to backgrounds fully in 3D!

■ Active and Mastery Skills

Enough with the same old, boring skills! With active skills as well as mastery skills, you can form your own play strategy.

■ Arena PVP Ranking Matches!

Test the abilities of the characters you've worked hard to level up. Compete for the championship in the arena against users from around the world!

■ Unlimited Dungeon Game

Gold Dungeon, Experience Dungeon, Tower of Trials, Mines, Ancient Altar, Labyrinth, Raid Dungeons, and more! Conquer numerous dungeons in your own style! You can play as much as you want, whenever you want.

■ Gather Companions!

It can be hard to handle all those enemies alone. Recruit heroes as your companions! Various heroes with unique traits will assist you.

■ An Idle Game You Control with One Finger

A must-have game for busy modern people! An idle system that makes you stronger automatically! Become the top protagonist in the fantasy world easier and faster than others.

How to Play
In AFK Dungeon, your character moves and fights all by itself. You don’t have to press anything to walk or attack. Just watch your hero go forward and fight the enemies!
If you want to use a special skill, just tap the skill button on the screen. These skills are strong and can help you beat big monsters. After you use one, you need to wait a little before you can use it again.
You’ll get gold and items even when you're not playing. When you come back, just tap the treasure or pop-up to get your rewards. Don’t forget to check your gear and make your hero stronger by leveling up.
There are also heroes who will help you in battles. You can unlock and hire them as you play more.
You don’t need to aim or dodge — the game takes care of that for you. Just tap, upgrade, and enjoy your adventure!

Schoolboy Escape: Runaway is an adventure puzzle escape game where you're a determined kid with pretty strict parents who wants to break free from being grounded in your room. Tiptoe across quiet hallways, avoid being seen, and use clever tricks to carry out your great escape. Your friends are waiting for you on the outside. Do you have what it takes to join them?

How to Play Schoolboy Escape

The game begins with a bad report card, filled with low grades and teacher complaints about your behavior. Your parents are furious, and rightly so. You are grounded and will have to stay in your room and study as punishment.

Your ultimate goal is to sneak your way out without being caught. Running or making noise will get you noticed, so be stealthy.

You will have to solve mini escape puzzles to be able to leave, such as finding the spare key hidden somewhere in your room. Move around the house, checking inside cabinets, shelves, and drawers whenever possible. If your mom or dad catches you, you’ll be sent back to your room.

Your mom comes in and out of your room from time to time, so to fool her and make her believe you’re studying, you will need to place a math book on your desk. Search around, including the hallway, for valuable items.

You’ll need keys to access other rooms, like the storage and bathroom. Avoid crossing paths with your parents, especially when they check on you.

Beware of Your Parents' Bedroom

Some essential items are in your parents’ room, but you must wait for your dad to leave before trying to access the safe. Find the password to open it.

As you progress, you’ll face new challenges in school, the village, and other locations, solving puzzles and sneaking past watchmen and other obstacles.

Use distraction tactics to avoid detection and find keys, tools, and codes to unlock doors and safes. Always watch your surroundings, hide when necessary, and collect helpful items to aid your escape.

How far can you get before your parents catch you?

Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison is an adventure arcade mining game where your survival depends on your skills and strategy! You control your noob miner to dig, fly, eat, purchase goods, and pretty much do everything possible to not only survive but escape from confinement.

How to Play Noob Miner 2: Escape From Prison

You’ve been caught stealing diamond apples... again! Now you’re locked up in a prison, forced to toil away in the mine as part of your punishment. But this isn't just any ordinary prison labor—there’s more at stake here than just digging for ores. You need to stay sharp and well-fed, so always stock up on food and enhancement potions before heading underground, or you’ll starve to death!

As you work through your grueling days, you’ll be assigned to incomplete building projects and resource extraction, where you’ll uncover hidden opportunities that could lead to your freedom. Keep your eyes peeled for the Super Pickaxe—a tool so powerful it could be your key to escape!

Along the way, visit merchants to purchase better pickaxes, potions, and other essential supplies to boost your mining efficiency. These tools will help you dig deeper, extract more valuable resources, and stay one step ahead of your captors. Who knows what secrets the mine holds? Keep digging, upgrading, and planning your way to freedom!

Challenge yourself and earn maximum coins. Get to know the characters of the prison. Be attentive; perhaps they are hiding something from you. Get as many upgrades as possible so you can mine resources faster and more efficiently. Increase your luck to mine more resources per block. Upgrade your mine to generate more ore. Find, buy, and sell resources to merchants: new different kinds of picks, food, torches, dynamite, and much more.

Don't get too used to this vibrant life in prison—your aim, after all, is to escape.

Tip

Every day, prices at shops are updated, so choose the moment when you can earn the most!

More Games Like This

Enjoy even more adventure games or arcade games, so the fun can continue. If you liked Noob Miner, you might also enjoy games like Jacksmith, where you forge weapons for soldiers only to help them in battle yourself; We Become What We Behold, where you witness how being observed can easily change your actions in both a game and in real life; or Bloxd io, an adventure game with awesome Minecraft graphics worth a play.

Infiltrating the Airship is an adventure game that continues Puffballs United's string of popular games from this genre (other titles include Breaking the Bank, Fleeing the Complex, and Escaping the Prison) and presents a new scenario for you to tackle.

How to Play Infiltrating the Airship

Can you choose wisely and help the stickman in this game to accomplish his goals? Ralph, the stickman, is attempting to infiltrate a gigantic airship to capture the villainous Henry. You must use your intelligence to help him choose the correct course of action to ensure he succeeds.

At each stage of the game, you are presented with a selection of options to choose from that will directly alter how Stickman progresses through the story; will he infiltrate the airship using a block of C4? Maybe he will try his luck with a jar of acid or a simple knock on the hatch? Each choice will either result in a fail or progression to the next stage, plus a large dose of humor and funny cut-scenes. If you make the wrong choice, fear not; each stage can be replayed, or you can replay the whole mission from the beginning.

If you are looking for a spot of fun, humor, and a mental challenge, give Infiltrating the Airship a try!

More Games Like This

Browse our collection of adventure games to find similar titles to Infiltrating the Airship. And if you like the graphics and gameplay of this puzzle game, you may enjoy We Become What We Behold, a commentary on society and media; Snow Rider or House of Hazards, where you will protect your characters from dangerous mishaps.

How to Play Obby: +1 to Spaceflight Altitude

The key to success in Obby: +1 to Spaceflight Altitude lies in upgrading your Obb character and maximizing your rocket’s potential. Start by gathering energy to fuel your rockets. Let your character run across the playing field to collect lightning bolts, coins, and energy. Grab it quickly before other characters on the playing field do.

As you explore, collect stars to unlock new upgrades, hatch pets with special abilities, and trade them for enhanced rewards. The game encourages continuous progression, as each new discovery and upgrade will propel you closer to reaching new worlds and earning bigger rewards. Keep an eye out for premium perks that can give you an extra boost, allowing you to explore uncharted territories in the galaxy faster and more efficiently.

Earning rewards

There are various ways to earn jewels, cash, and coins. Run around the board collecting them or take up some of the challenges, such as the wheel of fortune and other similar tasks that can pay off generously. Step into the flying challenge, where you click for cash or jump into any other of the challenges above you to earn even more.

Keep an eye out for premium perks that can give you an extra boost, allowing you to explore uncharted territories in the galaxy faster and more efficiently.

Escaping the Prison is a wildly unique adventure puzzle game in which you aim to escape from prison! After being thrown in a prison cell, you must use anything and everything at your disposal to escape: teleporters, anti-gravity equipment, toilet plungers—nothing is off limits in your attempt to escape! But be careful because one wrong move or a split-second hesitation could send you right back to your cell—or worse!

Do you have what it takes to escape the prison? There's only one way to find out.

How to Play Escaping the Prison

The game begins with Henry Stickman, your character, in a lonely prison guarded by taunting security who brings you a package. This is where the theme of the game begins—choice. It is a puzzle game, so depending on the choices you make, your next step may or may not lead you to a true chance at escape. All the while, you get to know your character through trial scenes and learn about the bank robber that got you in jail in the first place.

The initial package contains a cake with a few potential items hidden inside—you can choose what's in the box! Choose from an energy drink, a teleporter, and a cell phone, and see what scenarios unfold, considering your choice.

The power of choice

You don't only get choices to help you escape from prison; in some scenarios, you also get to choose how your trial unfolds. The game is layered, so what you see is by no means a reflection of linear time.

Choose the Cell Phone

This scenario gives Henry Stickman even more choices to make. He uses the cell phone to call his attorney and from them another scenario in court unfolds where you must choose the winning piece of evidence.

Choose evidence presented at trial, such as a money bag your character hid in, a shovel, a mysterious device, a videotape of security footage, a letter from the detective, or bank floor plans. What should you choose? Will it free Stickman?

There is only one way to find out.

Choose the NrG Drink

Henry escapes from prison in this scenario, but at a great expense. The energy drink gives him strength enough to literally bend bars to escape, but on his way out, he suffers a heart attack and dies.

Choose the Teleporter

Henry does escape from prison using the teleporter. He is propelled outside of prison, but unfortunately, he does die in this scenario as the teleporter puts him right in the bull's eye view of a firing range where he is the prime target.

We won't spell out all the scenarios for you because part of the fun is actually seeing the consequences of your choice. So go ahead and choose!

More Games Like This

For more adventure games and puzzle games, be sure to check out Cut the Rope, where you solve physics-based puzzles to feed a cute monster, and Bolts and Nuts, which challenges you to connect gears and mechanisms.

Looking for something a bit different? Have a go at popular titles like We Become What We Behold, a game about media influence, or Snow Rider, where you navigate your bobsled on a dangerous mountain slope.

Developer

Escaping The Prison is developed by Puffballs United and is part of the Henry Stickmin series.

Platforms

Fleeing the Complex is an amazing stick-figure escape adventure game. You are trapped inside a small prison cell, and you must escape not just your cell but the whole prison! If you fail, death is awaiting you... The highly secured prison is guarded by some strong stick soldiers. You must make good and fast decisions to make it out alive. Good luck!

How to Play Fleeing the Complex

The entire game is based on quick thinking, strategy, and decision-making. Along the way, you'll find help from the environment and even old or new friends. Each sequel is tied into the previous game (i.e., Escaping the Prison happens because of Henry's criminal actions in Breaking the Bank). Not every choice you make will lead to a bad ending, but some lead to "fails" from the get-go. In Breaking the Bank, every choice will be a failure.

This is probably to set Henry up for his next adventure as he tries to escape from prison. The fact that you can't really predict which choice makes the most sense means Fleeing the Complex is just as unpredictable as the earlier games (except Breaking the Bank).

Released in 2015, Fleeing the Complex is the 5th and (so far) last sequel in the Henry Stickmin adventure series. Like the earlier games (Escaping the Prison, Stealing the Diamond, and Infiltrating the Airship), the goal is to choose the right paths, tools, and moves while you try to break into or out of different places to escape - or cause - trouble.

More Games Like This

Fleeing the Complex is a unique adventure game that puts your puzzle skills to the test. Check out titles that require similar critical thinking skills, like Geometry Dash Subzero, Bolts and Nuts, or The Impossible Quiz.

Skyblock Survive With Noob! is an adventure game where you control Noob, who finds himself marooned on the floating island of Skyblock. You will need to collect resources like food and water, build shelter, and explore Skyblock and all the challenges and surprises it brings.

How to Play Skyblock Survive with Noob?

You have a lot of freedom to explore Skyblock with Noob. This sandbox game offers adventure and exploration, making it so addictive. You begin with a few basic resources, but early on, you discover how easy it is to find more all around you. Noob has the potential to dig or break the terrain around him with a left click of the mouse. Chip away to find treasures and essentials and dig across this and other floating islands.

There are a few necessary moves to make to explore with Noob properly, and they include destroying blocks, placing blocks, dropping items, checking your inventory, and more.

A few fun features make it easier to navigate the floating islands, like getting dynamite and using it to explode everything or getting a jet pack; movement is easier as you can glide through the sky. Before that, avoid falling to your death and losing all the hard-earned items you've collected.

Possibilities are nearly endless with Noob. The important thing is to have fun and explore!
