Mini Mine is a thrilling adventure arcade game where you dig deep, fight fierce monsters, and trade smartly to save Noob’s kidnapped girlfriend. Mine resources to upgrade weapons and tools, build a thriving village, and uncover hidden treasures. Unlock unique characters, set up automated production, and take down Cheater in an epic showdown!

How to Play Mini Mine

Your mining adventure starts with an honorable task: freeing a kidnapped noob girl trapped by Cheater and claiming the coveted god’s pickaxe. Your mission includes exploring new islands, building bridges, and uncovering unique tools to assist you in your journey. Resources are key, and they can be gathered by delving into the mine.

Your primary goal is to mine gems and resources of various types, including orange, green, blue, and white gems, coins, stones, and more. Start mining by walking to the main block and chipping away continuously. Extracted rewards will scatter: simply walk over them to collect them. Keep an eye out for alerts to “jump into the portal.” Entering the portal will occasionally replenish your mine, revealing new, unique, and more valuable resources to collect. However, note that the mine won't always replenish when you jump into the portal.

Mining has a gradual pace and requires persistence. The more you mine, the more rewards and currency you accumulate, unlocking the ability to purchase better tools and progress to higher levels. Early levels may feel slow: for instance, by level 2, you might have only mined seven coins. But patience is essential, as higher rewards and tools become accessible as you advance.

Tools & Upgrades

Use your earnings to purchase tools and potions that enhance your mining efficiency:

Potions start at $2500 and include:

Double block destruction speed.
Double the number of mined items.
Increase resource production from quarries and sawmills.

Pickaxe cost

Stone Pickaxe: $100
Iron Pickaxe: $500
Golden Pickaxe: $2000
Diamond Pickaxe: $5000
Cheater Pickaxe: $15,000

Game Tips

Sell your stones. This will allow you to boost your purchase power by selling stones at the store.
Slow and steady wins the race. Prices are high, so consistent mining is crucial to afford the best tools and upgrades.
Invest in potions and upgraded pickaxes as soon as possible to speed up your progress.
More Games Like This

Browse our adventure category for even more fun. Jump into Battle Arena, an RPG with fast battles, team building, and tactical challenges; Magic World, outsmart enemies with gem-matching tactics in this mythical puzzle adventure; or Dead Land Survival, a survival horror game set in a zombie-infested apocalyptic world where you fight for survival with powerful skills you accumulate throughout gameplay.

Skillfite.io is an MMORPG adventure battle game set in a large open-world environment with up to 100 players. Prepare yourself for the ultimate survival experience! Gather materials, craft powerful gear, and sharpen your skills to dominate in these intense PvP battles. Explore a vast, open world brimming with surprises, hidden treasures, and challenges at every turn. Whether you prefer teaming up with a guild to conquer foes or going solo to prove your mettle, the choice is yours. As you advance, you will build up your abilities, craft deadly weapons, and become a formidable fighter ready to take on anything the world throws!

How to Play Skillfite.io

Start from scratch

Skillfite has many features reminiscent of old-school browser-based MMORPGs like Runescape. Starting as a level 1 noob with no gear or experience, you have to chop trees, mine rocks, and catch fish to level up your skills and sustain yourself during battles with low-level enemies like rabbits.

Harvest and craft

Use the raw materials you gain from chopping and mining to craft armor for protection and weapons for attack. Early in the game, you can craft gear from the wood you’ve earned, but you can quickly find rocks to mine copper and craft something slightly better. There are 15 resource types in Skillfite.io.

Build your skills

Level up your skills to reach milestones that unlock better resources. For example, when you reach level 5 wood chopping skills, you can cut down the more giant pinewood trees. It’s worth attacking animals, even peaceful ones, as they drop loot, which can be helpful.

Explore various zones

There are various zones to explore in Skillfite.io. Teleport around the map and head into non-PvP, PvP, and high-risk PvP areas. In the high-risk PvP areas, you can team up with and fight players of any level. You can initiate trades with players in all zones.

More Games Like This

Or play more IO games like 1v1 LOL, and Agar.io.

Iron Friend is a spine-chilling first-person horror game where you must confront dark mysteries and survive terrifying encounters. As a staff member thrown into a horrifying situation, your goal is to uncover the truth behind the eerie events unfolding around you. Navigate through creepy environments, solve puzzles, and avoid lurking dangers as you piece together the sinister secrets hidden within. With every step, the tension rises as you face disturbing consequences for every wrong move. Will you survive the nightmare, or will you become another victim of the terror?

How to Play Iron Friend

Welcome to your unsettling late-night shift, where an urgent call beckons: “Get here now. We need you to investigate the power outage.” You’ll explore the eerie, dimly lit grounds, guided by WASD controls to move, crouch, and interact with your surroundings. The air feels heavy, the silence broken only by unsettling sounds—this is no ordinary night.

Begin by picking up items like keys using the F key, which will be stored in your inventory (Tab). Doors require hands-on interaction—look at them, wait for the hand icon, and then press LMB to drag them open. Your first mission is to find a flashlight in the shed and then locate the fuse box inside the main building. But restoring the power isn’t as simple as flipping a switch. You’ll need to gather crucial objects scattered throughout the eerie rooms, such as batteries, coins, cassette tapes, and more.

Clues are everywhere and play a vital role in your progress. Did you find a coin? Use it in a vending machine. Have you discovered a cassette? Play it in a cassette player for a chilling audio hint. Every object unlocks a piece of the mystery. Explore carefully—some items, like keys, unlock new areas, while others, like notes and strange markings, point to hidden objectives. Pay close attention to environmental details, as they often hold the answers to your next step.

Eventually, you’ll find a working computer and access its command prompt. Here, typing commands like “run humanist.exe” leads to strange tests and deeper layers of the story. As you navigate the darkened hallways, uncovering objects and solving puzzles, you’ll face the Iron Friend—your encounter with it may hold the key to survival. But beware: the more you explore, the more unsettling the atmosphere becomes. It's not so bad if you don't mind the screams that can be heard from a distance from time to time. The choice—and courage—to continue are yours.

More Games Like This

There is more adventure to go around. Browse our adventure category for even more fun. Enter Battle Arena and lead a team of legendary heroes in action-packed PvP battles.; engage in tactical gem-matching battles against mythical foes in Magic World; or Dead Land Survival, a survival horror game set in a zombie-infested apocalyptic world where you fight for survival with powerful skills you accumulate throughout gameplay.

Last Updated

Daily Room Escape offers a brain-teasing puzzle adventure game where you are in a unique room filled with intricate riddles and hidden clues. Sharpen your problem-solving skills and unravel mind-bending puzzles to find the key to freedom. Each day brings a new theme, a different set of challenges, and fresh surprises waiting to be discovered. Keep coming back for your daily dose of brain-teasing fun, and see if you have what it takes to outsmart each escape room.

How to Play Daily Room Escape

Daily Room Escape is an exciting puzzle game where your objective is to—well, escape! The only way to get out is by solving mini-mysteries throughout the room. Each clue leads to another clue. There are safes in the room that need to be opened, items that can be combined, items that needs inspecitng, locks that require codes—the mysteries are endless, until you crack the code and get out.

Explore every corner of the room to uncover objects that will aid you on your path to freedom. With each step, keep your eyes peeled for items tucked away in surprising places, waiting to be picked up and used in clever ways. A simple book, an odd key, or a piece of paper could hold the secret to unlocking a tricky door or solving a cryptic puzzle. Look closely, as even the smallest detail could provide the breakthrough you need!

In Daily Room Escape, no two days are alike, so don't get too confident on each new gameplay. Every daily challenge brings a fresh room filled with a variety of puzzles designed to test and sharpen your mind. You’ll encounter codes that demand cracking, sequences that need solving, and images that require reassembling. Each puzzle pushes you to think outside the box, using your collected items and wits to decipher the room’s mysteries.

If you’re stumped, a hint button is there to help, but the true thrill lies in finding the solution on your own. With persistence and curiosity, every challenge becomes an opportunity to outsmart the game and make your great escape.

8-Ball Billiards is a free online pool game in our sports category, ideal for one or two players. You can play solo against AI or challenge other players in two-player mode. The game is easy for anyone to play, so pick up a cue and line up your first shot.

How to Play 8 Ball Billiards Classic

8 Ball Billiards Classic is much like the classic in-person game: your goal is to pocket all your balls (either solids or stripes) and sink the 8-ball to win. Use your mouse to aim the cue stick and adjust the power of your shot. Click and drag the cue stick back to set your shot’s power, then release it to strike the cue ball. This is a 2-player game, so carefully plan each shot to outmaneuver your opponent and clear the table before they do!

You can use the settings to choose the ability of your AI-controlled opponents and, if you are good at it, you can also remove the visual help that allows you to understand the trajectory of your shots.

Pick a ball

8-Ball Billiards is an intuitive billiards game where you must pot all the striped or spotted balls, depending on the color assigned to you. The balls you’re assigned depend on what ball is potted first, so shoot for the win!

Line up your cue

The controls are easy. Simply click and drag to find the right level of force, then line up the angle with the ball that seems easiest to pot next. Remember that this is pool, so save the 8-ball until you have potted all your balls, otherwise, you will lose!

8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer is a competitive sports pool game that lets you test your skills in exhilarating 2-player matches against friends or go head-to-head with players from around the world. Perfect your game by competing against expert bots to sharpen your strategies and techniques. Whether you’re aiming to outwit a friend or conquer global rivals, every shot counts in your quest to become the ultimate billiards champion.

How to Play 8 Ball Pool Billiards Multiplayer

8 Ball Pool Billiards is just like your classic pool game, where your objective is to pot your balls into the pockets. This game adds a fun twist in that you can play with random players from all around the world, helping you enhance your game to a pro-level with continued practice.

The game begins with a break shot where you hit the cue ball to scatter the other balls. Your objective is to pot the balls into pockets using the cue ball where possible. The first break will tell you whether you are stripes or solids, depending on what ball you get in the pocket first.

In each turn, aim to strike the cue ball to hit your target ball into a pocket. If successful, you continue your turn; otherwise, your opponent takes their turn. The key is to use strategic shots to position the cue ball for the next play and try to control the table by positioning balls to your advantage. The direction of where your ball will land is outlined from the stick to the ball with an arrow, giving you an indication of the target path.

The player who pots all their balls first wins the game.

Choose from numerous game rooms such as a private two-player game between you and your friend, a quick play game where you choose your level and play against the public quickly, or a local play where you may need to wait a bit to be matched with a live partner.

Soccer Legends 2021 is a sports soccer two-player game and the newest installment in the widely popular Soccer Legends series by MadPuffers, bringing the excitement of fast-paced soccer action to the next level. Packed with fresh updates, this game introduces a variety of new players and teams, each with their own unique skills and playing styles. Whether you’re a seasoned fan of the series or a newcomer, Soccer Legends 2021 offers a dynamic and entertaining experience that combines arcade-style gameplay with competitive strategy. Play solo against AI or challenge your friend to a 1-on-1 match!

How to Play Soccer Legends 2021

The objective is simple: get the ball into your opponent's net while defending your own, but with these high-powered skills at your disposal, each match becomes a thrilling test of strategy and timing. The combination of character abilities adds an exciting twist, making every game feel fresh and unpredictable.

Choose your game mode

Set up a game in tournament or friendly mode. You can play Soccer Legends solo or co-op with a friend. You can also set up the teams in a 1v1,2v2, 1v2, or 2v1 configuration.

Progress through the tournament

Choose your team and players from a diverse lineup of unique characters, each with their own distinct abilities. Every player comes equipped with one of two special powers—either a fireball kick that blazes across the field with unstoppable force or the ability to teleport, allowing you to quickly reposition and outmaneuver your opponents.

To win the tournament, you will need to keep winning and outplay your increasingly challenging opponents. Master the art of the superkick, which lets you launch the ball at blazing speeds toward your rival’s goal, often catching them off guard.

Basket Random is a chaotic 2-player arcade sports game with unpredictable physics. Bounce and battle for the ball across wild courts, with each dunk launching you to the next level!

How to Play Basket Random

Basket Random shares similar features with other games in the "Random" series: your characters defy the laws of physics and may react unexpectedly to your input. You can challenge the CPU or play with a friend.

This two-player basketball game shares the same concept as a typical basketball game: shoot the ball into the net, but with a few unusual and humorous twists. You can challenge the CPU or play with a friend.

There are two teams, each consisting of two players. Controls guide both your players, but be warned that their actions may not coincide with exactly how you expected them to move. Slam dunks are still very possible!

Use the W key to control player one and the up arrow to control player two. Fight frantically over the basketball, bouncing and spinning in the air, trying to make the shot. Whatever team scores first wins that round. The first team to reach 5 wins the game!

After each basket, you’re transported to a new place where the court and the surroundings have changed, and physics and attire may differ, shaking up each new round with random changes! In some cases, players will have longer arms, in others, the ball might be heavier, or baskets might be worth double points! Bobble around, shooting hoops and having fun in this wacky take on basketball.

Punchers is a 3D boxing sports action game with ragdoll physics. Use move keys to dodge enemy punches and hit back with random punch combinations. You can play against another player or AI.

How to Play Punchers

Punchers throws players into the boxing ring for an intense boxing match where technique is key. Use the WASD keys to maneuver your fighter and get ready to throw jabs, cross punches, and more. The game features both realistic real-time matches as well as slow-motion combat, allowing players to perfect their moves and time their punches with precision.

You’ll be scored on total punches, landed punches, power punches, and accuracy. While you can spam the keys, success depends on skill and precision rather than random attacks. Take advantage of slow-motion mode to practice your moves and learn the timing needed for effective jabs and cross punches.

Each punch has a recovery move, meaning you need to manage your timing carefully. Too many reckless attacks can leave you open for counter-punches. A stamina meter tracks your energy, helping you decide when to go on the offense or focus on defense to recover.

After each round, you’ll get feedback on your performance, including stats like your best punch and overall effectiveness. If you win, expect a fun celebration with cheers, but if you lose, brace yourself for a bit of frustration.

You win when you’ve hit the opponent fatally.

Unique Gamemodes
Tournament: Play a large collection of pre-made and user-made courses with 9 holes each. The fewer strikes you have at the end of the course the better.
Practice: Practice each level individually to improve your shooting and aiming skills. Completing the levels are easy but mastering them takes time.
Versus: Play turn-based matches for up to 4 players locally on the same device. Challenge your friends and family.
Splitscreen: Play on the same device with up to 4 players by dividing the available screen space.
Online multiplayer: Play against your friends in real-time globally.

Wrestle Bros is a pro wrestling sports action game where you can body slam your way to victory in the championships as your favorite character. Unleash a flurry of wrestling moves on your opponents, from aerial assaults to bone-crushing body slams. Get ready to dominate the ring and claim the championship, bro!

How to Play Wrestle Bros

Choose your fight mode

Start your Wrestle Bros game by picking one of the available game modes. You can play immediately in a single-player tournament, invite a friend to play a two-player game on the same PC or join an online wrestling match.

Pick your bro and customize their colors

The game starts with four available Wrestle Bros: Bron Lester, Brogan Paw, Binky Flinch, and Rocky Star. Every Wrestle Bro has unique stats that provide an advantage or handicap when the match starts. You can customize the colors of their outfit to create a signature style that makes the other bros jelly!

Step into the ring

Wrestle various other bros in the ring. You can complete various body-slamming moves like the suplex to make the crowd go wild or punch and kick your opponent senselessly with a flurry of fists. Use props like chairs to add insult to injury and climb the ropes to do powerful body slams. When you’ve got your opponent dizzy, double jump and pin them down for a finisher.

Claim rewards

You’re rewarded with the choice to unlock something new every few games you win. There are loads more wrestlers and moves to unlock as you progress. Keep playing Wrestle Bros to unlock all the extras and become the most fearsome bro in the arena!

More Games Like This

Once you've finished playing Wrestle Bros, try some more of our free fighting games; there are hundreds more to play. One popular game worth checking out is BrutalMania. If you want to play more sports games by Blue Wizard Digital, check out Basket Bros and Soccer Bros! Other sports games worth a try are A Small World Cup and Basket Random for more fun.

Golf Orbit is an exciting golf simulator game within our sports category where you aim to launch golf balls to incredible heights, even reaching Mars. Have fun in one-shot golf battles, complete challenging levels, and master the art of the perfect shot. Compete to become the golf king in this entertaining and unique golfing adventure.

How to Play Golf Orbit

The key to Golf Orbit is to aim and hit the golf ball as far as possible. This one-button game has relatively easy gameplay, but getting that perfect shot can be challenging. Tap and hold your left mouse button to set the power and release to hit the ball. As the ball soars, it bounces off various objects, gaining extra distance but, if you hit a perfect shot, the ball can destroy the obstacles it faces, including trees and buildings.

As in regular golf, if your ball ends in water or in sand bunkers

Your distance will be recorded with each shot, keeping you accountable for your progress. The goal is to achieve the longest distance possible with each swing.

Collect Rewards

Collect coins during the flight to upgrade your equipment and improve your shots. The goal is to achieve the longest distance possible with each swing. Points can be accumulated in various ways. The longer the distance you shoot, the more points you get. You can also unlock points with a surprise spin.

If you score a birdie (hole in 2 shots) or an eagle (hole in one), you'll amass way more points and will be able to improve the features of your future shots.

There are three elements to a perfect shot: strength, speed, and bounce. You can give each one of these a boost with reward points.

Golf Orbit Clubhouse Features

You can swap out aspects of the game at the clubhouse if you have enough points to do so. There are three elements of the game you can change:

Golfer: This is where the game gets fun. You can play as a pro-male golfer or go for something more random, such as a clown and a bowling pin to replace the standard club, a lion in beach shorts who swings with its tail, a samurai with a sword as a club, Santa and his candy cane, a ballerina and a flower club. There are about 24 characters to choose from.
Ball: Change the color of your ball to yellow, pink, blue, orange, and more.
World: Practice your swing from space and other vibrant graphic locations.
More Games Like This

If you're looking for more sports games, there are plenty of exciting options to try!

With Moto X3M you can experiment on wacky tracks and crazy backflips while Eggy Car is a thrilling car game where your mission is to save an egg!

MMA Manager 2 is a dynamic sports management simulation where you take charge of building an MMA empire. Hire top-tier trainers, equip your gyms with cutting-edge gear, and plan strategic fight plans. Scout talented fighters, recruit rising stars and guide them to championship glory. Every decision shapes your path to becoming the ultimate MMA manager.

How to Play MMA Manager 2

To become a champion in MMA Manager 2, you’ll need to start small, build your skills, and work your way up to owning a top-tier gym. Begin by recruiting your first fighter through the roster, where you can either hire a premade fighter or create your own from scratch. When making a fighter, you’ll first choose a weight class and skin type: these don’t affect performance. Then, customize your fighter’s identity with their name, hometown, and country of origin. Next, select a fight-style background, which determines their initial skill set.

Fighting Styles and Primary Skills:

Wrestling: Punches, takedowns, ground grappling. Wrestlers dominate ground positions, delivering powerful blows while keeping opponents pinned.

Taekwondo: High kicks. A risky style relies on complex, high-impact kicks that can be devastating when executed effectively.

Muay Thai (Elbows): Elbows, clinch work. Close-combat specialists use clinches and swift elbow combos to wear opponents down.

Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu (BJJ): Takedowns, ground grappling, submissions. BJJ fighters control ground situations and force opponents to submit with painful holds.

Kickboxing: Punches, low kicks. A striking style blending fast punches and relentless low kicks to overwhelm opponents.

Muay Thai (Knees): Knees, clinch work. Knee-focused Muay Thai fighters deal significant damage with precision strikes during close combat.

After recruiting, your fighters will begin competing in matches, but their actual growth happens in the gym. Train them to enhance their strengths or develop new skills. Training uses stamina, which gradually replenishes over time but cannot exceed a fighter’s maximum capacity. Check stamina levels in the gym view using the stamina ring, and ensure you’re training fighters as soon as they’re ready.

Each match becomes progressively more complex, requiring strategic planning and practical training. Winning fights brings you closer to becoming a professional and achieving your dream of owning the best gym in the business!

More Games Like This

Explore some of our most exciting sports titles, starting with Basketbros, a fast-paced basketball game offering both online and offline gameplay. Next, try A Small World Cup, a mini-soccer game where you control a ragdoll and launch it across the arena to score goals. For a unique twist on soccer, check out Soccer Random, a two-player pixel-art soccer game with limited controls but endless randomness.

Controls

Use the left mouse button to play.

To recruit more fighters in MMA Manager 2, you will need to go to your roster and choose one of the fighters by selecting recruit.

Agility gives you more leeway in MMA Manager 2, increasing your chances of match wins.

Each characteristic offers a different set of skills to defeat your opponent in MMA Manager 2. Agility is important as is endurance and other characteristics.

Penalty Shooters 2 is a soccer game where you shoot penalties in a fantasy league of your choice. You must alternate between the shooter and the goalkeeper in intense penalty shootouts. Win the match to continue in the league and take your shot at becoming the champion.

How to Play Penalty Shooters 2

It's those final minutes of the game. Those tense minutes when penalty shots will make you a champion, lead your team to victory, or send you home. The crowd is roaring. Suspense is in the air. That's what Penalty Shooters 2 is focused on: those final minutes.

You start by choosing your fantasy league from various global leagues. Countries include:

Argentina
Brazil
England
France
Germany
Italy
Mexico
The Netherlands
North America
Russia
Spain

Within each league, you can choose one of the 12 available teams. Their names don’t match the actual soccer clubs, but they are pretty close, and you can figure out who is who if you follow the most important soccer leagues in the world, even though the colors of the jerseys are sometimes very different from the real ones.

There is a short tutorial on maneuvering to play both offense and defense, which is worth reviewing, as these are the key moves to scoring that winning goal.

Focus and concentration will win the game. The game aims to compete in a soccer tournament and win by scoring goals and defending the goal.

Each round has five turns, where you aim to outscore your opponent and advance in this exciting penalty shootout game.

Basketball Orbit is an exhilarating sports basketball simulation game in our sports category, where you aim to launch basketballs to unbelievable heights, even beyond Earth’s atmosphere! Take on thrilling one-shot basketball challenges, conquer tricky levels, and perfect your shooting technique. Compete to become the ultimate basketball legend in this fun and unique basketball adventure!

How to Play Basketball Orbit

Your goal in Basketball Orbit is to sink a basketball into the hoop from over 100 feet away. Don’t worry, you don’t have to make the shot in one go.

Your score is based on strength, speed, and bounce, and those attributes determine your rewards.

This one-click game demands both patience and precision. Watch the color meter in the center of your screen as it flashes red, yellow, orange, and green. Click when the meter hits green for the best shot. A green click sends your ball soaring. Yellow gets you partway, and red? That just keeps the ball bouncing at your feet.

Keep clicking to move forward. Once you're within a few feet of the hoop, you can fine-tune your shot: click and move your mouse to aim directly into the basket.

Head to the locker room to change your character or the game’s background. Some options require upgrades.

Want to boost your skills? Watch ads to earn extra points, then invest those points into strength, speed, or bounce. Max out your stats and aim for the ultimate slam dunk!

Free Kick Classic (3D Free Kick) is an immersive sports soccer game that puts your precision and skill to the ultimate test. Step up to the pitch as you take on the challenge of firing free kicks from a variety of positions, each one more difficult than the last. With stunning 3D graphics and lifelike physics, every shot feels realistic, giving you the thrill of being in a high-stakes match. Your goal is to perfectly execute your free kicks with just three attempts, but as you advance, the obstacles and defensive walls become increasingly difficult to overcome. The pressure mounts with each shot, and only the sharpest players will rise to the occasion.

How to Play Free Kick Classic (3D Free Kick)

Test your aiming skills

Free Kick Classic is a simple game to play, yet it challenges your primary aim and instincts. Click on the ball, drag it toward the net, and release where you want to shoot. You can even affect the direction of the ball in mid-air. It can take a little while to get used to this mechanic, but it’s pretty intuitive and doesn’t take too long to understand.

Survive the pitch

You get three free kicks to make under increasingly difficult conditions. Starting with an empty net, the game progresses to have a goalie and, later, an increasing wall of defenders that really ramps up the challenge. When you’ve missed three goals, it’s game over. You get a high score and the chance to try and beat it in the next game.

Drunken Boxing is a fun sports action ragdoll boxing game that delivers an unpredictable twist on traditional sports gaming. See the chaos that happens when two boxers play when they are a little tipsy in the ring. With its whimsical physics and outrageous character movements, you'll discover that landing a solid punch is far more challenging than it appears—after all, your inebriated state keeps you stumbling and swaying.

How to Play Drunken Boxing

Drunken Boxing gameplay is pretty straightforward using your WASD keys, but each move will yield mixed results, so keep bashing to try and get some kind of ‘punching’ action going. As a physics-based game, each move may appear a bit clumsy, but that’s a natural consequence of your guided controls.

Use the left and right arrows to throw punches with each hand while pressing the down arrow, which shifts you into a defensive stance, retreating and potentially cornering yourself. Conversely, the up arrow propels you into an offensive position, charging forward toward your opponent.

If you’re playing the 2-player game, use WASD to move if you are on the left side. If you’re on the right, use the arrow keys.

Your movements may not always be as crisp as you'd like, so it’s crucial to start punching immediately—hesitate, and you risk being attacked and losing control of your punches.

Your objective is to knock out your opponent before your energy runs out. An energy bar above each player indicates how close you are to a knockout. If your energy depletes completely, you'll be knocked out of the ring and lose the round.

To win the game, you need to be the first to secure five match victories—the first to five takes home the championship! If you're on the left side, use WASD to maneuver; if you're on the right, use the arrow keys.

You can challenge the CPU for practice or join a friend for a head-to-head showdown, just like in many of our other exciting two-player games.

Tap-Tap Shots is an addictive sports game in which you continuously tap to make your basketball jump. It is an endless basketball practice where you aim to get your ball in the net in one shot. The goal is to keep playing until you can't anymore, so you may want to cancel all plans for the evening. Perfectly time your taps to score before the clock runs out, and keep going as long as you can!

How to Play Tap-Tap Shots

The gameplay in Tap-Tap Shots is pretty straightforward: it is a one-button game where each click propels your ball. Depending on your tap, your ball may or may not make the shot.

The net moves to a different height and location each time you make the shot. This will test your click skill. The game, in essence, is an endless series of rounds of practice shots. Your best scores are tallied, incentivizing you to improve upon your performance in the last round.

The key to the game is to find the right rhythm when tapping, hence the name tap-tap. How many taps do you need to make every shot?

Tap-Tap Tips

Keep tapping to move the ball slightly until it reaches the net. If you miss, the ball will come back from the other side.

When you score, another net is created in a new location: an endless cycle until you run out of time!

Time your shots carefully and think fast before you run out of time. If you miss, it’s best to click quickly to get back around and try for another shot, but make sure you don’t overshoot again!

Get “On Fire”

When you score a few baskets in a row, the ball will become hot and burst into flames. This is an indicator of a successful scoring streak, as well as a way to score bonus points. You can additionally get bonus points for clean shots that don’t touch the rim.

Soccer Random is a two-player pixel-art soccer game with limited controls but unlimited randomness. Players hop and kick on the pitch with just one click, trying to score a goal with limited movement. You can choose a one-player game against the computer or two-player with a friend as your opponent.

How to Play Soccer Random

The game rules and control are fairly simple. There is no strategy involved in Soccer Random; you will simply need to out-click your opponent till you score a goal.

Use the up arrow or left-click to do your signature and only move. Each team has two players, and they move simultaneously. Each click controls both characters on your team, but only sometimes, as you would want. You can also hold your kick in the air by pressing and holding the action button. This can be useful when kicking randomly or doing nothing could work against you. Though sometimes doing nothing and just standing there can indeed score you a winning goal.

After each goal in Soccer Random, you are transported to a new location with different characters. To win the game, one team must reach five wins before the other!

You can play Soccer Random solo or with a friend. Playing a two-player game evokes more action on the field, so try both and see which is more fun.

What’s so random about Soccer Random?

The game's rules are straightforward - get the ball in the net to score a goal. Everything else is pretty much well… random. You will be playing with different backdrops, which include beach, cityscapes, snow fields, at nighttime, in broad daylight - you name it. The setting is random. The uniforms change as well. You may be wearing white, blue, or red. You may also be playing in the snow in your underwear or perhaps swimsuits. It’s hard to tell. It is random. The ball changes as well. Sometimes, you play with a classic soccer ball, other times with an American football, tennis ball, and even an inflatable beach ball. Even the players change with each match. It is random.

Tips

Even if the moves are limited, you do want to be reactive, as the ball can quite easily drift under or over your player’s heads. Keep an eye on both players you are controlling. One is offense, and the other is the goalkeeper. One-click controls both, and moves between your two players don’t always align, so decide whose move is more important based on your opponent's moves.

Basketball Legends 2020 is the popular sequel to Basketball Stars 2019. This two-player basketball game lets you play as iconic basketball players like Luka Doncic, James Harden, and LeBron James in bobblehead form!

How to Play Basketball Legends 2020

Play solo or with a friend

You can play with a friend in 2-player mode or solo in Basketball Legends 2020. The AI characters are challenging if you’re solo.

Unique teams and abilities

You can play 1 vs. 1 or 2 vs. 2 matches with various cartoon basketball players. Choose a basketball team that represents your state or one that you support. Each team player has a unique ability.

Various game modes

You can play full tournaments, and if you’re looking for a quick game of B-ball, quick play mode has you covered. Train your skills in training and random matches!

Classic basketball moves

Basketball Legends stays true to the spirit of basketball with three-pointers, alley-oops, and epic slam dunks that score you impressive points. Dash around and do epic jump shots to keep your opponent on their toes.

Unique features of Basketball Legends 2020

In this game, you’ll have the opportunity to perform sci-fi style slam dunks, aka supershots, when the charge on the top left is complete, but be aware that it is not available for each of the available players in the game.

Something that differentiates Basketball Legends from other titles of the same genre is that each character has specific abilities and, for example, the mega slam dunk won’t be available if you are playing with Steph Curry, who is notoriously a great shooter and a passer but not an acrobatic dunker.

Each player in Basketball Legends can have one of these special abilities:

mega dunk
defense
fast break

So you’ll need to experiment with all of them and find the special ability that blends better with your style of play.

There are 16 teams available, each mimicking the logo and name of some of the most popular NBA franchises, and 3 players to choose from within each team. The players also bear an unmistakable resemblance to some of the most famous NBA stars.

Basketball Superstars is a dynamic basketball experience where you create and train your ultimate player. Customize your gear, enhance your skills, and face intense rivals in fast-paced matches. Whether you are outsmarting opponents or perfecting your strategy, each game delivers action and excitement as you strive to dominate the court and showcase your prowess.

How to Play Basketball Superstars

Basketball Stars is a fast-paced, arcade-style basketball game where you compete in one-on-one matches. Use the Arrow Keys to move around the court and dribble past your opponent. Press and hold the Spacebar to shoot, releasing it at the right moment for a perfect shot. If you're close to the hoop, pressing Spacebar will let you perform a slam dunk. On defense, you can steal the ball by getting close to your opponent and tapping Spacebar when they’re dribbling. Time your jumps carefully to block incoming shots.

Aggressive play is key in Basketball Stars! When your opponent is on offense, stay close and look for the perfect moment to steal the ball. Time your movements carefully: when they’re dribbling, tap Spacebar to snatch it away. If they go for a shot, jump at the right moment to block it.

Once you have possession, don’t hesitate, drive toward the hoop and take your shot. Whether you’re aiming for a long-range jumper or a slam dunk, act fast and keep the pressure on. Quick decisions and relentless attacks will keep your opponent on their toes and give you the edge in every match!

As you play, you’ll earn coins scattered around the court and receive rewards for winning matches. You can claim free daily stars and upgrade your coins, stars, and tickets to enhance your gameplay. Special packs are available for purchase, offering different combinations of tickets, stars, and coins.

Packs include:

Super Pack 1: 1 ticket, 3 stars, 2,000 coins
Super Pack 2 (Most Popular): 1 ticket, 8 stars, 7,500 coins
Super Pack 3 (Biggest Boost): 1 ticket, 20 stars, 15,000 coins

Customization is a key part of the experience, allowing you to change your basketball outfit and modify your character’s appearance. Your performance is graded based on defense, shooting, speed, and dunking, so strategize your playstyle to dominate the court!

Soccer Bros is a fast-paced soccer game that delivers the ultimate adrenaline rush with its one-on-one soccer battles! Choose from a diverse lineup of quirky and dynamic characters, each bringing their unique flair to the field.

Dive into the excitement of the game, where you can customize your players to reflect your style and unlock even more characters as you climb the ranks. Whether playing locally with friends, competing online against global opponents, or honing your skills solo, Soccer Bros offers endless hours of high-energy soccer action.

How to Play Soccer Bros

There are various game modes to select in Soccer Bros. If you want to play immediately, click “play now” to join a single-player match. The other available game modes include local 2-player, tournament, practice, and the option to create/join an online multiplayer game.

Choose your bro

Soccer Bros features real-life soccer superstars, each with their unique abilities. Check out their stats. Every player has strengths and weaknesses. Experiment with their playing styles and see which one works best for you. You'll notice that some characters have unusual names, but a closer look reveals a resemblance to those of real soccer stars, such as Lionel Messi, Cristiano Ronaldo, and Thomas Müller. The more you progress and win games, the more "bros" you'll unlock. This game is peculiar because, first in its genre, it contains characters from the world of women's soccer, like Megan Rapinoe, for example.

Play soccer!

Soccer Bros features great user-friendly controls. Maneuver with the arrow keys or WASD, and smash the spacebar for high-octane shots and tackles. Show off your skills, score mind-bending goals, master penalty kicks, and outsmart your adversary in this high-speed showdown! Matches are one vs. one, with hands moving across to mimic the presence of a goalkeeper. Rough tackles are allowed, but sometimes the referee will punish them and award a penalty to the attacker even if the tackle was far from the goal!

Unlock new items

After every few wins, you’ll have the option to unlock an item or player. You can unlock players with new skills and abilities, along with various logos and cosmetic items to equip your players with. You can also customize the color of your kit!

More Games Like This

If you enjoyed playing Soccer Bros, check out more of our soccer games.

Additional fun will be provided by some of our top casual games, such as Snow Rider or Eggy Car.

This developer also made the smash-hit web game Shell Shockers.

Ragdoll Soccer: 2 Players is a sports soccer game that delivers the ultimate blend of soccer and chaos, where wobbly ragdoll physics takes over the field for hilarious and unpredictable gameplay! Step into the shoes (or, more accurately, the floppy limbs) of a stickman player and take on the challenge solo or face off against a friend in intense local multiplayer. With a variety of modes like Championship, Penalty Shootout, and single-player, there's never a dull moment.

How to Play Ragdoll Soccer 2 Players

In Ragdoll Soccer, the game kicks off with a tutorial, so pay close attention because the wobbly physics can be tricky! Use the classic WASD keys to move your ragdoll player, and press Q for a headbutt and E for a kick. Mastering these controls is essential, but be prepared for some chaotic and hilarious moments, as your stickman will often flop and flail unpredictably.

Boosters add an extra layer of fun and strategy. Use the Small Ball for more control, Freeze to freeze opponents in their tracks, Gates to block or trap your rival, and Goalkeeper to defend your goal.

Choose from several game modes, including Training, Classic Match, or challenge a friend in 2-player mode with either a classic match or penalty shootout. If you’re feeling adventurous, try the Field or Matrix modes, where the pitch is a bit more... abyss-like!

The ragdoll mechanics are what make this game truly unique – your player moves like an inflatable tube man, so you never know which direction your limbs will flail next! Earn upgrade points by completing challenges or watch an ad to unlock new Stickman skins. The unpredictability is part of the fun, and it’s all about embracing the chaos while trying to score those hilarious goals.

Master the art of scoring spectacular goals, utilizing unique boosters and abilities to outsmart your opponent, and enjoy the unpredictable hilarity that comes with every kick. Unlock a range of skins and new arenas, ensuring each match feels fresh and exciting. Whether you're scoring goals in dramatic fashion or laughing at your own wobbly mishaps, Ragdoll Soccer delivers non-stop fun, epic moments, and a dose of competitive action you won’t want to miss.

More Games Like This

Stay in the game and explore some of our most exciting sports titles, including popular soccer games like Soccer Random, a two-player wacky soccer game where timing is everything and control is chaos; A Small World Cup, a fun mini-soccer sports game where you control a rag doll and slam it against the arena to make the ball score a goal. Penalty Shooters 3 is a sports soccer game that gives you all the excitement of those final shots into just one game! You get to be both the shooter and the goalkeeper, so you can both nail the perfect shot and make the game-changing save. The game offers two dynamic modes: Tier Mode, where you’ll climb through six increasingly challenging tiers, and the prestigious World Cup, where you’ll compete in iconic arenas to prove if you're ready for the big leagues. Personalize your team with unique jerseys and unlock over 250 teams. With adaptive AI that becomes more skilled as you advance, power-ups to enhance your performance, and achievements to unlock, every match feels like a nail-biting finale.

How to Play Penalty Shooters 3

Penalty Shooters 3 lets you switch from ball shooter to goalkeeper, so you get to learn the playing ground from all angles. You start the game by choosing the mode you want to play in. If you choose Tier Mode, you will be met with six challenges (Tier 1 - Tier 6). You can only access Tier 1 to begin with until you win enough trophies to unlock other tiers.

How many trophies do you need to unlock various tiers?

Tier 2: 15 trophies
Tier 3: 70 trophies
Tier 4: 170 trophies
Tier 5: 350 trophies
Tier 6: 700 trophies

The gameplay is pretty intuitive—you click, hold, and release to kick the penalty shot when you are the shooter, and similar gameplay of clicking and blocking when you are the goalkeeper.

If you want to play in World Cup mode, you must play three matches in tier challenge to unlock World Cup mode. Customize your players' jerseys to make them cool! Test your timing skills with a single click. Compete against AI that will adapt and become more skilled as you progress. There are 250+ whimsical teams, power-ups, and achievements, so the excitement will never stop. Get ready to claim victory!

Defending

Select a power-up to enhance your chances.
Keep an eye on the shot power indicator.
Wait for the target to appear on the screen.
Tap the target to make a quick dive and block the shot.

Pro Tip: If your opponent is taking a slow shot, time your dive by tapping slightly later for a better chance of saving it.

Shooting

Observe your opponent’s position and the shot power.
Press and hold anywhere on the screen to charge your shot.
Release to take the kick—aim for accuracy and power.

Pro Tip: Mix up your shooting style! The goalkeeper learns from your moves, so keep them guessing to outsmart them.

More Games Like This

If you want to continue with more sports games, have a go at some of our more popular soccer titles. Soccer Random and A Small World Cup are two great titles!

Press the left mouse button (or press the screen) to start the shot.
Keep it pressed while the shot target is moving.
Release the button at the right moment to kick the ball.

Wait for the opponent's shooting target to appear.
Tap on the target to dive with your goalkeeper.

Note: Timing is key. Perfect your shooting and goalkeeping skills to outscore your opponents!

Penalty Shooters 3 is a point-and-click soccer game where you get to be both the shooter and the goalkeeper in a game full of penalty shots!

Cozy Golf is a relaxing golf adventure that invites you to unwind across beautifully designed courses filled with charm and color. You’ll perfect your swing, line up satisfying shots, and enjoy a calm atmosphere backed by soothing music. Easy to learn yet delightfully challenging, it’s the ideal escape for anyone who loves precision and peaceful competition.

Features
Beautiful Courses: Explore 3 unique courses, each with 9 handcrafted holes (27 in total). And look out for more courses in future updates!
Star-Based Progression: Master each hole by aiming for Par or better! You'll earn 3 stars for being under par, 2 stars for par, and 1 star for a bogey. Use your collected stars to unlock new courses and take on fresh challenges.
Relaxing Atmosphere: Enjoy a calm soundtrack, satisfying sound effects, and lovely animations that make every shot, splash, and hole-in-one a delight.
Player-Friendly Design: Get the perfect overview with a switchable bird's-eye camera. Made a mistake? No problem! Use the handy "undo" button to retry your last shot.
Guide
Click and hold the golf ball.
Drag downwards and away from the ball. A trajectory line will appear.
The distance you drag determines the power of your shot.
The direction you drag (left or right) sets your aim.
At the end of the trajectory, you'll see an accuracy indicator with a moving arrow. To hit the ball straight, release the mouse button (or your finger) when the arrow is exactly in the center. Releasing it off-center will cause your shot to curve left or right.
Camera View (Top-Left): Tap the icon to toggle between the standard 3D view and a top-down bird's-eye view for a better look at the hole.
Undo Shot (Bottom-Right): Next to the Par info, this button lets you take back your last stroke and try again.
Menu (Top-Right): Access the menu to restart the current hole, adjust sound and music settings, or exit to the course selection screen.

Pill Soccer is a 2-player sports game where you control 3D pill-shaped characters to score more goals than your opponent. You can play with the computer as your opponent or with friends.

How to Play Pill Soccer

There are several options. You can choose from quick matches, two-player matches, or an entire tournament.

Use either the WASD or arrow keys to control your character. The aim of the game is to score more goals than your opponent. There is no kicking button in Pill Soccer. The best way to kick the ball is to push it. The harder you push, the further the ball will bounce towards your goal. You can also jump and use your head to get that goal.

Soccer Pill is fun and quick, keeping you on your toes. The game controls are simple, but your player will act fast, so don’t underestimate how much power a click can provide.

Tips
Practice with some of the quick matches to solidify your gameplay. Learn a few key moves to set yourself up for goals, and you should be ready for a tournament in no time.
When the ball moves behind your pill but hasn’t quite hit the goal yet, don’t react. Go slow, jump backward, and become a goalkeeper to protect your net.

CarBall.io is an adrenaline-packed fusion of soccer and high-speed sports driving game reminiscent of Rocket League. Rev up your engines and dive into intense matches to dominate the leagues. Unlock, purchase, and upgrade your cars to reign supreme in this thrilling automotive showdown. Gear up and become the ultimate champion of CarBall.io!

How to Play CarBall.io

What do you get when you mix a soccer game with a driving game? You get CarBall.io. This unique game combines elements of driving gameplay, such as nitro boosts, with traditional soccer elements, including opposing teams, goal post defense, and offensive strategy. It may sound like an odd combination, but you will immediately love the combination as soon as you find yourself chasing a giant soccer ball across a field with bumper-to-bumper cars inadvertently cornering you as you try to bounce it with the hood of your car.

The game's objective is to score as many goals as possible in your opponent's net. You are part of a team of 3 cars, and AI controls your teammates. Scoring is easier said than done when you're driving. You will essentially need to push the ball with a car, and plenty of other cars will surround you with the same goal, so expect traffic jams.

The game offers limited customization options, but some features are available. You can choose the team color you'd like to join and the type of car you want to drive. This part is key. Select the car that aligns with your strengths and weaknesses. Each car is equipped with different attributes, all of which can be upgraded as you accumulate points.

These are:

Health: you car’s durability. Increasing this quality means you can withstand more collisions without impacting your car’s efficiency
Speed: your car’s maximum velocity
Damage: this has to do with your power to damage other cars on the field
MaxNitro: this quality relates to the duration of your speed boosts
Nitro Fill: a higher nitro fill increases the rate at which the meter regenerates after each usage
Tips

It's a driving game, so drifting is inevitable, especially when using your nitro boost. Stay balanced, and don't lose sight of the goal. When you drift, you can easily miss all gameplay, leaving all point scoring to your teammates.

Sometimes, the easiest way to turn is to make a 180-degree turn with your car. Use your brakes in combination with nitro boosts for sharper turns.

There is no official goalkeeper, so if you see your goal unmanned and the opposing team is getting close to scoring, this is a great chance to use your nitro boost and protect the goal net from opposing shots.

Be careful about damaging your car by crashing into walls and other players on the field: your performance will be affected if you have too many collisions, and these might prevent you from being effective.

More Games Like This

CarBall.io is a unique mixture of sports and driving. If you want to try a few more sports games, defend your goal in Soccer Random or A Small World Cup.

If you prefer driving games, popular titles to try include Friday Night Funkin' or Moto X3M.

Volley Random is a fun two-player sports volleyball game where the simple controls meet chaotic and wacky physics. This one-click button game lets you jump, spike, and scramble your way to victory, all with a few clicks. Keep alert because each move is pretty much unpredictable. Face off against your opponent in a series of random levels that keep you guessing. Voley Random is easy to play but tough to master, so keep playing!

How to Play Volley Random

Volley Random is a very unique take on classic volleyball. Use your single-button control to hop both your characters up in the air to hit the ball. You can’t control the direction of your players. Instead, you have to rely only on your timing skills and wits to beat your friend.

Each round of this 2-player game is marked by a different theme, ball, and changes in the game physics. In some rounds, you’ll have a football or longer arms; in others, the ball will be bigger or heavier. There are many possibilities. You’re transported to a new scenario with every goal scored. There are various wacky changes to keep you on your toes! You can play Volley Random with a friend or solo against the computer.

You will play in a variety of fun and unpredictable locations, with wacky physics that keeps every match exciting and fresh. The simple one-button controls make jumping right into the chaos easy, whether you're playing solo or challenging a friend in two-player mode. The ever-changing physics ensures no two matches are the same, adding a layer of unpredictability that keeps you on your toes. Get ready for hilarious volleys and non-stop fun as you aim to outscore your opponent!

More Games Like This

If you enjoyed the game dynamics of Volley Random, you would love similar game titles like Basket Random and Soccer Random, two hilarious versions of classic sports games.

Bloxd.io is an IO adventure game with Minecraft-style visuals and multiple game modes, including parkour challenges, creative sandbox building, and combat-based gameplay.

How to Play Bloxd.io

Bloxd.io is a sandbox game in which you navigate challenging obstacle courses by timing your jumps and movements accurately. In survival mode, you gather resources, craft tools, and fend off enemies to stay alive. There are several game modes to choose from to start the game, each with a variety of challenges.

Bloxd.io Game Modes

Choose from one of the many game modes to begin your Bloxd.io journey.

BloxdHop.io

In the BloxdHop game mode your mission is to reach the end of the map within the given timeframe. To reach the end, you must hop through the level parkour-style onto blocks of various sizes.

DoodleCube

This game mode is similar to drawing games like Gartic.io. Players create objects based on the theme presented, and other users vote on how representative they are of that object.

EvilTower

The mission is to reach the top of the Evil Tower! Similar to BloxdHop, you use your parkour skills to reach the end. EvilTower is inspired by Roblox’s Tower of Hell.

Peaceful

Peaceful mode is like creative mode in Minecraft. You can roam freely collecting resources and building here.

CubeWarfare

This game mode adds exciting battles. Compete against other players in a third-person shooter setting where you can also build blocks.

Full list of game modes.

Bloxd.io is regularly updated with fun new features and modes. Here is a selection of current game modes.

EvoWars.io is an IO battle game set in a top-down online battle arena. Collect orbs and battle other players to evolve your warrior. Each evolution improves your weapon range but slows your movement. How many will you slay before you fall?

How to Play EvoWars.io

Embark on an epic quest across the digital battlefield, where you’ll collect powerful orbs to evolve your warrior into unstoppable forms. As you slash through enemies with swords, axes, and a brutal arsenal of weapons, each battle pushes you closer to becoming the ultimate warrior. With more than 15 unique character models to unlock, your journey is one of constant evolution and power.

You control a constantly advancing warrior with your mouse, swinging your weapon to defeat enemies and collect XP to evolve into stronger forms with bigger weapons and greater attack range. As you play, you'll unlock more evolutions and customize your warrior with different weapons and gear to eliminate all other fighters on the field while growing stronger.

As you accumulate points, you will be able to upgrade gameplay dynamics. It will take some time to reach your desired destination. It's not the easiest game to master.

The key to this 2D top-down game is winning battles. Each victory allows you to grow stronger, but the battlefield isn’t just about brute strength; you’ll need to define your play style and use every opportunity to outmaneuver your enemies. Whether you’re charging headfirst into combat or taking a more tactical approach, dominance is at your fingertips.

There is a very large online community around EvoWars.io and when playing it you'll face opponents from every part of the world: it is particularly popular in Vietnam, where it is one of the most popular browser games.

Game modes in EwoWars.io
Deatmatch: Free For All, the classic Battle Royale mode where everyone is an enemy
Teams: you are part of one of the two teams, either red or blue, and your objective is to defend the team’s Guardian while defeating enemies and, ultimately, the enemy’s Guardian
Duel: a 1 vs 1 match with a random opponent. You and they both start at a random level. The first to win three duels wins the match
Monster Hunt: a cooperative mode where you and the other players face hordes of AI-controlled monsters
Classic: it’s the old version of EvoWars
Tips
Focus on collecting orbs around the outside of the map when you are at a low level rather than battling against other players.
Your weapon range improves as you grow larger, but you also become slower, so remember to remain cautious and alert.
When you're smaller, you can move faster; use this to your advantage and play more evasively at lower levels
Features
Intense slashing gameplay to eliminate opponents
You can level up to increase the size and evolve to more than 15 character models
Define your play style and use every opportunity as much as possible
Sprint ability at the cost of your experience points
More IO game action

If you like EvoWars, make sure to try our other smash hit .io games, such as Agar.io, and ZombsRoyale.io.

If you are up for something different, try Sprunki or Friday Night Funkin', instead.

Growden.io is an .io farming game where you manage a small plot of land, starting off with some carrot seeds and a vision for success! This community-based game is based on progressive management of your farm, so be sure to stay logged in to get the whole experience. Grow a garden from a humble carrot and tomato harvest to a gorgeous, rare plant paradise filled with blossoms, fruits, and exotic crops that showcase your farming mastery!

How to Play Growden.io

Growden is one of those games you start playing on a random evening and find yourself still playing two months later. Its rotating community rooms filled with players from all around the world, constant reward system, and continuous growth cycle make this game very hard to put down.

You start with basic $10 carrot seeds that disappear once you pick them. Then you move on to strawberry seeds for $50. Work your way up to something more uncommon, like blueberry seeds for $100, or rare seeds like tomato seeds for $800. (The rarer, the more expensive!)

How to plant seeds and harvest in Growden:
Buy seeds, then click on them in your inventory to put them in your hands.
Click on the brown plots in your farm to place them wherever you want them to grow.
Wait as your plant begins to grow. (Meet other farmers or shop as you wait!)
Once it’s fully grown, harvest by clicking E and enjoy the rewards!
Sell your plants at the shop when ready.

When you've mastered the basics of farming, you will soon find yourself itching to save for the ultimate seed (cue the music): the moon blossom, which costs tens of millions.

Everyone Wants the Moon Blossom

Before you get to the moon blossom, you’re likely going to encounter any one of these seeds: eggplant, bamboo, pepper, beanstalk, pumpkin, cacao, cauliflower, cactus, watermelon, dragonfruit, mango, coconut, nectarine, pear, avocado, banana, pinklily, pineapple, kiwi, candy blossom, cherry blossom, or sugar apple.

Slow and steady wins the farm race, but once you get a candy blossom or cherry blossom, you’re likely to reach a whole new level of farming where your earnings begin reaching six or seven figures.

The more money you have, the more you can deck out your garden. Buy eggs at the egg shop. Each garden is allowed five pets. Pets help you harvest—not too much, but considering the game allows them to harvest while idle or away, you could find yourself with interesting items in your backpack when you’re back from a break.

Only 100 items fit into your backpack, so after each harvest, be sure to go sell your goods. You can sell one thing, price your items, or sell your entire inventory. It’s always fun to price new, shiny, and one-of-a-kind fruits.

Mutated Plants

Mutations on your plants happen during weather events. Mutated plants are worth more. The types of direct mutations are: Silver, Golden, Rainbow, and BIG mutations (which make your plants HUGE; this is a very rare mutation).

There are currently 5 weather events, with more coming soon: Daytime, Nighttime, Desert, Rain, and Frosty. Grow a Garden is receiving continuous updates, which will unlock new weather events, mutations, seeds, plants, and more.

Gifts in Growden

This is a community-based game. The community is very active and includes a Discord channel. Where there is community, there is sharing. Depending on what room you are in, you can find some very generous players who gift you expensive flowers or fruits.

On the downside, there is also stealing, but this is a bit less common than kindness in these gardens. There is a chat, and if a farmer steals, you will get a notification and can call them out. Usually, a public note will deter further stealing.

Essential Tips to Grow a Garden in Growden.io
Stay logged in so you can keep your progress. If you log out and refresh your browser, you're likely going to lose your garden.
If you ever feel uncomfortable in a room, refresh your page, and it will get you to a new room.
Stay anonymous in the chat and don't give out any personal info.
More Games Like This

If you like Growden, you may want to check out our .io selection of games with classics like Agario, or go for similar graphics in Bloxd.io, or try something different like Skribbl.io.

Controls
WASD and arrow keys = move
Space = jump
E = pick up plants or talk to the seed shop/sell area
Hold the right mouse button = move the camera
FAQ
Is Grow a Garden on CrazyGames?

Growden: Grow a Garden is on CrazyGames and can be played for free on desktop or mobile.

Is Grow a Garden free to play?

Yes, Grow a Garden: Growden is free to play, depending on where you play it. CrazyGames features Grow a Garden: Growden for free.

Why is Grow a Garden so addictive?

There are several reasons it's hard to put Grow a Garden down. There is a very generous reward system that incentivizes players to keep coming back, and the community in the rooms is constantly rotating, which makes each room a completely new social adventure.

Smash Karts is a 3D multiplayer IO kart battle game. Drive your go-kart, pick up weapons, and blow up other karts to win! Keep playing to level up and unlock new characters and prizes.

How to Play Smash Karts
Battle and earn XP

Face off with other players in the arena for 3 minutes of kart-smashing mayhem. The game features several maps to explore, and it is continually updated with new ones. Each public match you play will give you XP, which you can then use to level up. 

Leveling up will reward you with coins, hats, wheels, and character tokens. You can use character tokens in the prize machine to unlock new characters with varying rarity levels.

Pick up weapons

Drive over the boxes containing question marks to pick up random weapons and power-ups. You’ll find anything from invincibility to missiles, machine guns, and mines to use against your opponents. Get in your kart and cause some chaos!

Available Weapons

Rockets: fairly straightforward, helpful for hitting opponents in front of you.
Machine Gun: it rapidly fires several projectiles and can take down enemies around you, as long as you are close by.
Bullets: with these, you’ll fire a series of bullets that will go straight from your position. It can be useful to fire at enemies in crowded contexts or on long, straight alleys.
Mines: you can deploy three mines that serve as a static trap for your challengers. Mines are particularly effective when placed around corners or hidden behind item boxes.
Cannonballs: using this will send four cannonballs in the direction of your choice. Cannonballs require precision to be effective, but can eliminate multiple adversaries simultaneously.
Spiky-Go-Round: activating the spiky-go-round will add rotating balls with spikes to your vehicle, which will make any contact with opponents lethal for them.
Nuke: a very powerful missile that has a wide impact radius.
Lobgrenuke: with a lobgrenuke you are placing a TNT-like static bomb on the ground. It gets activated when one of your enemies passes nearby or a few seconds after deployment.
Snowball Blaster: fires ice at opponents and blocks them for 3 seconds in a block of ice. Touching this block while active will eliminate the kart containing it.
Invincibility: the most powerful of all weapons, allows you to neutralize any shot aimed at you and, at the same time, to take down any kart by simply touching it.
Customize your kart!

FrontWars.io is a multiplayer .io battle game where players battle it out to dominate as much of the globe as possible. You begin small and slowly work your way to conquer the world. Take control of 72% of the map, and victory is yours.

How to Play Front Wars

Front Wars is a real-time strategy game where you go to war with other players in an attempt to expand your territory and protect your people. The game panels are pretty intricate and give you a lot of info to keep track of attacks and alliances. Use these wisely to plan your next moves.

The Event Panel shows everything happening in the game. You’ll see alliance requests, incoming attacks, and Quick Chat messages. You can focus on a player sending an alliance request, track incoming attacks, and retreat troops if needed, though this costs 25 percent of your attacking troops. Boats can return to their starting point if the land has changed hands, but nukes cannot be recalled. Quick Chat makes it easy to send preset messages or emojis to allies and opponents.

Alliances are important. You can send or receive troops and gold to help your allies, whether they are under attack or building up their strength. Betraying an ally ends the alliance, pauses trade for a few minutes, and leaves you with weaker defenses. You’ll also be marked as a traitor for 30 seconds, so think carefully before making a move. Bots and human players react differently depending on your actions, so diplomacy matters.

The Radial Menu is your main control hub. Right-click a location to build, attack, send boats, request alliances, or betray an ally. The Options Panel lets you pause or unpause the game, check the timer, access settings, and see detailed information about other players. Hover over a country to see if it’s a human, a smart AI, or a bot, and find out how they feel about you.

The Game UI helps you track your progress. The leaderboard shows top players by land, troops, and gold, while the control panel lets you adjust your attack ratios. Icons tell you who is an ally, a traitor, or has stopped trading, which helps with planning your next move.

Buildings and Units in Front Wars
City: Increases population and lets you expand your territory
Defense Post: Protects borders, slows enemy attacks, and increases enemy losses
Port: Lets you build Warships and trade with other ports, either automatically or manually
Warship: Patrols water, intercepts enemy trade ships, and attacks enemy vessels
Missile Silo: Launches atomic, hydrogen, or MIRV bombs
SAM Launcher: Intercepts enemy missiles with different success depending on the type of bomb

Bombs have different effects. Atom Bombs cause localized destruction, Hydrogen Bombs hit larger areas, and MIRVs split to hit multiple points, affecting only the player you targeted.

Interacting with other players is simple:

Chat messages and emojis let you communicate quickly
Target markers help coordinate attacks with allies
Alliance requests grow your network of support

Tips

Always try to help allies with troops or gold to strengthen relationships. Focusing on building relationships in Front Wars is key to winning.

More Games Like This

Check out our .io category for more battle games like this one. Try 1v1 LOL, Diep.io, or Smash Karts, and continue the fun!

C = Center camera on player

WASD = move camera
1 / 2 = decrease/increase attack ratio
Shift + Mouse Wheel Up/Down = decrease/increase attack ratio
\ + R = reset graphics
Middle Mouse Button → Auto-upgrade nearest building

Military games sure do exist. Front Wars is a classic battle io game, ideal for strategy seekers.

Can I play Front Wars on my phone?

Front Wars is available on mobile, as well as desktop and Steam.

Shell Shockers (Shellshock.io) is a multiplayer .io FPS game featuring eggs armed with guns. You control one of these weapon-wielding eggs in one of four online game modes where the aim is to shatter your opponents with bullets and bombs. It's the ultimate online egg shooting game!

Kids love games where they shoot other players. Whatever you think about guns this seems to always be the case. We let our children play Shell Shockers before the older rating games with guns because it's a less violent way to have fun online. In fact, they enjoyed it so much that even though they are older they still go back to play this again and again.

Review by FamilyGamingDatabase.

How to Play Shell Shockers

Jump into the game and select your character name, customize your egg,  and choose one of four game modes. In this game, you must work hard to protect yourself and dish out damage to opposing eggs. Try out each game mode and see if you can conquer the Shell Shockers arena. 

Tips and tricks
Play tactically
Act quickly
Collect egg ammunition
Think like an egg
Game modes
Teams

Join a team (either red or blue) and fight against the enemy eggs until your team has the most kills collectively.

Free For All

Every egg for themselves. If you see an egg, you shoot. Unless you want to be scrambled yourself. There is only one winner in this mode.

Captula the Spatula

Two teams battle for control of the spatula. The team with the spatula earns points for kills, but these can be lost if the player holding the spatula dies.

King of the Coop

King of the Coop was added in December 2021 with a host of cosmetic items and a new map. Two teams battle to capture a defined area known as the coop. The players on the winning team get 250 golden eggs each!

Weapons

There are seven main weapon types in Shell Shockers. Each weapon has its advantages and drawbacks. If you have eggcellent aim, a weapon like the Crackshot would be great. If you’re more of a spray-and-pray type, try out the Whipper. The complete weapon list for Shell Shockers is:

EggK-47 - classic medium-range automatic
Scrambler - high-damage shotgun
Free Ranger - semi-automatic sniper rifle
RPEGG - huge damage RPG
Whipper - close to medium range rapid-fire rifle
Crackshot - bolt-action sniper rifle
TriHard - accurate medium-range burst-fire rifle

Additionally, each player has an additional gun and can pick up grenades from the map.

Currency

The game uses Golden Eggs as currency; you can use them to upgrade the way your character appears in the game or the weapons it uses. Mind you, using the Golden Eggs in the shop won’t allow you to buy items that give you an advantage during combat.

For more online shooting games, check out our multiplayer io games and browse the selection, which includes the highly popular Agar io.

If you are looking for something totally different, consider trying Bubble Shooter or 2048.

Taming.io is a survival-based .io game where magical pets aid you in combat. Gather resources, build your base, and evolve through upgrades while battling rivals and their creatures.

How to Play Taming.io
Craft and Upgrade

In the beginning, it’s just you and your pet. You can choose to spawn besides a wolf, a rabbit or a bear. You should quickly start harvesting resources to defend yourself, attack others and generate additional future resources.

You can collect four different types of goods:

Wood
Stone
Food
Gold

Wood and Stone are essential to create tools and weapons, but also to build your base and the defensive structures supporting it.

Food is useful to heal and to recover stamina, while gold is used to buy equipment, but it also contributes to your score.

As you start your harvest, you begin aging and each time you age, you’ll receive a selection of rewards that boost your capabilities as a survivor. These rewards can be anything from food items to recovery health, tools, and weapons.

Waste no time getting started. Start building your fortress and fortify it with walls and turrets. One of the most important buildings to unlock for your base is the windmill. This structure generates gold for you automatically.

Tame Pets

The unique angle of Taming is the pet battles. You can choose from a selection of pets at the start, but you can also tame up to two additional wild animals. The primary method for discovering new beasts to tame is to locate wild baby animals on the map; these are often found sleeping. There is no guarantee that the animal you are approaching will be happy to be tamed, but you can increase your chances of success by using items like apples and stones, which give you a 1% boost to tame certain animals.

You can also equip yourself with special gear, like the Tamer’s Cap and the Luck Hat, as well as a dedicated tool that shoots apples, aptly named the Appletor, to have more opportunities to tame animals.

Any animal has a magical type, and there are four different types of magic in Taming.io:

Fire
Water
Plant
Electric

Try to build a squad of pets with complementary magic types to increase your chances of success in this game.

Build a Team

Since Taming is a multiplayer .io game, you share the world with numerous other gamers. It’s a good idea to get in touch with some of them to form a team. Doing it alone will be more challenging as you face other teams and higher-level players who will dominate you.

More Games Like This

Taming.io is similar to other multiplayer io games, such as Agar io.

A different approach to playing with animal-like creatures is found in Sprunki, where you use them to create music. Another musical game on CrazyGames, although unrelated to the world of animals, is Friday Night Funkin’.
