Poxel.io is a, io fast-paced first-person shooter that throws you into intense pixelated battles across diverse maps. Choose from a wide arsenal of weapons, master different game modes, and outplay your rivals to claim the top spot. Every match is a test of skill and strategy: do you have what it takes to dominate the battlefield?

How to Play Poxel.io

Invite your friends to play with you by hosting a game with them and playing in real-time together. Play the game more to continue progressing and advancing your levels so you can earn PX coins and buy skins, characters, hats, back items, and more! Keep playing the game, and you can eventually reach the top of the leaderboard, so you can show the world that you are #1 in Poxel.io

Poxel.io is fast-paced multiplayer chaos where sharp reflexes and smart movement are your keys to survival. You’ll need eyes in the back of your head to stay alive and to climb your way to the top of the leaderboard.

You’re dropped into a maze-like battleground armed and ready. Your goal? Take down enemies while dodging incoming fire. But don’t just shoot anything that moves, some players are your teammates. They’ll be clearly labeled, so watch your fire. What goes around definitely comes around.

You can host private games and invite friends to battle in real time. The more you play, the more you progress, the more you earn PX coins and gems, which you can use to unlock cool content.

Poxel.io Tips

Stick to the walls: Keep your back covered to avoid sneak attacks.

Take the high ground: Rooftops offer a better view and sniping opportunities.

Stay alert: Enemies can come from any direction, so keep moving and scanning your surroundings.

Unlock & Upgrade

🌍 Explore over 30 unique maps

🔫 Battle with 20+ weapons, including AK-47s, rocket launchers, snipers, crossbows, grenades, and even knives

🎯 Complete missions to earn PX and Gems

🧢 Unlock 1,500+ skins, characters, hats, back items, and more!

Play often. Play smart. Play with friends. Reach the top and prove you're the best in Poxel.io.

Game Modes
FFA: Free for All, everyone is your enemy.
TDM: Team Deathmatch, in which two teams fight for the highest score.
KC: Kill Confirmed, Collect dog tags from the dead, and reach a certain amount to win the game.
Domination: A team-based mode where you battle to capture the designated points

What does io stand for in games?

In games, ".io" originally comes from the .io domain extension, which is the domain for the British Indian Ocean Territory. However, it became popular for web-based multiplayer games after the success of Agar.io in 2015.

Yes, you can shoot the chickens in Poxel.io, though you shouldn't have them distract you from shooting at your armed opponents.

EvoWorld.io is the multiplayer survival game previously known as FlyOrDie.io. You start as a small fly and level up as you eat more food. As you evolve, other players become part of your diet.

Each level comes with a new special ability and more things to eat. The choice is simple, you Fly or Die!

How to Play EvoWorld.io

Eat items and animals outlined in green, earn XP and progress on the evolution ladder. Avoid animals with a red outline, because they will eat you! You’ll be fighting for survival against hundreds of other players, so make sure you keep moving and keep eating. Keep an eye on your water level, as you’ll need plenty of water to survive.

There is just one playing mode: free-for-all.

Special Abilities

As you progress through the game, each animal will have its own unique and remarkable ability. You can use that special ability, and activate it by pressing the space bar or the S key, to get through the game quicker. When you start out as a fly, you’ll have “beginner’s luck”. This gives you a 50% chance to avoid a predator's attack. Use the special abilities to your advantage.

Game Levels

There are 45 different animals and eight stages of evolution in EvoWorld.io. You start as a simple fly, and fight your way up through the animal kingdom.

Once you’ve played through the ordinary and real animals, there are demons, mythical beasts, cosmic entities, and the undead. The grim reaper sits right at the top of the food chain with his scythe, which he uses to take down prey.

Biomes

There are multiple biomes in EvoWorld.io. Each one has an entirely different landscape. You’ll find different prey in each location, so don’t be afraid to explore the map and see what’s out there.

About the Developer

EvoWorld was made by Pixel Voices, an .io games developer.

Hide in the clouds or inside bushes to avoid being eaten
Drink plenty of water

Worms Zone is an Io arcade game where you join the fight to become the biggest worm. You must eat as much food as possible to grow bigger. Slither your way towards the power-ups to get an edge.

How to Play Worms Zone

WormsZone.io is survival of the fittest. You're a worm, and you must eat and grow to be big and strong. Who knew being a worm could be so much fun? Try to trap your opponents so you can get all of their delicious food.

Pressing the left or right mouse button allows you to turbo-speed your worm. Use it sparingly and tactically to sprint ahead of the other players and secure big rewards, but be advised: the more you use your turbo, the faster your worm shrinks.

As you get larger, you get slower. Turbo also becomes more costly for your score, so use it sparingly when you are big and plentifully when you are small.

Be aware that upgrades you can buy in the menu don't make your worm perform better in the arena, but improve the effectiveness and/or duration of the power-ups found while playing, so don't be tricked by those.

Worm Outfits

Go to the wardrobe and pick an outfit fitting for the common worm. As you level up in the game, you can treat your worm to funkier and more colorful designs. Head to the worm's wardrobe on the main menu to pick a fresh new outfit.

Game Options

Head to the options menu to choose your favorite colors for the game. You can also pick between 3 different food types. You can find the options menu at the bottom right of the main menu.

Game Modes

There are various game modes to choose from. These are:

Infinity - Keep playing and growing your worm until you fail.
Time - a 7-minute game featuring double points and coins
Treasure Hunter - Look for treasures on the map
Seasonal - these are time-limited modes that appear during seasonal periods of the year
Power-ups

Keep your eye out for power-ups in potion bottles scattered around the arena. There are six types of power-ups in Worms Zone:

Red and blue - Increase capture radius and pull in more food.
Blue - Increase the amount of food eaten by five times.
Purple - Reveal where other worms have perished.
Green - Increase the speed of your worm.
Round green - Improves control of the worm for collision avoidance.
Yellow - Zoom out for a bird-eye view of the map.

You'll figure out what these power-ups look like as you slither through the land. You can also pick up coins that go into your coin stash.

Seasonal events

Make sure to come worming your way back for seasonal events over times like Christmas, Halloween, and Easter! You can play in exclusive, limited-time events to earn rewards throughout the festive seasons.

StarBlast is a fun multiplayer arcade shooter set in space. Mine asteroids and fight other players in your own fully upgradable spaceship. Work together with your teammates to ensure victory.

How to Play StarBlast

In the game, you shoot asteroids and enemies to collect crystals. With these crystals, you can upgrade your ship, buy new ships, and buy more lives for the ships you already have.

Training

There's an excellent tutorial level on StarBlast.io that will teach you all the basics, from fighting to mining rocks and upgrading your ship. Complete this training section, and you'll be ready to take the fight online!

Choose your game

There are four game modes in StarBlast.

These modes are:

team mode
survival mode
invasion
pro deathmatch.

Team mode is a good starting point for a new player, as you'll have a crew to back you up. Choose from three primary teams:

Federation
Sovereign Trappist Colonies
Orion Arm Guild

Mine gems

Gems are the backbone of the StarBlast economy. You'll find them by mining asteroids and destroying the ships of opposition forces. Shoot rocks until they explode! Ensure you target rocks suitable for your ship's size and power.

Upgrade your ship

You can buy upgrades with all of those precious gems you've earned. You can also use gems to buy upgrades, and you can convert them into credits to buy additional weapons at your team's base. There are seven ship tiers you can evolve to, as well as enhanced cargo capacities.

You'll notice an upgrade menu at the bottom. Gems can be instantly converted into upgrades for these items. From left to right, this is the order of upgrades you'll see there:

Shield capacity
Shield regeneration
Energy capacity
Energy regeneration
Laser damage
Weapon speed
Ship speed
Ship agility

You also have 31 different ships you can choose from as you progress in the game.

Secondary Weapons and Power-ups

There are additional weapons available in Starblast.io, known as secondary weapons. When playing Team Mode, you can purchase them at the team’s base, using gems that have been converted into credits. In other game modes, secondary weapons can be found floating in space, as a result of destroyed ships or asteroids.

Secondary weapons are:

Projectiles
Mines
Pods/Drones
Utilities

Battle with other players

Fighting other ships is a huge part of the enjoyment. It's wise to use your speed as a small ship to escape battle and mine resources until you're powerful enough to fight. Be sure to keep a fresh stock of additional weapons and make sure you buff your attack and defense stats as much as possible!

Eliminating competitors is a faster and riskier approach to mining resources, as destroyed enemy ships will drop all the gems they were carrying.

More Games Like This

At the heart of StarBlast is the simple and addictive online gameplay characteristic of many .io games. Other online titles you might enjoy for multiplayer combat include Agar io and Krunker.

You can also check out our fan favorites, like Geometry Dash or Little Alchemy.

Features
Fun gameplay with plenty of ship upgrades and rewards
Four exciting game modes and three factions
Active online games with intense spaceship battles
An active player-driven modding community

Kour.io is a multiplayer IO FPS game that plunges you into intense battles across various maps with many guns and modes to play!

It's one of the most accessible first-person shooters, available on both web browsers and mobile. This game offers numerous game modes, including free-for-all, team deathmatch, gun-game, and Hardpoint. Choose from various classes, each with unique weapons, to match your play style and aim to become the #1 Kour!

How to Play Kour.io

In Kour.io, your main goal is to earn KP (Kour Points) by racking up kills and completing missions. The more KP you collect, the more you can unlock! Spend your KP on various customizations like skins, crates, hats, characters, and emotes. You'll level up as you gather points in games, gaining access to even more content and perks.

Want to team up with friends? Create or join clans to form a powerful squad and take on challenges together. The competition is fierce, so aim for the top spots on the daily, monthly, and all-time leaderboards to prove your dominance in the Kour.io universe. Whether you’re playing solo or with your clan, every match is a chance to climb the ranks and earn bragging rights.

For a personal touch, dive into the map editor to create your own custom maps and challenge other players in your unique arenas. You can also explore the server finder to discover and join lobbies across Kour.io, offering endless opportunities for adventure and competition. Whether you’re customizing your experience or conquering leaderboards, Kour.io offers a dynamic and engaging world to master!

Kour.io Characters

You can choose from nine unlocked players, each equipped with a different weapon. Players and weapons include:

Soldier: AK-47 Gun, 100 HP
Hitman: Sniper Rifle, 90 HP
Gunner: P90 Gun, 90 HP
Heavy: Machine Gun, 150 HP
Rocketeer: Rocket Launcher, 90 HP
Agent: Silenced MP5, 100 HP
Brawler: Shotgun, 120 HP
Assassin: FAMAS, 100 HP
Investor: Scar Rifle, 90 HP (free unlock with an ad)

If you get 10+ kills, you'll unlock even more characters.

Juggernaut: Minigun, 100 HP
Recon: Vector, 80 HP
Pyro: Flamethrower, 100 HP
Rayblader: Laser Gun, 110 HP

Have a go at each player, as they all possess different qualities and various weapons. Once you've chosen your player, you can get down to business.

Choose Your Map

Havana: Based on the Cuban city, it's the first and most competitive map, set in a tropical paradise.
Ghost Town: Inspired by Nuke Town from Call of Duty, this map features an abandoned desert town in Arizona with rooftop warfare.
Snowstorm: Set in Iceland, this winter map lets you engage enemies amid freezing ocean views and purple skies.
Kour House: The newest map with boost pads, shipment containers, and buildings for strategic fights.
Legion HQ: Modeled after the Legion Platforms headquarters, this office space map is perfect for fun trick shots.

Game Modes

Official game modes:

Free For All
Team Deathmatch
Gun Game, only played with guns
Hardpoint, played in teams, points are accrued for killing enemies and for touching a base on the map
ParKour, where shooting happens while parkouring between buildings
MoonSnipe, a low-gravity mode played on Earth’s most ancient satellite
KourSurf, where surf and shooting happen simultaneously

Kour io has a vibrant community of players, and they are also creating game modes. Among those available, there is:

KourCraft, inspired by Minecraft and Fortnite, allows you to build structures to help you fight
FFA 35, a 35-minute Free For All
Pool Map

Start an online battle instantly

Gulper.io is an online IO snake game where you compete against other players in a multiplayer battle arena. Like Slither.io, you take control of a worm and nurture it to become a healthy, strong, indestructible snake. How do you get there? Eat shiny bits and grow big to eliminate the other worms.

How to Play Gulper.io

You are on a standard arcade board filled with neon bits of food to eat: think about it like Snake meets Tron. The gameplay is straightforward: mouse movements guide the only moves you can make, and clicking will give you a boost. There is no way to pause or stop in your tracks. The game aims to help you eat as much as possible, so you become longer, stronger, and thicker. Why? If other snakes bump into you, they will die. Oh yeah, multiple other snakes are fighting for the same food and territory!

The game never ends. Or rather, it ends when you die. Avoid other snakes on the board at all costs if you want to make it to the infinite end.

Differences with similar titles

Unlike other snake-inspired titles, in Gulper.io, there are no power-ups or boosts, nor is there any in-game currency. The game lacks depth and employs a simple, minimalist approach to hook players quickly.

A remarkable difference between Gulper io and other snake-themed games is that here, using the speed boost doesn’t consume your character, so you can go at full speed as much as you want. That, of course, increases the danger of hitting any of your competitors on the playing field, so use it with care.

Munch and grow

Slither and slide around the battle arena, munching on glowing orbs to grow bigger. Use a left-click or press the spacebar to boost your speed.

Be a cunning little neon glow worm

Cut off other worms cunningly to make them crash into your side. Doing so successfully rewards you with all the food they collected in their time in the Gulper world.

Become engrossed in the glow

Gulper blends Tron-like neon visuals with the gameplay of explosively popular browser games like Worms Zone and Paper.io 2.

Features
Cool neon glowing visuals
Smooth movement and gameplay
Minimap to see the location of other worms
Change your worm color using the slider

Gridpunk - Battle Royale 3v3 PvP is an IO battle game where lightning-fast reflexes and precision will determine how far you make it through to the end of this real-time shooter action. This high-intensity game requires you to stay sharp, aim true, and master the art of drone attacks to outwit and overpower your opponents. Each 3v3 PvP match puts you against players in real-time in multiplayer battles. There’s no room for luck—it's all about skill, strategy, and timing.

How to Play Gridpunk - 3v3 Battle Royale

Prepare for an adrenaline-pumping fighting adventure in Gridpunk - Battle Royale 3v3 PvP, where electrifying music sets the stage for high-stakes battles in a cyberpunk arena. This is not just a game—it's an intense, fast-paced showdown that will test your reflexes and strategy. One false move, and you’re out.

This multiplayer game splits six players into green and red teams so they can battle it out in real-time. You’ll automatically join the green team and control one of its members, with health indicators displayed above every player. Opponents on the red team are equally equipped, so don’t let your guard down because competition is fierce.

You will be in a multi-room scenario where you need to go through doors and passageways to confront your enemy. There is no hiding in this game. If you don’t go to them, they will come to you and in numbers! Move your fighter using the arrow keys, and aim with precision using your mouse to unleash a barrage of shots. Get to know the controls well before attempting to win your opponents. The gameplay can get complex if you don’t master the keys.

Explore the arena to collect glowing rewards that instantly boost your strength. Arm yourself with powerful weapons, pick up health packs to stay in the game, and enhance your arsenal with drones and super gadgets. Strategy and quick reflexes are your greatest allies as you navigate the vibrant map.

Before each match begins, the game ensures a full roster of six players for the ultimate test of skill. Every second counts as you race to dominate the battlefield. With a scoreboard tracking team progress, adapt your tactics and aim to outplay your opponents in this fast-paced fight for victory.

Gridpunk delivers an unmatched battle royale experience, blending quick rounds, real-time multiplayer gameplay, and a cyberpunk aesthetic. Engage in intense action, launch devastating attacks, and prove your worth in this skill-driven, free-to-play showdown.

Paper.io 2 is an .io game where you have to capture as much territory as possible by painting it. Paint the map in your own color to take over the Paper.io world! Look out for other players vying to claim your space.

How to Play

Use your mouse to move around and cover the floor with your color. Glide over white space and other players’ paint, then create a connection back to your color to claim that area. You can also destroy other players' territory completely by crashing into their tail when they are exposed.

That also means when you’re moving outside of your color, your tail is exposed to attack. Other players can crash into it to obliterate you.

Complete objectives and eliminate other players to unlock new skins and make the map more colorful.

You’ll constantly be battling with other Paper.io 2 players to reclaim your territory and take theirs. Think strategically about how to claim the most land, and don't get too greedy!

Tips and Tricks
Don’t be too greedy. The longer your tail is exposed, the more likely it is that you’ll be destroyed by an opponent.
Be careful and don't go over your tail, as it would lead to game over.
Attack other players boldly when their tail is exposed. Then claim all the white space they previously inhabited!
Paint cautiously and stay close to your territory until you’re sure it’s okay to claim a larger space.
Move around the edges of the map to minimize exposure while claiming more and more space for yourself!

Diep.io is a survival .io game where you control a circle armed with a cannon. The aim is simple: move around the map and destroy the other players whilst improving and upgrading your own circle.

How to Play Diep.io
Shoot to level up

Diep is a simple .io game set in a vast arena. You start as one basic level 1 tank. Upgrades can reach up to level 45, and with every fifteen levels, you get to choose a new tank with special features. Check the bottom left of your screen to see if you are eligible for an update.

Venture around the map, shooting various geometric shapes to level up. It’s best to do this for a while before trying to take on other opponents, as each level-up rewards you with an upgrade point to spend on one of 8 areas to upgrade.

Upgrade your Diep circle

There are eight different stats you can upgrade:

Health Regen - health recovers faster
Max Health - increases the maximum health
Body Damage - increases the damage dealt by clashing with other items on the map
Bullet Speed - improves the speed of projectiles
Bullet Penetration - allows bullets to pass through more objects and other bullets before disappearing
Bullet Damage - grows the damage dealt by each projectile
Reload - decreases the time between shots
Movement Speed - increases the tank's speed

Consider your choices carefully, as you only have a limited number of skill points, and these are harder to acquire as you level up.

A player may want to focus on their bullet damage and speed to increase firepower. Alternatively, you could concentrate on health and regeneration to improve your survivability. Players earn more skill points as they do damage and level up.

Try different game modes

The main mode is a free-for-all, where every player is for themselves.

Other game modes are:

Tag - you will be assigned to one of the two teams, and when a player is killed, they respawn in the opposite team. The winning team will have converted all their opponents into members of their squad.
Maze - free-for-all with impenetrable walls and small corridors, easier to ambush and be ambushed.
Sandbox - a private game mode where players can test builds and classes with their friends.
2 teams or 4 teams - you will be assigned to one of the teams (Red, Blue, Green, Purple). The bases in the corners of the map offer a safe area to respawn and recover.
Domination - Dominators is the name of special turrets that teams in this mode fight to capture and control.

Try out the different game modes and see which ones suit your play style. Don’t forget to choose your circle color and a gamer tag too!

More Games Like This

This game is available on web browser and also through the app store. Check out Agar.io for another legendary IO game or check out some other top titles like FNF - Friday Night Funkin' or Little Alchemy.

How to Play Snake.io Online

MiniGiants.io is a top-down multiplayer deathmatch IO game. Take control of your own MiniGiant and battle other players for rewards. You can choose from several classes. As you level up, you'll grow larger and more powerful, earning more loot to strengthen your character!

How to Play MiniGiants.io

Grow your character

Gather colorful experience orbs around the map to boost your character's energy growth in MiniGiants.io. Defeat enemies in battle to level up quickly, and play smart by avoiding conflict with giants. The longer you dominate the game, the bigger and more unstoppable you become!

Chests

As you destroy opponents, you'll find they sometimes drop chests of different rarities. Chests include loot for your character and gold for upgrading items. You'll find character items like armor, rings, and helmets, which buff your base stats and make you stronger. The rarest chests feature the most precious gear, so keep your eyes open for them around the arena.

The types of chests available, in ascending order of rarity, are:

Wooden
Gold
Magic
Crystal
Divine

Classes

MiniGiants.io features several classes, each with a unique advantage. The default character is Barbarian, which comes with +50% stamina. Other classes are unlocked as you level up throughout the game. All the MiniGiants classes are:

Barbarian (level 0)
Tank (level 3)
Fairy (level 6)
Amazon (level 9)
Necromancer (level 12)
Mage (level 15)
Cleric (level 18)
Beast (level 21)
Knight (level 24)

Playing Arenas in Minigiants.io

Voxiom.io is a 3D real-time multiplayer first-person voxel shooter featuring destructible maps. The game is inspired by popular titles, such as Minecraft, Fortnite, Counter-Strike, and Call of Duty. Currently, the game features 4 game modes: capture the gems, battle royale, survival, and free-for-all. Build, craft, and shoot strategically to achieve victory!

How to Play
Inventory

Voxiom.io features a dynamic inventory. Players must carefully manage their inventory on the battlefield, holding the most important items to ensure victory. Each player gets 5 ammo slots, 5 backpack slots, and 5 hotbar slots.

Crafting

Guns and blocks are craftable/upgradable through the crafting system. By default, players can craft basic items in their inventory. However, more advanced crafting, such as gun upgrades, need to be done through the workbench. Players can access the workbench by standing close to a workbench block and opening their inventory.

Weapons

There are five different tiers of weapons: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Epic, and Legendary. The tier of each weapon is indicated by their color. Higher-tier weapons have better stats, such as damage and reload time. Accuracy and recoil systems also exist in the game. Players can either use the F key or right mouse button to aim down sight.

Blocks

Each block in Voxiom.io has different properties. Some blocks are harder to break than others. Players can only use the shovel to harvest blocks. Ore blocks are special blocks that drop gems, which can be used in crafting. The blocks physics system in the game ensures that floating blocks get destroyed when mining.

Map

Every game is unique and random. The toxic fog gradually shrinks the battlefield if you're playing battle royale. Maps are regularly updated with new random features and structures.

Game modes

There are currently 4 game modes in Voxiom. The game is updated regularly, and new modes are sometimes added. The current game modes are as follows:

Battle Royale - a classic fight for survival where the playable area shrinks and the last player standing wins.
Capture the Gems - capture the most gems while battling enemies
Survival - craft, build, and survive in a vast open-world map
Free For All - a classic game where every player fights for themselves
More Shooting Games

If you liked Voxiom, be sure to check out all of our FPS and battle royale games. Some popular shooting games include Mini Royale: Nations and Shell Shockers. The latter being an awesome online FPS game where players are eggs!

Tips
Use the F key or hold down right mouse button to aim for better accuracy
Crafting can upgrade guns
Some structures always generate better loot than others
When holding a block, use right click to switch to wall mode to place down blocks in batch
Join the discord to get access to chat with the community, get the latest insights and news!
Last Updated

Jan 15, 2024

Controls
W - walk forward
S - walk backward
A - walk left
D - walk right
Space bar - jump
X - open inventory (use the mouse left click and right click to swap items)
Hold C - crouch
Hold Shift - sprint
Hold Tab - view map
Left Mouse Button - primary action on item: shoot / use item / consume Item
Right Mouse Button or F - secondary action on item: aim / switch block placement mode
FAQ
How can I improve my accuracy in Voxiom.io?

Use the F key or hold down the right mouse button to aim for better accuracy.

How do I upgrade my weapons in Voxiom.io?

You can use crafting to upgrade your weapons.

Overtide.io is a fast-paced first-person shooter game that puts your reflexes and strategy to the test in action-packed modes like Free-For-All and Kill Confirmed. Battle through intense maps, customize your loadout, and earn upgrades as you climb the ranks. Hone your aim, perfect your movement, and prove you’ve got what it takes to dominate the leaderboard.

How to Play Overtide.io

Overtide.io is a high-speed FPS where sharp aim and strategic moves decide who survives. You’ll choose from a range of weapons tailored to different combat styles, from high-damage rifles to close-range shotguns. Master the unique feel of each loadout and fine-tune your approach to suit the fast-moving action. Whether you’re hunting enemies or watching your own back, positioning and timing are everything.

Choose from a variety of weapons, each with its own strengths and weaknesses:

AK-47: High damage, but tough to control.
SMG: Great for close combat, less accurate at range.
AWP: One-shot kill potential, but slow if you miss.
Shotgun: Devastating up close, useless from afar.
M4A1: Balanced and easy to handle, with slightly lower damage.

Explore the gamescape while dodging bullets and hunting down opponents. The arena is a sprawling, labyrinth-like battleground, demanding quick reflexes and constant awareness. Use the mouse for precision aiming, and trust no one—survival depends on staying alert and striking first.

Want to play with friends? Create private rooms and sharpen your aim by blasting practice chickens before diving into full-scale combat. Tackle competitive modes like Free-For-All and Kill Confirmed, unlock powerful gear, and upgrade your arsenal. The more you play, the more you climb: prove you’ve got the skills to dominate the leaderboard.

TileMan.io is an awesome multiplayer IO game in which you must try to claim as much territory as possible. You start with a random block color, and you must try to convert all the blocks on the map into the same color. This might sound easy, but don't forget there are other players to contend with!

While heavily influenced by popular predecessors like Splix.io and Paper.io, Tileman.io offers additional features that distinguish it from these older games. For example, here you can pause the movement of your character by pressing E or P, a tactical move that can enable you to eliminate opponents more easily.

How to Play TileMan.io

TileMan.io gameplay is relatively simple, but the strategy is not as straightforward. You are in the center of a grid board, and your objective is to expand your territory by claiming more and more tiles. To do this, move your mousepad or use the WASD keys to move left, right, up, and down. Easy enough? The catch is that you need to expand your territory without getting cut off by one of the many other players in the game. You can get cut off if your line of path is cut. Be careful because you can actually cut within your own path and lose the game by accidentally killing yourself. The only way to protect yourself is by remaining on your territory, but doing so won't get your expansion strategy very far.

Territory is "claimed" when you convert blocks by creating a complete square—the enclosed blocks will turn to your color once you close the gap. If you go too far and attempt to expand too fast, you will find yourself too far from safety and will likely be killed by an opponent player.

You must avoid your opponents or try to trap them within your squares and make them crash into you. Use a careful approach, and don't go in all guns blazing! Can you conquer the TileMan arena?

How is Tileman.io scored?

Tileman.io is scored based on the number of tiles captured, the number of amounts killed, and rank.

Tileman.io Game Options
Classic
Extreme Speed
No Kills
Rats
Arena
Classic game

In this game, you play with multiple opponents in an attempt to expand your territory across almost 160,000 tiles. Gameplay moves at a quick pace, but achieving continental domination is possible with persistence and caution.

Extreme Speed

Similar to the classic game, this one is significantly more challenging, so extreme caution or extreme risk will win. The choice is yours.

No Kills

Gameplay is similar to the classic game, but you don't get killed by opponents cutting into your path. Instead, lose your pathline and have just a few seconds to return to safe territory. Don't stray too far, or you won't make it back, and then it's game over.

Rats

Opponents are everywhere in this game, the map is smaller and there is more density. Keep your captures close to home base.

Arena

The gameplay in Arena is almost like a "practice space". There are no opponents, and approximately 1,500 squares to capture. Sounds easy, but it's also easy to become too confident and make a mistake.

More Games Like This

There are plenty more games like Tileman.io in our Io selection. In Agar io you compete against other players for dominance.

Alternatively, you can try Sprunki or Friday Night Funkin', two popular music games that are great fun.

Stabfish 2 is an IO shark game that takes the intense underwater combat of Stabfish.io to a whole new level! You are in an arena as a deadly shark, ready for thrilling battles against other players, aiming to impale as many rivals as possible. Stabfish 2 is the sequel to Stabfish.io, and this sequel ramps up the action with even more ways to dominate the depths with a variety of new shark types, powerful abilities, and exciting loot to discover. Show your skill, unlock unique upgrades, and claim your place as the most feared predator in the ocean.

How to Play Stabfish 2

Your goal in Stabfish 2 is to kill or be killed, with each attack on your prey giving you another layer of strength and skill, along with an unlock of new and more spacious waters.

Begin your underwater journey by choosing from a powerful lineup of shark evolutions. Each time you’re defeated in the arena, you’ll evolve, progressing from a Blue Shark to a mighty Great White and, ultimately, to the fearsome Megalodon. Each evolution is packed with upgrade potential, and as you advance, your shark gains new abilities that make it even deadlier in the water. Unlocking these upgrades is vital and requires milestone achievements, giving you a true sense of accomplishment as your shark’s power grows.

Stabfish 2 brings fierce, fast-paced action to the underwater battlefield. You’ll need razor-sharp reflexes and tactical smarts to avoid being impaled in seconds by rival sharks. Use your boost to dart across the arena, aiming to catch bigger foes off guard with your swift movements. When you successfully impale an enemy, they’ll be stuck to your tusk until you drive them into a wall, releasing food from their remains to replenish your strength and prepare for the next hunt.

Enhance your shark with Stabfish 2's unique looting and crafting system. Every encounter offers valuable resources to add to your inventory, including materials, blueprints, and decorative items. Use your materials to bring blueprints to life, crafting new equipment with varying rarity and power. Collecting and crafting gear not only boosts your survival odds but also lets you customize your shark’s style and abilities.

Join forces with other players to form a powerful shark team and compete in the epic 'Armageddon' event that takes place every hour. Team up, strategize, and aim for the top of the event leaderboard to claim victory in the fierce, all-out battles. Whether you create your own team or join an existing one, diving into cooperative gameplay adds a thrilling layer to your Stabfish 2 experience.

More Games Like This

Check out some other popular titles like Snake io, where you play as a snake fighting to survive on a battlefield of snakes; Ducklings, where you rescue all the ducklings from the dangers of aquatic life; or Agar.io, a game where you control a small agar cell in a multiplayer arena

Kiomet is an immersive, real-time Io strategy game that challenges you to grow and defend your kingdom in a dynamic, ever-changing world. Expand your realm by strategically capturing new territories, all while defending against rival players and unpredictable threats. Rally your forces to claim vital lands, strengthen your holdings with upgrades, and skillfully plan your conquests to rise to the top of the leaderboard. With every decision you make, you’ll inch closer to ultimate domination.

How to Play Kiomet

The goal of Kiomet is to expand your territory and master tactical moves in a dynamic real-time strategy setting. Take control by dragging units to towers to capture them, then fortify your strongholds by selecting and upgrading towers with enhancements. With 27 unique towers and ten diverse unit types marked by distinct symbols, every decision matters as you build your path to ultimate domination.

Victory hinges on capturing and holding as many towers as possible, but defending your king is critical—losing it will cost you the game. Develop a strategy that balances offense and defense: build supply lines for resources, strengthen your buildings to boost capabilities, and consider alliances with other players to maximize your success. Working with allies can be a game-changer, as it may prevent being overrun by enemy forces while expanding your territory and resources.

To gain ground, drag and drop your forces to unclaimed areas, but be strategic, as occupying new territory takes time, leaving you vulnerable to counterattacks. Follow the directional arrows to see where to expand next, but think carefully about each choice, as capturing the right buildings can amplify your strength. Make tactical decisions to avoid being surrounded, and position yourself to attack your enemies to claim more land and resources.

In this multiplayer experience, teaming up with other players can add a crucial layer of strategy. Use the chat messaging function to request or accept alliances, which prevent attacks between allies. Keep communication open to coordinate defenses and time attacks, and build a formidable coalition. You can dominate the battlefield and expand your empire—one tower at a time.

More Games Like This

Once you’ve mastered the strategic art of Kiomet, check out some more of our IO games. Other popular titles include Bloxd.io, which features Minecraft graphics and various game modes. The game modes feature parkour, sandbox creativity, and combat; Fly or Die, a survival game now known as EvoWorld.io, where you begin as a small fly but not for long as you eat your way to a more powerful player; or lolbeans, a racing game where you have to avoid obstacles.

Worm Hunt is an .io game where you battle against other worms in a colorful online arena. Squirm around, picking up food and boosters to grow your worm bigger. Use your coins to buy various skins and upgrades for the next game!

How to Play Worm Hunt

Squirm your worm around the big arena. Pick up food to grow and boosts to give you a temporary advantage over your slithering opponents. Block the path of another worm to kill it and feast on all the food they have picked up.

Earn coins and use them to buy various worms, each with its unique skill tree that can be improved on as you play more games. The skill tree grants you permanent buffs to the worm you are upgrading. Complete your daily tasks to earn gems and other rewards!

A key to success in this game is to use the speed boost effectively. The speed boost can be activated by either of the two mouse buttons or by pressing the space bar if you are using a keyboard. Enabling the speed boost lets you be faster than your opponents, so you can try to trick them to bump into you, but, at the same time, it consumes your mass, so using it requires balance and attention.

Game Modes

Worm Hunt features different playing modes:

Timed Mode: defeat everyone in 5 minutes
Endless Mode: gain maximum weight of the worm
Gems Fever: collect as many gems as possible

Agar.io is the original .io grow game. Play as a simple agar cell fighting to become the largest cell in a multiplayer game arena. Avoid the bigger cells and consume the smaller ones to grow larger.

This is a simple game about growing your single-cell organism bigger than other players. We love it in our family because there is a surprising amount of strategy and collaboration. You need to pay attention to other players to decide if you are bigger or smaller than them. Taking your time and hiding behind virus cells is a tactic our youngest used a lot. Best of all, though, splitting your cell to offer another player a way to grow is commonly seen as a sign to work together. We’ve had long games where we end up hunting in packs with others. It’s a great way to learn cooperation.

Review by FamilyGamingDatabase.

How to Play Agario

In Agar.io, you begin as a tiny cell in a massive arena filled with pellets and other players. At the start, your best move is to quietly gather pellets scattered around the map. This lets you grow without drawing too much attention from larger predators. Avoid chasing other small players right away—most beginners get eaten this way. Patience pays off: focus on steady growth until you’re big enough to hunt.

The game has 2 simple rules to follow:

You can only consume targets that are smaller than you to evolve
Larger agar will eat you

Slide around the Agario battleground, trying to exist as a single cell looking to evolve. Think like a survivor - don’t just avoid bigger agar, go in for the kill and eat as much as you can!

Pick up all the smaller blobs and eat the other players to grow larger in size. Avoid blobs bigger than you as they will consume you, which means game over! But you can always start the game over and go for your next best record.

Once you reach medium size, movement slows, so you’ll need to be more tactical. Use your ability to split (Space key or split button) to lunge at smaller cells just out of reach. A successful split doubles your number of cells but halves their size, so choose your targets wisely. Always make sure the prey is small enough that even your split cell can absorb them; otherwise, you’ll just leave yourself vulnerable.

To climb higher, learn to use viruses to your advantage. As a small cell, viruses act as safe zones where big predators won’t dare follow. As a larger cell, you can eject mass into a virus to fire it toward enemies, popping them into pieces and giving you a chance to swallow their fragments. This is one of the most effective ways to topple giants on the leaderboard.

Winning in Agar.io isn’t about brute force; it’s about survival, timing, and positioning. Hug the edges of the map when you’re small, move toward the center once you’re stronger, and always look for opportunities to trap opponents against the map’s borders. The ultimate goal is to balance risk and reward: grow big enough to dominate, but not so reckless that a single virus or split leaves you scattered and eaten.

About Agar.io

Initially, Agar.io user feedback was mixed. According to Engagdet.com, it was seen as "a good abstraction of the fierce survival-of-the-fittest competition that you sometimes see on the microscopic level." However, there was also some criticism of the simplicity of the gameplay. This was mainly targeted towards the repetitiveness and the controls of the mobile version. Tom Christiansen of Gamezebo said, "Personally, I found nothing to hold my attention in Agar.io but that shouldn’t stop you from giving it a shot if it looks even remotely interesting to you."

Nevertheless, Agar.io quickly became a success, likely due in part to its frequent discussion on social media platforms, particularly Twitch and YouTube. The mobile version of the game was downloaded more than ten million times during its first week, and in 2015, Agar.io was Google's most-searched video game. In the same year, it was even listed as the fifth top game on YouTube’s list of top games.

So, it's safe to say it's got some appeal!

Did you know?

Agar.io was also featured in the Netflix TV series House of Cards! It made its appearance in Season 4, Episode 9 (Chapter 48) with Frank Underwood shown playing the game while meeting with Will Conway.

Game Modes

There are four game modes in Agar.io. These are:

FFA (Free For All) - everyone fights for themselves
Battle Royale - Everyone fights for themselves in a shrinking arena
Teams - Two teams fight against each other
Experimental - Every player for themselves. Donate your mass to the pellets to get more bits in return!
More Games Like This

If you like Agario, you should definitely try out our other .io games like Paper.io, a real-time multiplayer game where you capture as much territory as possible by painting it, or Krunker, a fast-paced game where you fight against rivals from across the world.

Other games with a similar idle vibe include Idle Breakout or casual games like Word Search, 2048, or Bubble Shooter.

Features
Eat smaller cells to become bigger
Fast-paced online gameplay
Four game modes to enjoy
Play with your friends
Agar.io Developer

Matheus Valadares announced Agar.io on 4chan on 28 April 2015. Matheus, a 19-year-old Brazilian developer, wrote the game in a few days using JavaScript and C++. The game was announced without a name, and users had to connect to Valadares' IP address to play.

It was only later that the name "Agar.io" was suggested by an anonymous user on 4chan. Matheus continued adding new features to the game. One week later, Agar.io entered Steam Greenlight.

Tanks 3D is a high-intensity multiplayer io game where up to 1,000 tank commanders collide on a vast, fully destructible battlefield. Transform the terrain to suit your strategy, build barriers, dig trenches, and outmaneuver your enemies. Pick from a range of tanks and weapon loadouts, fight across diverse maps, and team up with others to take control of the warzone.

How to Play Tanks 3D

Tanks 3D throws you into a tense, action-packed battlefield where it's every tank for itself. You're up against players from around the globe, and the goal is simple: survive and eliminate as many enemy tanks as possible.

Your tank is built for rough terrain. It can climb steep hills and drop into deep valleys. These low areas might offer protection from enemy fire, but they can also be dangerous ambush zones if enemies are lurking nearby.

While your tank can take a few hits, too much damage will destroy it. Once you're taken out, you'll have to restart, so choose your movements carefully and stay alert at all times.

You can communicate with other players in real time using the chat box located at the bottom of the screen. The leaderboard in the top right corner shows the scores of all players currently in the match, helping you track your progress.

The minimap on the screen gives you a sense of where enemy tanks are located and how close they are to your position. Use this to plan your attacks or your escape.

You’ll also see soldiers walking around the map. They’re easy to take out, but they can also act as warnings that an enemy tank might be nearby.

Stay alive, shoot fast, and take control before someone else does.

BrutalMania.io (Brutal Mania) is an online gladiator IO action game where you are armed with savage weapons with a straightforward mission to take down every rival gladiator in sight. The battles are brutal, the carnage is real, and only the strongest will survive. Smash, slice, and crush your way to becoming the last warrior standing in this gruesome fight for supremacy. With each victory, you grow stronger, unlocking powerful upgrades and devastating new weapons to dominate the arena.

How to Play BrutalMania.io (Brutal Mania)

The aim of the game is to destroy your enemies in the arena—kill or be killed. You are in an arena together with other players from around the world. Destroy your way through the competition with your massive mallet, unleashing chaos and destruction in every swing! Is the game gory? Only if you want it to be. You get to choose your gore level, choosing from blood effects that are not at all standard or brutal, not for the faint of heart.

The game is fast-paced, and you will need to hold your own out there in the arena. Your score is determined by the number of kills and the time spent. Pay attention to your opponent's weapon. You won't be able to kill easily without an upgraded weapon, so you will want to upgrade from a club to a weapon of choice to be more competitive on the battlefield.

There are plenty of ways to level up, but collecting orbs is the easiest. You can also collect coins by slaying enemies. Currency is key. The more you destroy, the more coins you get, which helps you level up and unlock powerful upgrades, turning you into an unstoppable force on the battlefield. Crush your enemies, dominate the arena, and when you’ve laid waste to everything in sight, dive into a new lobby to wreak havoc all over again!

Tips
Prioritize leveling up by targeting lower-level players early in the game. They’re easier to defeat, and you’ll quickly gain the experience needed to become stronger.
Invest your hard-earned coins in a powerful weapon before upgrading your evolutions. A solid weapon gives you an edge in combat, making it easier to take down opponents.
Disable AdBlock to earn even more coins and XP, speeding up your progress toward unlocking better gear and evolving your gladiator.

Mk48.io is an Io battleship game that thrusts you into the heart of intense multiplayer naval warfare, where only the fiercest captains have what it takes to dominate the seas. Command your vessel and level up by collecting valuable crates and sinking enemy ships, gaining power and upgrades as you rise. Choose from an impressive fleet of 43 meticulously crafted boats, each inspired by real-world warships, and equip your ship with nine powerful weapons that evolve over ten thrilling levels.

How to Play Mk48.io

Your goal in Mk48.io is to keep your confidence and win in intense, strategic battles on the open seas. The game offers a truly immersive experience created for naval warfare enthusiasts who appreciate attention to detail. From meticulously modeled ships to carefully balanced weapons and stats, Mk48.io provides a comprehensive and realistic combat system that brings the high stakes of naval combat to life. Whether you’re navigating treacherous waters or taking on formidable opponents, the game captures the thrill and strategy of modern naval warfare.

Start your journey from humble beginnings as a small ship, gradually rising through the ranks by battling against other ships and collecting valuable crates. With ten levels to conquer, you’ll have access to a wide selection of ships, each with its own distinct attributes and capabilities. Choose wisely, as the ship you select will define your approach to combat. From motor torpedo boats equipped with devastating torpedoes to mighty battleships and dreadnoughts with powerful main cannons, there’s a vessel to match every play style. As you progress, the challenge intensifies, and you’ll need to adapt your strategy to stay ahead of the competition.

Utilize a diverse array of weapons to your advantage in the heat of battle. From torpedoes that track enemy vessels using sonar to missiles that zip across the skies with unmatched speed, each weapon offers a unique edge. The game's sensor systems—ranging from visual tracking to radar and sonar—allow you to detect enemies above and below the water’s surface. As you gain experience, you’ll also have the opportunity to join a fleet of other players, strategically coordinating with your team to dominate the seas. And if you're feeling adventurous, take on the challenge of exploring the icy, uncharted territories of the Arctic.

Mk48.io offers even more excitemet with a variety of special vessels and weapons to spice up combat. Whether it’s the versatile hovercraft that can traverse both land and water, the deadly submarines that can vanish beneath the waves, or the mighty aircraft carriers commanding a squadron of planes, each ship adds a new layer of excitement to the game. Combine these unique ships with an arsenal of weapons like depth charges, mines, and SAMs to obliterate your enemies. Every match is a test of skill, strategy, and quick thinking.

Mk48.io ship types
Motor torpedo boats occupy the lower tiers of naval vessels and are equipped with multiple torpedoes and, occasionally, guns.
Corvettes and destroyers, being larger in size, boast a more extensive array of armaments, including slightly more powerful guns.
Cruisers serve as a middle ground between destroyers and battleships.
Battleships and dreadnoughts are equipped with immensely powerful main cannons and may carry minimal aircraft supply for anti-submarine defense.
Submarines can navigate underwater, rendering them impervious to certain attacks; however, they must resurface to utilize certain weapon systems.
Hovercraft are versatile vessels that can travel on both land and water.
Rams are purpose-built vessels designed for ramming other ships.
Dredgers can manipulate the land, creating new terrain by clicking ahead of their path and obliterating old land by sailing over it.
Icebreakers can plow through ice and snow without taking damage.
Aircraft carriers command a squadron of aircraft that follow your mouse cursor to attack enemy ships!
Mk48.io weapons
Torpedoes - powerful underwater weapons. Some can track enemy vessels with sonar.
Missiles - airborne and travel faster than torpedoes but are less maneuverable.
Rockets - like missiles but lack guidance..
Rocket torpedoes - deploy a torpedo when in the vicinity of an enemy submarine.
SAMs (surface-to-air missiles) - can shoot down aircraft and missiles.
Gun turrets shoot very fast shells that do moderate damage.
Depth charges - can be deployed against pursuing ships or submerged submarines.
Mines - like depth charges but last much longer and cause more damage.
Aircraft - fly towards your mouse cursor and automatically deploy their own weapons.
Depositor - creates new land.
Mk48.io sensors
Visual - tracks all targets, with a range that depends on conditions.
Radar - tracks targets above water.
Sonar - tracks underwater targets.

SurvEv.io Battle Royale is an IO battle multiplayer game that puts you in a high-stakes fight for survival on a constantly shrinking island encompassed by the color red. You start with nothing but soon scavenge for weapons, gear, and essential supplies scattered across the map. Every second counts as you battle to stay ahead of the deadly red zone and within the ever-shifting safe zone. Choose to go solo, team up with a partner in duo mode, or join forces with a squad, strategizing your way to outlast up to 50 fierce opponents.

How to SurvEv.io

You can play SurvEv.io solo, duo, in a squad, join a team, or create your own team to conquer the battlefield. The goal of this IO game is simple—be the last player standing because there’s no respawn—you only live once per game, so make sure every move counts.

SurvEv.io plays like a 2D version of classic battle royale games such as Fortnite or Apex Legends but with a top-down view and faster pacing. You begin each match empty-handed except for a simple backpack. Scavenge for weapons, ammo, scopes, and medical supplies scattered across the map. They are everywhere, so be prepared to pick them up and use them to defend yourself. To interact with objects around you, press F to pick up items, loot, or revive teammates.

The object of the game is to eliminate other players to claim their loot. Survival isn’t just about combat—you’ll also need to avoid the deadly red zone. The red zone gradually closes in from the map’s edges and deals increasing damage, so keep moving and stay within the safe zone to survive. You can't hide in the bushes from your enemies for too long. The red zone has no mercy.

The game also has cool seasonal events, from snowy winter updates with snowballs to throw to spooky Halloween nights filled with mysterious pumpkins that bring either tricks or treats. Anniversary events bring the community together in squad-based challenges, while limited-time modes add variety with thrilling mechanics and surprises. Whether dodging snowballs or exploring the map for hidden weapons like the elusive OTs-38 revolver, each update expands the battlefield with new ways to strategize, loot, and survive.

More Games Like This

If you want more IO game fun, browse our vast selection of games and enjoy some popular ones like Skribbl.io, a multiplayer drawing game, lolbeans, a multiplayer racing game where you dodge obstacles and outlast other beans in this zany elimination race; or Bonk.io, where you compete with up to eight players to defeat your opponents by pushing them into deadly objects (or off the map).

BattleDudes.io is an action-packed 2D multiplayer IO battle game where chaos reigns supreme. Engage in fierce battles against other players, unleashing a powerful arsenal of guns, tanks, and explosive weaponry to dominate the battlefield.

With multiple maps and diverse game modes, every match offers a new challenge and a chance to show off your strategic prowess. Log in, level up, and unlock powerful upgrades that will make you an unstoppable force!

How to Play Battle Dudes

You can use over 20 different weapons to take down your opponents. You will have multiple weapons in each loadout, and you can easily switch these weapons using the number keys.

(Some of the) game modes in Battledudes.io are:

Team modes

Team Deathmatch
Capture the Flag
Hardpoint

Solo modes

Gun Game
Free-for-all
Parkour
Search & Destroy
Drive vehicles

In this top-down shooter, you can use jeeps and tanks, along with handheld weaponry, to traverse the map quickly. With powerful rockets and armor, the tanks can cause the most damage, but they’re single-seaters. There’s room for one more in the jeeps, where a passenger can get in and shoot out of the window at enemies.

Level up

Everyone starts equally in Battledudes.io. However, as you level up, you will unlock new perks and weapons that will give you an edge on the battlefield. These include perks to increase your health, weapon damage, and various speed boosts to increase your efficiency in battle.

Speak with your team

BattleDudes.io is an online multiplayer game, so you can communicate with your teammates using the emoji wheel. Simply right-click to access this menu. If you’re loyal to the BattleDudes' mission, you’ll also be able to unlock new emojis, showing off your elite status. There’s also a weekly leaderboard for logged-in users.

Sign up and get involved

Battledudes is updated frequently and seasonally with a range of new features. While you can freely play any random game, registering your account will give you access to daily challenges, exclusive seasonal items, and a shop packed with awesome items like hats, weapons, emotes, and more! Compete with other players to reach the top rank of the season in the leaderboards.

Tips and Tricks
Perks are stackable, meaning that two of the same perk will double the effect
Ammo and health packs are droppable, and you can drop them to help your friends
Grenades do low damage against vehicles, but lots of damage against other players
Every object is destructible!

Skribbl.io is a top multiplayer drawing game,If you enjoy games such as Pictionary, you will have so much fun playing this multiplayer drawing game. In this title, users must battle against each other using drawings and their own knowledge. Whilst playing this game, users take it in turns to drawn objects and try to guess them.

Each user takes their turn to draw - there are other players present in the game too who can participate in the game chat. The chosen user has to draw whatever word they are given. Other players have to guess it to gain points. Players must be extremely fast and maintain concentration so that they can guess quickly.

The game consists of drawing and guessing. Each round, players must try and guess the word - the quicker the word is guessed, the more points a player gains. Players must be extremely quick to get the top spot so that they can draw their chosen word in the next round.

At the top of the playing screen, the word is underlined - this allows players to know how many letters are in the world. For each round, there is a timer - if a player doesn’t guess the word in the designated time, they don’t gain any points.

For those who enjoy word games, this title will provide so much fun. Players can have fun trying to guess drawings. Moreover, they can also try out their drawing skills and see what works of art they can create. An additional option in the space of word games is Words of Wonders while drawing games can be further explored by playing One Line

Developer

Noob Snake 2048 is an engaging snake IO arcade game with multiple game modes. Collect blocks to grow your tail and dominate the arena! Outmaneuver your opponents, consume their blocks, and watch them crumble as you rise to the top. Each block you gather boosts your size and strength, but only the most skilled players will reign supreme. Test your reflexes, strategy, and hunger for victory in this fast-paced, action-packed snake adventure. Climb the leaderboard and prove you have what it takes.

How to Play Noob Snake 2048

You can start a game in one of three available modes: normal, survival, or arena.

In Normal Mode, your mission is to collect cubes and race to a maximum score of 262k. But beware—other players are out to steal your cubes and take you down! Reach the target first, or be left in the dust.

In Survival Mode, it’s all about scoring big before the clock runs out. Push your skills to the limit as you aim for the highest score possible within the set timeframe.

For the ultimate challenge, step into Arena Mode, a high-stakes battle royale where only the strongest survive. Fight to be the last player standing in this thrilling survival showdown!

Power-up your player

In every game mode, there are power-ups, like faster movement, that help you collect more blocks in a shorter time. You can also buy power-ups from the marketplace and activate them anytime during the game.

The game is available in four languages: English, Turkish, German, and Russian.

Voxorp is a thrilling multiplayer spaceship battle game that challenges you to mine, upgrade, and dominate the galaxy. Collect resources to gain experience points (XP) and level up your ship. Each level unlocks new ships and modules—offering unique abilities like mining, attacking, or boosting speed. To equip a module, simply drag it from your inventory into one of your ship’s module slots. Customizing your ship’s loadout allows you to adapt to different strategies and playstyles.

To climb the leaderboard, you’ll need to build and protect your base. Use the toolbar at the bottom of the screen to access different building types, each with its own cost and function. Make sure you’ve mined enough resources before constructing anything, then drag and drop buildings onto the map grid.

Dynamo: The heart of your base, powering nearby tiles when fueled. Click it or drag a resource to it to supply power.
Scorer: Generates leaderboard points over time, but only when powered by a nearby Dynamo.
Turrets: Automatically defend your base against enemies, but require power to function.
Walls: Strong, low-cost defenses ideal for protecting your core structures.

Stay alert! Other players can attack your base at any time! If your ship is destroyed, you’ll lose everything: your modules, inventory, and progress. On the flip side, defeating other players earns you valuable XP.

Strategy Tips
Focus on leveling up your ship first before building a base. A stronger ship makes resource collection faster and safer.
Experiment with modules. You can freely swap them out to match your current objectives.
Use the edges of the map as natural defenses for your base, but keep in mind that resources are scarcer there.

Master resource management, smart base-building, and tactical ship upgrades to become the top pilot in Voxorp!

Last Updated

Oct 28, 2025

Controls
WASD / arrow keys = move around
Hold the left mouse button on resources = mine resources
Drag the left mouse button = drag modules from your inventory into your ship

Lordz.io is a multiplayer survival game based in a medieval world. Starting as a lonesome lord, you must build a small empire by collecting gold and building your base. Create various military units and prepare your defenses. Be careful out there, there are other lords to contend with!

How to Play Lordz.io
Build a Little Empire

There are several buildings that can be used to expand your power. Build mage towers and introduce your foes to the power of magic with mages. Expand your little kingdom with houses for soldiers, knights, archers, and more powerful units. 

You’ll have to build defenses if you want to keep your base standing, so make sure you build plenty of castle walls to keep enemy lords at bay and protect your assets.

Earn Currency

A key part of the game is earning gold. You can do this by collecting coins manually. But if you want to become a wealthy lord, you build gold mines on deposits. Then you can buy all the flashy things, like fire-breathing dragons.

Like other buildings, your gold mines can be upgraded with gold. Upgraded structures offer greater capacity or production output. Make sure you keep highly upgraded structures under close guard!

Battle Lords

You can directly attack other lords if you’re feeling brave. It’s also highly lucrative to destroy and loot their buildings when they’re away on business. If you’re sneaky, you can take down enemy gold mines for significant rewards. Then use the currency to splash out on a few dragons.

More Games

If you enjoy these top-down survival games, there’s plenty more to check out. BuildRoyale.io is a similar game with more focus on the survival and crafting elements. Head over to our .io games collection for more!

Doodle Road is an imaginative and captivating 2D casual game that combines creativity with problem-solving. In this fun browser game, your primary objective is to draw a path that will successfully guide a car from the starting point to the finish line. With a multitude of levels to explore, each one introduces new challenges and exciting obstacles that test your creativity and strategic thinking. Draw your way to victory and see how far your creativity can take you!

How to Play Doodle Road

You start in Doodle Road by practicing drawing a straight line from the car to the target. Sounds simple, right? Wait until you see how straight your line really is! The true challenge is how easy it is for your car actually to drive across that path.

Next challenge – draw a line to the target, but now there's a wall in your way. Remember, your car can’t fly! So, think about how to draw your path – you don’t have to go over the wall; you can go under it! As you go, you'll see that drawing a straight line is harder than it looks. If you don’t start the line from behind your car, it’ll just dangle off into oblivion.

How do you get over an L-shape? Or a huge gap in the ground? And the challenges keep coming. By level 5, your engine shuts off, so you’ll need your physics brain to figure out how to use hills and momentum to get across.

Some levels have trampoline-like springs that’ll launch you toward your target. The challenges change each time, keeping you on your toes. Buckle up because it's going to be a bumpy ride, depending on how well you draw!

More Games Like This

The fun has just begun! Browse our casual games, including Marble Run, a fun simulation game where you create a marble run using a range of tools. Other casual games worth playing include World’s Hardest Game, a casual game that certainly lives up to its fun name all these years later, or Gold Miner, a classic casual mining game that will remind you of the 2000s gameplay.

Obby World: Squid Escape is a casual parkour game where you jump your way through a whirlwind of obstacles and surprising challenges. Anything is possible in the variety of games offered. You will find yourself leaping across deadly gaps, racing through winding tracks on a speedy bike, and making daring escapes from high-security prisons. Each mode offers new thrills, so get ready to test your reflexes.

How to Play Obby World: Squid Escape

Obby World: Squid Escape throws is a mix of parkour challenges, with each game different from the last. Each game tests your timing, balance, and quick thinking. The game begins by letting you choose from a set of different obstacle-based modes, each with its own style and surprises.

You’ll face multiple rounds of challenges, such as:

Red Light, Green Light: The classic stop-and-go test. Run when the light is green, freeze when it’s red. Move at the wrong time, and you’re out.

Carousel Round: Follow the instructions: “run into a room,” “get into groups of two or three,” or “go solo.” It sounds simple, but without a way to communicate with other players, teamwork becomes tricky and tense.

Skywalk Courses: Balance across oversized objects floating in the sky—giant coffee cups, donuts, chocolate bars, and more. One misstep and you’ll tumble straight down, ending your round.

Other modes keep the action fresh, from racing down twisting bike tracks to sneaking through prison breakouts. Each one pushes you to react quickly and stay sharp under pressure.

The controls are simple, but the levels demand precision. One moment you’re leaping across glowing rainbow platforms, the next you’re dodging traps or trying to outsmart guards. Success depends on timing, agility, and a little creativity in how you approach obstacles.

With colorful environments, unpredictable twists, and nonstop movement, Obby World: Squid Escape is built for players who want parkour challenges that keep them on their toes.

Choose your mode. In Rainbow Mode, you’ll dash across glowing platforms in a lively, colorful world. EvoWorld.io is the multiplayer survival game previously known as FlyOrDie.io. You start as a small fly and level up as you eat more food. As you evolve, other players become part of your diet.

Each level comes with a new special ability and more things to eat. The choice is simple, you Fly or Die!

How to Play EvoWorld.io

Eat items and animals outlined in green, earn XP and progress on the evolution ladder. Avoid animals with a red outline, because they will eat you! You’ll be fighting for survival against hundreds of other players, so make sure you keep moving and keep eating. Keep an eye on your water level, as you’ll need plenty of water to survive.

There is just one playing mode: free-for-all.

Special Abilities

As you progress through the game, each animal will have its own unique and remarkable ability. You can use that special ability, and activate it by pressing the space bar or the S key, to get through the game quicker. When you start out as a fly, you’ll have “beginner’s luck”. This gives you a 50% chance to avoid a predator's attack. Use the special abilities to your advantage.

Game Levels

There are 45 different animals and eight stages of evolution in EvoWorld.io. You start as a simple fly, and fight your way up through the animal kingdom.

Once you’ve played through the ordinary and real animals, there are demons, mythical beasts, cosmic entities, and the undead. The grim reaper sits right at the top of the food chain with his scythe, which he uses to take down prey.

Biomes

There are multiple biomes in EvoWorld.io. Each one has an entirely different landscape. You’ll find different prey in each location, so don’t be afraid to explore the map and see what’s out there.

About the Developer

EvoWorld was made by Pixel Voices, an .io games developer.

Tips
Don’t stay in one place for too long
Use the special abilities to your advantage
Hide in the clouds or inside bushes to avoid being eaten
Drink plenty of water
Eat as much prey as you can!

Stick Epic Fighter is an action-packed, arcade physics-based fighting game where you are in control of a stick fighter to battle enemies in a dynamic, geometric world. Your mission is to evolve your character into an unstoppable force by unlocking powerful upgrades, mastering epic combos, and unleashing devastating fatalities that will destroy your foes. Conquer waves of enemies with precision and skill as you dominate each battle. Only after crushing every opponent will you unlock the portal to the next level, where even more significant challenges await. Sharpen your reflexes, perfect your strategies, and prove you have what it takes.

How to Play Stick Epic Fighter

You begin in a classic arcade-style side-scrolling screen, where you’ll quickly get accustomed to the game’s controls. Use the up arrow to jump, the down arrow to attack, and the left and right arrows for movement. Before long, you’ll encounter enemies—attack them by holding the down arrow to unleash a series of sword strikes. Holding down the attack key continuously lets you deliver multiple hits, which is essential since enemies require several strikes to be defeated.

Though you can jump and sprint past enemies to reach the end of the level quickly, you won’t be able to progress to the next round until all foes are eliminated. If you leave any behind, you’ll have to backtrack and take them out. Once every enemy is defeated, and you reach the final portal, your stickman will celebrate with a happy dance, signaling that you’ve successfully cleared the level!

As you advance, the difficulty ramps up with more enemies and tougher challenges, so stay alert and fast on your feet! Use the arrows for guidance on enemy locations and areas you may have missed. Throughout the course, prompts will also direct you to jump to high platforms or descend into lower areas.

Each round rewards you with points that can be used to purchase upgrades, boosting your power and making it easier to defeat stronger enemies. Plus, you can customize your stickman by changing skins, giving your hero a fresh look as you fight your way through each increasingly intense round!

More Games Like This

Keep the fun coming. Browse our action category for more games that pack a punch. If you liked Stick Epic Fighter, you might like House of Hazards, where you avoid traps and finish tasks faster than your friends; Getaway Shootout, a two-player game where you race three others to the finish line; or Cuphead, a boss battle where you control a warplane carrying Cuphead. Check out our arcade games for even more fun.

How to Play MX Offroad Master

Tackle the mountains

Ready, set, go! This fantastic downhill bike adventure features daring tracks high up in the hills and features retro PS1-era vibes. Tackle various terrains skilfully without crashing your bike. It's important to balance speed and control, so do use your brakes: any minor hit will result in having to restart from a checkpoint and, after three hits, you are out and must start from scratch.

Kit out your character

Crazy Motorcycle is a driving game where you guide a noob rider on a high-speed motorcycle to the finish line. Navigate through thrilling levels, jumping over gaps and dodging obstacles. Get ready for an adrenaline rush as you tackle exciting challenges on your way to victory!

How to Play Crazy Motorcycle

Crazy Motorcycle combines Minecraft graphics with classic 80s arcade gameplay. Your movements are limited to left, right, up, down, and jumping. Simple but all crucial to your survival on this obstacle-ridden bike course. You also have control over the sound being on or off. Ah, the good old days were when choice was more tangible. The lack of frills is no measure of fun in this thrilling bike race in the sky.

There are four available worlds to play in, with different terrains and obstacles in each of them. In every world, there are 16 stages to complete before getting to the end.

The object of the game is to reach the finish line while avoiding obstacles and collecting rewards to fatten your final score. You will mainly be going straight with the occasional moves to the right and left to avoid hitting obstacles or, worse, meeting your fate with the abyss below you by falling off the race track.

You can't get away with a straight run, and even on level one, you must maneuver to avoid falling to your demise.

The race course is also not entirely linear, and there are breaks in the course with nothing below you but chance. This is where your jumps will come into play. The wider the gap, the more speed and jump you will need to cross the divide.

If you see a series of swerving roads ahead with moving obstacles, slow down to retain your balance and avoid getting knocked off the road. The key to moving items is to move with them, even if you get close to the edge. Not all items can be jumped over.

Grab the red flags along the road; they represent checkpoints and allow you to restart from there should you fall, while yellow flags let you collect coins, which you can use to buy new voxelated skins in the menu.

Lastly, you can compete against other players by checking your score against theirs in the leaderboard, also available in the main menu.

More Games Like This

Buckle up or wear your helmet and check out more of our driving games! Moto X3M takes you on a wild ride with daring motorcycle stunts and challenging tracks.

An additional option to drive a car is represented by Eggy Car, while if you are looking for a totally different alternative, you can try Little Alchemy.
