Moto X3M is a driving bike game that takes dirt bike racing to the next level. It combines high-speed thrills with a test of precision and timing across 22 adrenaline-filled levels. Each course introduces fresh, intense obstacles from gravity-defying loops to dangerous ramps and explosive traps that keep you on the edge of your seat. Gear up, strap on your helmet, and prepare to perform stunts of a lifetime as you race against the clock.

How to Play Moto X3M

Sit back, hold on tight, and get ready for a thrilling bike ride (with pretty exciting music). Each level of Moto X3M ramps up the thrill with increasingly complex obstacles that require precision, skill, and, above all, patience. Don't get too distracted by the fun; every mistake comes at a price, and that price is time. And time is the key to nailing the coveted 3-star rating, where only the fastest, cleanest runs bring you victory.

Mastering each level means finding that sweet spot between speed, braking, and stunt work, all while dodging obstacles designed to slow you down.

Moto X3M offers 22 distinct tracks, each progressively challenging. While the early levels ease you, later tracks become obstacle-filled gauntlets of ramps, loops, and hazards. With each track’s unique layout, there’s plenty of replay value as you strive to beat your best time. The game can get pretty addictive.

As you conquer each course, you will earn stars and can use them to unlock two new bikes! It’s more than just a visual upgrade; new bikes give you added motivation to return to tracks and push for faster times and higher scores.

Moto X3M features vibrant 2D graphics, fluid physics-based animation, and a playful, slapstick tone. Crashes are humorous, with ragdoll physics and cartoon-style explosions keeping the action lighthearted. Each track has its own theme, from sunny beaches to underground caves, while energetic music and sound effects heighten the thrill of racing and performing stunts.

Push your speed to the max, but don't rush into unknown obstacles without caution. Every fall adds seconds, impacting your star rating. Aim to squeeze in as many air stunts as you can over big jumps to shave precious seconds off your final time!

Advanced Moves
Flips & Combos: Chain flips on long jumps to reduce your final time.
Back Wheel Boost: Landing on your rear wheel at the right angle gives a speed boost.
Timer Delay Trick: Wait for the perfect moment to start moving and effectively pause the timer.
Hidden Shortcuts: Some levels allow creative routes to bypass obstacles or save time.
Game Levels

Levels unlock sequentially, growing in difficulty from beginner-friendly ramps to extreme obstacles. Stars earned on each level unlock new bikes, adding visual variety and motivation to replay tracks. Checkpoints prevent frustration, letting you retry tricky sections without restarting the entire level.

Tips & Tricks

Keep your wheels on the ground for maximum speed when needed, but don’t hesitate to brake approaching tricky obstacles.

More Games Like This

There are many games in the Moto X3M series, like Basketball Legends and Basketball Stars. You can also browse our driving category and try popular titles where you drive fast in Snow Rider 3D. How fast can you go on ice? You can also test your driving precision in Eggy Car, where you are responsible for keeping an egg from falling out of your car, on the steepest of hills.

Features
22 levels with superb replay value
Various obstacles and challenges
Earn more stars for taking less time
Spend stars on new motorbikes
Developer

Developed by Ukraine-based MadPuffers (formerly FlashRush Games) in 2015, Moto X3M began as a Flash browser game and transitioned to HTML5 and mobile platforms. The “X3M” in the title is leetspeak for “Extreme,” reflecting the game’s daring stunts. Some levels hide Easter eggs, like secret vehicles or collectibles, rewarding curious players and adding replay value.

In addition to all the Moto X3M games, they have created smash hit basketball games like Basketball Legends and Basketball Stars.

There are six games in the Moto X3M series:

Moto X3M 6: Spooky Land
Moto X3M 5: Pool Party
Moto X3M 4: Winter
Moto X3M 3 (not available anymore)
Moto X3M 2 (not available anymore)

FAQ
Is there a Moto X3M 4 game?

There are six Moto X3M games. Moto X3M 4: Winter is the fourth of the series.

How to play Moto X3M?

Press the up arrow to accelerate, use left and right to balance, down to brake, and perform stunts to gain time, but avoid crashing!

Who created Moto X3M?

MadPuffers created Moto X3M. They've also made many other games, such as Basketball Stars and Soccer Masters.

Can I play Moto X3M on my phone or tablet?
Yes, you can play this game on any device, including your phone and tablet!
Is Moto X3M a good game?

With average ratings above 4.5 in both the App Store and Google Play Store, Moto X3M is definitely a fan favorite.

How does one get 3 stars in Moto X3M?

Complete each track as fast as you can: the time needed to get 3 stars is different on each level. Backflips reduce the total time by 0.5 seconds, so do as many as you can

How many Moto X3M games are there?

The Moto X3M series includes six official games: Moto X3M (2015), Moto X3M 2 (2015), Moto X3M 3 (2016), Moto X3M Winter (2017), Moto X3M Pool Party (2019), and Moto X3M Spooky Land (2019) though Moto X3M 2 and 3 are no longer available online, while the other titles can still be played on various gaming platforms.

Offroad Island is the ultimate driving truck simulation game that puts you behind the wheel of powerful trucks, rugged trailers, agile quads, high-speed bikes, and much more. Get ready to explore three vast, open-world environments, each filled with challenging terrains, hidden paths, and stunning landscapes. Perform daring stunts, collect valuable coins, and tackle tough trials to earn major rewards as you push your skills to the limit. With every twist, turn, and jump, the adventure gets more intense. Buckle up!

How to Play Offroad Island

Your goal in Offroad Island is to explore the map, gather gold, and complete races. There are three expansive, open-world maps, each offering its own set of challenges and terrains. From the stunt-filled Woodlands to the muddy, dense forests of MuddyHill, every map is uniquely designed to push your off-road skills to the limit. Whether navigating rugged trails, conquering steep hills, or mastering tight corners, these environments will keep you on your toes.

The game boasts a stunning collection of vehicles, ranging from iconic Cherokees and rugged Hummers to classic hotrods. But that’s just the beginning! You can also purchase quads, SxS vehicles, crawlers, bikes, and even hook-up trailers for your ride. Explore the premium vehicle collection for a selection of custom motors to make your off-road adventure even more thrilling.

Once you’ve chosen your vehicle, the true fun begins with a wide range of customization options. Personalize every detail—from the body and paint job to rims and tires. To enhance performance, tweak everything from engine power to weight distribution, suspension, and gearbox settings. The in-depth tuning menu lets you fine-tune each component to create the perfect off-road machine suited to your driving style.

The graphics in Offroad Island are quite realistic, where every terrain comes to life. As you drive, your vehicle’s wheels tear into the dirt, splashing mud and leaving behind a trail of debris that coats your ride. The suspension reacts dynamically to the ever-changing ground beneath you, providing a truly immersive experience. Whether you're conquering rocky hills or drifting through muddy swamps, the varied terrain ensures every ride feels authentic and challenging.

More Games Like This

Once your Offroad Island journey comes to an end, you can check out some more of our free roaming driving games or car games. Two other popular choices are Drift Hunters, a 3D game that lets you experience the art of drifting with an impressive range of tuned-up cars and dynamic tracks, and Smash Karts, where you race, collect weapons, and blast rivals to unlock characters and rewards!

Search for answers

Roam the corridors of this ravaged school in search of answers. Solve the puzzles and find the priest's tools so you can banish the demonic girl before it’s too late.

Survive the horrors

Early in the game, you’ll find a shotgun. You can use this to shoot the girl away before she kills you, but it will only rid you of her temporarily. Haunted School gets progressively scarier and utilizes jump scares and tension to put you on the edge of your seat. The vibe is similar to other famous survival horror games like Silent Hill and Amnesia: The Dark Descent. Expect unforgiving frights.

Horror Tale Kidnapper is a frightening first-person horror adventure game. Solve the disturbing mystery of the missing children at Lakewitch. Who is the kidnapper, and why are they doing it? Where are the children disappearing, and how can we save them? It's up to you to find out.

How to Play Horror Tale Kidnapper

In this episode, your name is Tom, and you meet your friend Harry, who plans to keep you and the other kids from your neighborhood safe from the Kidnapper while you're waiting for your parents to return.

The story begins with your parents leaving you at home. Your mom leaves you a note, asking to collect eggs from the hen-house and bring them to Tom. While cycling to your meeting point, you’ll encounter the famous Kidnapper…

You'll have to find Tom and, together with him, you will fortify the tree house so the spooky Kidnapper can't get you again. On the way to your goal, puzzles, moments of fear, screams, unexpected twists and turns, and lots of fun await you!

You will experience some jump scares in this story set in rural United States during the ‘90s, but Horror Tale is rated PEGI 12, so it’s very moderate and not as violent as other titles of the same genre.

Locations to discover in Horror Tale Kidnapper:
The Treehouse

the School

In each of these, you’ll have to pick up items and use them with the scenarios you are presented with to progress, in escape-game style puzzles.

Mr. Dude: Online Multiverse Challenge is a casual multiplayer game where pretty much anything can happen. Play with other people from around the world, or with your friends in one of the many challenging yet wacky game modes.

How to Play Mr. Dude: Online Multiverse Challenge

You’ll need to wait in each game mode until enough other players are found to join you. You don’t directly interact with them, but you can get inspired by their moves.

Choose your mode:

Random Map
Colored Floor (Disco Version)
Dangerous Bridge
Escape (From Hell!)
Panic Room (Horror Movie Style)
Disco Mode

In Disco, a colorful floor awaits, but every few seconds, most of the colors disappear. If you are standing on a tile that is gone, the bouncers will fling you off the dance floor. Collect as many coins as possible while staying on the safe colors.

Dangerous Bridge Mode

Cross the bridge in various settings: a construction site, a rooftop, or an island with shark-infested waters below. One wrong move and it's game over. Make precise jumps and do not rush until you have built confidence.

Hell Mode

Start on a stone slab with molten lava flowing beneath you. Jump across other slabs while avoiding the lava unless you want to stay in hell for eternity.

Horror Movie Mode

This mode places you in a seemingly normal home, but it is anything but normal. You must find the key to escape. You have 10 seconds to search without anyone chasing you. If you take longer, a villain on a bicycle will start chasing you. If they catch you, it is game over. Interact with objects using the E key.

Random

This mode sends you to any one of the games above.

This multiplayer game is perfect for playing with players worldwide or with friends and family. Want to play with friends? Access private rooms to keep the game among familiar faces.

Tip

You’ll receive a suitcase full of daily rewards. Spin the Wheel of Fortune to see what gift you get. Gifts can include coins, dynamite, shoes with a bit of extra pep, lifelines, and more.

More Games Like This

We have plenty more games with a similar vibe in our casual collection. Try some popular games like Little Alchemy (and its sequel Little Alchemy 2), Friday Night Funkin, Sprunki, and more.

Exhibit of Sorrows is a short horror game set in a curious circus-themed exhibit. Explore this strange interactive museum, follow instructions, and don’t upset the clown!

How to Play Exhibit of Sorrows

Not all is well in the Exhibit of Sorrows. Progress through this progressively creepy exhibition and explore the strange dolls on display. Each piece of art is a puzzle, requiring interaction to reveal the keys. Be prepared to do terrible things to escape.

The dolls you'll find in this unique art showcase are:

Mr. Floaty
Mr. Washy  
Ms. Stretch
Mr. Handy

The mood gets darker and more unsettling as you progress. You will encounter the same exhibitions in disturbing new forms as you become increasingly more panicked to escape. You will have to make cruel decisions in order to leave.

Regardless of the sinister undertone to the game, there is a story to learn that will keep you gripped to the end. And the end totally depends on the choices you make during the game; there are different possible endings, so you can play this multiple times and discover the different finales.

Exhibit of Sorrows is an excellent horror game worth seeing through.

Short history of Exhibit of Sorrows

This game was developed by Maxim Tsai, known as adayofjoy on Reddit and Itch.io, in collaboration with US animation artist Theresa Kao, who is interested in exploring how animation can be adapted to macabre contexts. Exhibit of Sorrows only took four months to develop, and it is a successful example of an indie game finding a large audience.

Ragdoll Archers is an archery game featuring bow and arrow-equipped stickmen with ragdoll physics. Fire arrows at a range of opponents while earning points to upgrade your abilities and ammunition. Play two-player PvP against your friend or team up with them to defeat a range of foes!

How to Play
Line up your shots carefully, and fire!

Starting with the basic arrows and baseline stats, you will be faced with various enemies. Some of these enemies are trickier than others to beat due to armor, position, and other factors. Occasionally, you will encounter a giant enemy. This is like a mini-boss level, and you will earn lots of skulls for defeating them.

Survive for as long as possible

Your goal is to survive for as long as possible and earn as many skulls as you can. The best way to survive for a long time is to keep hitting the apples. Throughout the game you will notice flying apples. Shoot your arrow through the apples to replenish your health, stamina, or both. Here’s how the apples work:

Red apple = health
Green apple = stamina
Golden apple = health and stamina
Customize your ammunition

There is an ever-increasing range of arrows to unlock the more you play the game. It’s best to keep playing and switching the arrow types to learn which ones are more powerful and suit your playing style. There is everything from electric and poison to balloon and axe and you can increase your arrow slots to hold more of them at once.

Use your skulls to upgrade your abilities

You earn skulls by killing enemies, which rewards a specific amount based on the power of the foe you defeated. You can upgrade your health, stamina, damage, and more using this currency.

More Games Like This

Ragdoll Archers is one of many games featuring ragdoll physics. These games are often fun to play due to the absurd nature of their physics. Some other popular choices include Basket Random and Free GeoGuessr.

Stickman Clash is a thrilling action battle game where you battle as stickman warriors armed with an array of exciting weapons. Engage in fast-paced combat, outsmart opponents, and showcase your skills in dynamic arenas. The game's captivating action and challenging mechanics keep you hooked as you strive to become the ultimate stickman champion!

How to Play Stickman Clash

Stickman Clash combines fun, chaos, and unpredictable physics, making every battle a unique experience! Stand out in battle by customizing your stickman! Choose your character's colors, heads, and weapons to reflect your unique style.

Choose from an arsenal, including boxing gloves, ice cream, boots, daggers, guitars, katanas, bombs, portal guns, and scythes. Each weapon adds a unique twist to your strategy.

Battle in stunning environments like a sea surrounded by a giant octopus. But beware, the creatures are the least of your worries as chaos unfolds!

Stickman dynamics make every move unpredictable, and your movement is limited by the WASD keys. Your character flops around, making precise targeting difficult. However, constant movement can work in your favor: it’s harder to hit a moving target and easier to surprise your opponent with unexpected strikes.

Stickman Clash is designed for one or two players, and three- and four-player modes are planned for even more chaotic fun!

Survival mode

Work together to fend off waves of monsters and defend your base. Use bombs strategically to clear crowds without harming teammates.

Boss Fights

These epic battles test your skills. The pickaxe-wielding boss is especially challenging, dodge its attacks and counter with well-timed bombs. Teamwork and precision are your best allies here.

Game Tips

Stay agile: The more you move, the harder you are to hit.

Use the environment: Maps come with unique challenges and opportunities.

Master timing: Especially in boss fights, precision and teamwork are key.

Experiment: Try different weapons and strategies to discover what works best for you.

Try Cuphead, a game where you control a warplane and fight boss battles; Cookie Delivery, where you take on the dangerous and difficult work of a cookie delivery person; or Run 3, an incredibly addicting, endless runner-type action/platforming game in which you play as a little grey alien.

Thief Puzzle is a clever 2D puzzle logic game that puts your problem-solving and strategy to the test. You control a sneaky thief’s hand as it reaches for valuable treasures, but the path is filled with complex traps, laser security systems, and tricky obstacles. Do you have what it takes to outsmart each trap that comes your way?

How to Play Thief Puzzle

In Thief Puzzle, you're tasked with a series of sneaky heists in various comical settings. You'll start by testing your skills in simple situations: snatching a purse from an old woman seated on a bench or grabbing groceries from two unsuspecting women from a ledge. As you progress, the challenges escalate. You’ll even swipe a tourist’s suitcase while they admire the Eiffel Tower and outwit a rival thief to steal a money bag in a museum. There’s never a dull moment as you navigate your way through each clever scenario.

From beachside schemes where you steal a pearl from a shell to slipping into restricted areas by pickpocketing a key, every level brings new surprises. As the difficulty increases, you’ll find yourself pulling off trickier moves like swiping a diamond ring from a newly engaged couple while they’re lost in a kiss or lifting answers from a classmate’s test without getting caught by whirling fans. You’ll also have to outsmart guard dogs to steal car keys, drive away with precision, avoid TNT explosions, and—just for fun—snatch a toupee from the head of a party guest.

As the levels progress, you will need increasing sharp thinking and precise timing as you carefully plot your moves to avoid detection and snatch the prize. With every stage growing more challenging, you'll need to outwit elaborate defenses using clever strategies and creative solutions.

Sharp thinking alone won't cut it. You will need to calculate the perfect angles and find the shortest path to avoid detection. The puzzles are designed to challenge your wit and timing, requiring you to navigate obstacles and interact with dynamic environments. The slightest misstep could alert your target or trigger traps, so precision is key as you outmaneuver everything from dogs, furniture, and, of course, unsuspecting victims.

More Games Like This

Want a few more brain-teasing games to get you scratching your head? Try more of our puzzle games and logic games like Nonogram, where you fill in spaces on a numerical grid to reveal an image or Bolts and Nuts, where you test your logic and strategic thinking with a ticking timer breathing down your neck.

Controls

Click and hold the left mouse button to guide the thieves hand towards the target

Bridge Race is a competitive casual collect building game where you gather blocks to construct your bridge while outsmarting rivals. Stay alert as other players may try to steal your progress, adding an exciting twist to the challenge. Strategize and race to complete your bridge first in this thrilling test of skill and speed!

How to Play Bridge Race

Bridge Race is an oddly satisfying game where you aim to collect as many blocks of your color as possible and carry them across the board to build a bridge. The objective is to create a path that leads you to the next collection area and, ultimately, to the finish line. Victory is sweet, but the challenge continues as each round gets more difficult.

The game is designed to be both simple and rewarding, with delicate sounds that create a satisfying atmosphere. You'll encounter obstacles like slides and elevators, which add a fun element as you navigate through the level, taking you closer to the next challenge.

But you’re not alone in this race. Other players are also collecting blocks to build their own bridges, and they’re more than happy to challenge you along the way. If you’re not careful, your opponents can sabotage your progress by building over your bridge, undoing all the hard work you’ve done. And if you run out of blocks and need to return to collect more, be prepared for your opponents to steal your blocks, changing their color to match yours and forcing you to start the process over again. You’ll also have to watch out for being knocked down by other players, which causes you to lose all the blocks on your back.

Throughout the game, you’ll encounter rewards scattered across the map. Green rewards multiply the number of blocks you carry, giving you an advantage, while red ones will diminish your collection, so it’s important to avoid them at all costs. Stay vigilant, collect wisely, and you’ll be on your way to victory!

More Games Like This

Stickman Project is a 2D physics-based action battle game where you take on your opponents by unleashing mutant chaos. You’ll battle through dynamic levels using fluid combat and fast reflexes. Choose between endless more or level-based missions and test how long you can survive in this intense, stick-figure showdown. Made by Neron's Brother, Creators of Supreme Duelist.

How to Play Stickman Project

Stickman Project is a ragdoll physics-based action game, which means you’ll never have complete control over your character’s movements. That’s part of the fun; every battle is unpredictable. The game combines fluid combat, tricky level layouts, and a variety of weapons, challenging you to push through each stage and reach the next.

The first few levels are simple and serve as a good opportunity to get used to your character’s movement. You’ll encounter obstacles that require you to use the jump control repeatedly and persist until you clear them.

As you face enemies, you can fight barehanded with kicks, but weapons give you a significant advantage. Learn to pick them up quickly, and watch out for bats, swords, shields, dynamite, and potions that boost your size and power.

At the end of each round, you’ll need to project yourself into an elevator to get to the next round, but it won’t open until you’ve defeated every enemy on the level. If it stays closed, search for any opponents you might have missed.

Each round becomes progressively more complex, with more dangerous enemies and trickier environments. Master your movement, collect weapons, and adapt to the chaos to survive.

Man Runner 2048 is a casual arcade game where your objective is to run and merge men till you reach 2048. Your goal is to get the highest score on each round, because at the end of the level, you will get a chance to shoot a giant monster. The higher your score, the more power you gain.

How to Play Man Runner 2048

Your ultimate goal is to merge men to reach the 2048 level, achieve the highest score possible, and then fire powerful cannonballs to damage giant monsters and take control of the islands.

Each course starts pretty simply. You will need to run through a course head-on, filled with obstacles, while collecting as many points as possible. The gamescape is set up like a runway, and obstacles are everywhere. They could be right in front of you, coming from below, dropping from above. Stay vigilant and keep your eye on the prize. You want to make it to the end of the course.

Along the way, collect green rewards and pink diamonds for significant score boosts, but steer clear of anything red or items that split your points. At the end of the course, you will face a giant skeleton. Aim carefully to hit your target. Experiment to find its Achilles’ heel, sometimes right between the eyes, works for maximum damage to earn extra points. You may not be able to defeat it right away, but each attempt helps you rack up a higher score.

Each round introduces new obstacles, including sliding floors that can help you gather more points if you move skillfully. Be careful of spikes that rise from the ground and bombs that drop from the sky, both of which can cost you the run.

Between runs, you can buy accessories to customize your character.

Tip

Aim for the monster's center when you fire your cannonballs at the end of the round. This is one of its weakest spots.

More Games Like This

If you like Man Runner 20248, you will want to browse our casual category for similar fun. Some fan favorites from this category include Little Alchemy and its sequel, Little Alchemy 2, the classic Bubble Shooter game, Geometry Dash Online, and plenty more. Orion Arm Guild

Mine gems

Gems are the backbone of the StarBlast economy. You'll find them by mining asteroids and destroying the ships of opposition forces. Shoot rocks until they explode! Ensure you target rocks suitable for your ship's size and power.

Upgrade your ship

You can buy upgrades with all of those precious gems you've earned. You can also use gems to buy upgrades, and you can convert them into credits to buy additional weapons at your team's base. There are seven ship tiers you can evolve to, as well as enhanced cargo capacities.

You'll notice an upgrade menu at the bottom. Gems can be instantly converted into upgrades for these items. From left to right, this is the order of upgrades you'll see there:

Shield capacity
Shield regeneration
Energy capacity
Energy regeneration
Laser damage
Weapon speed
Ship speed
Ship agility

You also have 31 different ships you can choose from as you progress in the game.

Secondary Weapons and Power-ups

There are additional weapons available in Starblast.io, known as secondary weapons. When playing Team Mode, you can purchase them at the team’s base, using gems that have been converted into credits. In other game modes, secondary weapons can be found floating in space, as a result of destroyed ships or asteroids.

Secondary weapons are:

Projectiles
Mines
Pods/Drones
Utilities

Battle with other players

Fighting other ships is a huge part of the enjoyment. It's wise to use your speed as a small ship to escape battle and mine resources until you're powerful enough to fight. Be sure to keep a fresh stock of additional weapons and make sure you buff your attack and defense stats as much as possible!

Eliminating competitors is a faster and riskier approach to mining resources, as destroyed enemy ships will drop all the gems they were carrying.

More Games Like This

At the heart of StarBlast is the simple and addictive online gameplay characteristic of many .io games. Other online titles you might enjoy for multiplayer combat include Agar io and Krunker.

You can also check out our fan favorites, like Geometry Dash or Little Alchemy.

Features
Fun gameplay with plenty of ship upgrades and rewards
Four exciting game modes and three factions
Active online games with intense spaceship battles
An active player-driven modding community

November 2016

You can play Starblast and many other IO games at CrazyGames.

How do I donate gems in StarBlast.io?

Make sure you're playing team mode and long hold V to split gems with your team member.

How can I get better at flying in StarBlast.io?

Get into a fast ship and fly as fast as you can through minefields without bumping into an asteroid. This will quickly improve your movement skills in the game.

How do you shoot in StarBlast?

To shoot in StarBlast you must press LMB.

Fighter Aircraft Pilot is a super realistic flight simulator game, part of our driving airplane collection. Sit in the cockpit of some of the most iconic aircraft in aviation history. Begin your mission by choosing your plane and mastering the intricate controls as you gather speed for a flawless takeoff. Feel the thrill of precision flying as you soar through the skies, honing your skills in an immersive simulation that captures the excitement and challenge of piloting a legendary fighter jet.

How to Play Fighter Aircraft Pilot

Fighter Aircraft Pilot is an exciting flying simulator game where you take the pilot seat, mastering multiple controls for a safe take-off and flight. The graphics are pretty realistic and easily become addictive.

There are two dynamic game modes to choose from: Free Fly and Missions. In Free Fly mode, you can select from an impressive array of fighter planes, including iconic models such as the A29, A10, F35, and KC-10, as well as legendary WWII planes and cutting-edge jets, for an immersive flight experience that lets you explore 3D simulation at your own pace. Soar through the skies, experience the thrill of piloting an aircraft, and enjoy the landscapes below. Well, that is if you don't crash.

By the way. You will crash. Gameplay is addictive, but it is not simple, and the challenge of finding the right balance is what keeps you coming back.

The controls are designed for both ease of use and realism, with E to start the engine, 1 or 2 for throttle adjustments, X to remove the brake, and the down arrow to initiate flight after achieving the right speed. Timing and slight movements to control your plane are everything.

Use the left mouse button to fire at your target, switch weapons with the mouse scroll, and drop bombs by pressing L. Additional controls include V to toggle lights, 5 to dump fuel for added maneuverability, and 6 to refill your fuel reserves. For high-speed action, activate the afterburner with I and use P for reverse thrust, while the space bar serves as your brake for smooth landings.

It's not easy, so do as much free flying as you can to get a feel for flight.

For those craving a bit more of a challenge, the Mission mode presents ten missions where you'll need to target and bomb specific objectives. Precision and skill are paramount as each flight tests your tactical prowess and flying capabilities.

Get ready to take to the skies, embrace the adrenaline of aerial combat, and master the art of flying.

Bon voyage!

More Games Like This

Continue to soar in one of our popular airplane game titles Cuphead, where you control a warplane carrying Cuphead in one of the biggest boss battles. If you want to stay closer to the ground, a few more popular driving games include Mr Racer, Drift Hunters, or Moto X3M.

How to play Fighter Aircraft Pilot?

There are two types of games to play in Fighter Aircraft Pilot and they include Free Fly and Mission flights. Free Fly allows you to master the craft of piloting while Missions gives you ten different scenarios where you need to shoot targets from the skies.

How do you take off in Fighter Aircraft Pilot?

After starting the engine and revving up the throttle, be sure to remove the brake and press the down arrow to take flight.

Crazy Plane Landing is not your typical driving airplane game—here, you take the pilot’s seat in a gravity-defying airplane and launch into the skies. There is a serene exhilaration of soaring when you get the hang of the controls, but it doesn't last long. You need to land! Every flight pushes your skills to the limit as you navigate unpredictable terrains and intense weather conditions. Will you make a smooth touchdown or end in a spectacular, fiery crash?

How to Play Crazy Plane Landing

Your main objective in Crazy Plane Landing is to take flight, avoid obstacles, and land your plane safely. This sounds easy enough, but there is a reason some airline pilots need over a thousand hours of flight time for certification. It isn't easy!

You’ll need to master both acceleration and steering with simple game gears—hold the left mouse button, space bar, W key, or up arrow to accelerate and gain altitude, giving your plane just enough speed to soar through the skies. As you navigate, use the left mouse button or the left and right arrow keys to steer your plane on course. There are arrows pointing to the destination landing strip. Take your hand off the acceleration and steer towards the landing pad.

Precision is key—smoothly adjust your trajectory to avoid obstacles and line up your approach for a perfect landing. The right balance between speed and direction will ensure a safe landing. Don't expect too many smooth landings to begin with. This game is called "crazy" for a reason.

You have a few airplanes to choose from but can only upgrade once you've accumulated a significant amount of points. Upgrades are well worth all the crashes that get you accumulated points. You not only get to choose your plane, but you can upgrade engines, boosts, and bonuses.

The better the plane, the more control you have over your speed and steering.

More Games Like This

There are plenty more driving games to continue the fun. Try Moto X3M, a bike racing game with 22 levels, each of which poses a new challenge and provides the opportunity to perform wild stunts on your dirt bike, or Drift Hunters, a 3D drifting game with an excellent selection of tracks and plenty of tuned-up cars.

Airline Tycoon Idle is a clicker management game where you take control of the skies as you build and manage your very own airline empire! Start small with just a handful of planes and airports, then strategically expand by treating travelers to lavish VIP lounges, purchasing state-of-the-art planes, and expanding to international airports. Like most management games, you can't do all the work yourself. Hire skilled managers to automate your flights, upgrade your fleet to maximize efficiency, and ensure top-tier passenger satisfaction. Unlock powerful bonuses and climb the ranks to airline tycoon!

How to Play Airline Tycoon Idle

Your objective in Idle Airline Tycoon is to transform a small operation into a global airline fleet. Start with a modest amount of airplanes, two to be exact, with limited destinations, but soon you'll be connecting dozens of cities worldwide.

Gameplay is simple and made to keep you engaged (and relaxed!) as you click your fleet to take off as often as possible, driving up revenue and unlocking more upgrades. Fly as much as you can, and you will soon find yourself upgrading your airports and planes to gradually grow your airline empire.

Purchasing a new airplane will set you back around $5,000, but it's a crucial step in expanding your airline. To gather the necessary funds, you'll need to fly your planes to the initial routes offered, like Rome, London, and New York, running consistent flights to build up your earnings. The goal is to master these routes and venture into new cities, steadily growing your airline’s reach. Every flight you run brings you closer to unlocking more destinations,

Each choice you make shapes your airline’s success—expand air routes, optimize flight paths, and invest in airport upgrades to attract more passengers and increase your earnings.

The game combines strategy with the ease of idle gameplay, allowing you to earn profits with a click. But don’t just sit back—efficient management is key. Carefully plan your routes between cities to ensure smooth operations and steady profits, avoiding costly mistakes that could disrupt your flights.

Bon voyage!

More Games Like This

Clicker games are the perfect way to unwind. Try a few of our more popular titles if you want more of the same simple yet satisfying gameplay. Planet Clicker, a game where you aim to colonize other planets, all with one click; Mr Mine, a game where you build a mining empire from the ground up; and Idle Breakout, an Atari-inspired arcade game where you click blocks for rewards.

Transform and conquer

Robo Runner is a simple running game like Om Nom Run, where the objective is to get from A to B. You control a robot that can change forms. With the click of a button, you can transform into a plane, spinner, ball, gunner, and more!

Use your abilities to overcome obstacles

Use your abilities to overcome obstacles. If you approach spikes, then fly above them! Got a gang of giants coming for you? It’s time to switch it up and get the guns out. Think fast as you move through the stage to avoid losing.

Battle bosses to progress

Every few levels, you unlock a new robot to use in the next few levels. There’s also a tricky boss battle where you must use the various robots at your disposal to outsmart the boss and move on to the next game.
